company.name: PT. Bank Mega, Tbk
company.description:
Berawal dari sebuah usaha milik keluarga bernama PT. Bank Karman yang didirikan pada tahun 1969 dan berkedudukan di Surabaya, selanjutnya pada tahun 1992 berubah nama menjadi PT. Mega Bank dan melakukan relokasi Kantor Pusat ke Jakarta.

Seiring dengan perkembangannya PT. Mega Bank pada tahun 1996 diambil alih oleh PARA GROUP (PT. Para Global Investindo dan PT. Para Rekan Investama). Untuk lebih meningkatkan citra PT. Mega Bank, pada bulan Juni 1997 melakukan perubahan logo dengan tujuan bahwa sebagai lembaga keuangan kepercayaan masyarakat, akan lebih mudah dikenal melalui logo perusahaan yang baru tersebut. Pada tahun 2000 dilakukan perubahan nama dari PT. Mega Bank menjadi PT. Bank Mega.

Dalam rangka memperkuat struktur permodalan maka pada tahun yang sama PT. Bank Mega melaksanakan Initial Public Offering dan listed di BEJ maupun BES. Dengan demikian sebagian saham PT. Bank Mega dimiliki oleh publik dan berubah namanya menjadi PT. Bank Mega Tbk.

Pada saat krisis ekonomi, Bank Mega mencuat sebagai salah satu bank yang tidak terpengaruh oleh krisis dan tumbuh terus tanpa bantuan pemerintah bersama-sama dengan Citibank, Deutche Bank dan HSBC.
PT. Bank Mega Tbk. dengan semboyan "To Be Pride of The Nation" tumbuh dengan pesat dan terkendali serta menjadi lembaga keuangan ternama yang mampu disejajarkan dengan bank-bank terkemuka di Asia Pasifik dan telah mendapatkan berbagai penghargaan dan prestasi baik di tingkat nasional, regional maupun internasional. Dalam upaya mewujudkan kinerja sesuai dengan nama yang disandangnya, PT. Bank Mega Tbk. berpegang pada azas profesionalisme, keterbukaan dan kehati-hatian dengan struktur permodalan yang kuat serta produk dan fasilitas perbankan terkini.
Pada tahun 2013 Bank Mega memperkenalkan identitas baru yang terdiri dari logo dan simbol grafis huruf “M” yang merefleksikan positioning dan acuan pertumbuhan yang baru bagi perusahaan.
Warna-warna hangat merupakan luapan energi dari logo baru Bank Mega yang energik dan solusi keuangan yang kompherensif kepada pelanggan. Warna kuning menggambarkan kecerdasan dan harapan. Warna abu-abu menggambarkan sistem yang canggih. Warna orange menggambarkan semangat dan optimisme, menunjukkan setiap insan Bank Mega selalu melihat sudut pandang positif atas tiap kejadian dan selalu mengupayakan hasil akhir yang terbaik. Identitas baru ini juga merefleksikan ambisi Bank Mega untuk mewujudkan masyarakat dan bangsa Indonesia yang maju dan sejahtera, dengan menyediakan berbagai solusi keuangan yang spesifik, sesuai kebutuhan sesuai nasabah secara lengkap dan menyeluruh, dikelola secara profesional dengan technologi berkelas dunia dan kontrol kualitas yang terjaga baik, yang memungkinkan setiap individu, keluarga, dan bisnis nasabah berada pada jalur tercepat dalam mencapai keberhasilan di bidang keuangan.

company.name: PT Pipamas Primasejati
company.description:
Sebagai bagian dari Group PMPS (Pancamas Pipasakti), kami berdiri sejak Tahun 2005 dan kami hadir di tengah masyarakat Indonesia sebagai salah satu produsen yang bergerak dalam bidang plastik khususnya pipa uPVC  dan HDPE dengan merek dagang PiPAMAS
Sadar akan pertumbuhan industri konstruksi dan infrastruktur di Indonesia yang semakin hari semakin berkembang, sesuai dengan visi PiPAMAS yaitu menjadi produsen pipe plastik pilihan pertama di Indonesia, kami berkomitmen untuk selalu mengutamakan kepuasan pelanggan dan senantiasa menghasilkan produk berkualitas tinggi yang memenuhi standar (JIS K-6742 dan SNI), kami pun senantiasa melakukan evaluasi dan perbaikan terhadap produk, proses, sistem, dan manajemen untuk menunjang pelayanan kami kepada Anda.
Kami telah menangani prcyek dari beragam sektor seperti irigasi rumah tangga, permukiman, gedung perkantoran, water plant, dan Iain-Iain Kami selalu siap memberikan penjelasan untuk membantu masalah yang dihadapi konsumen seat pemasangan di lapangan dan layanan purna jual kami dapat selalu diandalkan untuk mengatasi masalah yang timbul setelah pipa terpasang
PiPAMAS adalah pilihan yang tepat untuk sistem pipa yang berkualitas karena PiPAMAS adalah sarana kehidupan berkualitas begi masyarakat.

Knowledge, Skills and Abilities:
  • Real-word experience planning social media programs that span owned (eg Blogs), earned (eg Facebook) and paid advertisement 
  • Knowledge of Digital Marketing current best practices and understanding of Digital production processes 
  • Knowledge of social media legal guidelines, including, but not limited to WOMMA and “pay-per-post” 
  • Knowledge of media strategy and planning options and the media role in integrated communication 
Requirements:
  • More than 3 years experience or equivalent exposure to a corporate environment 
  • BA or BS with focus on communication: Advertising/ Marketing 
  • Experience with social media platforms
  • Experience writing, editing and crafting content for the social media space

title: Teleworking Java Software Engineer  (Contract Based)
description:
We are looking for a talented  Java  engineer to join an experienced team of engineers working on our flagship to work remotely for our products Telflow, a next-generation service delivery platform for telecommunications and cloud providers (http://telflow.com), and Inomial, a high-performance ecosystem of billing microservices (http://inomial.com).  
  • Get hands-on experience developing on a globally competitive software platform using the latest technology and a microservices architecture. 
  • Learn new technologies with support and coaching from senior developers in Indonesia and abroad. 
  • Work safely and comfortably remotely taking advantage of our teleworking experience to continue to learn and collaborate with peers from around the world.
  • Join a fun and casual office with like-minded, clever peers - when the pandemic clears!
If you are passionate about technology, working remotely, love helping customers achieve their goals, and are enthusiastic about learning new skills and applying them to real-world problems, we want to hear from you!  
What you will do 
  • Design, develop & continuously deploy solutions and new product features for our customers 
  • Contribute ideas to the product design and architecture 
  • Continuously improve technologies and processes with support from seniors and architects 
  • Work independently and collaboratively in a creative and agile team
  • Work with a global team on an award-winning software product 
Skills we are looking for: 
  • Software development experience in Java 
  • Desirable - Knowledge of common integration technologies (GraphQL, Kafka, REST, SOAP, JMS etc.) 
  • SQL experience (PostgreSQL, MySQL, Oracle etc) 
  • Desirable - Knowledge of Design Patterns and UML 
  • Ability to work well with others in a collaborative team environment
  • Excellent English communication
  • Flexible working hours as we work with international teams
  • For this position we will consider applicants of any experience level (as long as you meet the above criteria), and adjust pay accordingly
Our technology: We will train you in these frameworks! 
  • High performance PostgreSQL – SQL & PL/PGSQL 
  • Cutting-edge integration technologies – Kafka, GraphQL 
  • Business Process Management and Rules libraries (Activiti, Drools, etc) 
  • Docker microservices & Docker Swarm orchestration 
  • High performance & Highly available architectures, data structures and algorithms 
  • Training in Telecommunications and Service Provider Domain 
Benefits : 
  • We reward high achieving employees with pay above industry average  
  • BPJS
  • 12 days annual leave and other personal leave 
Your application  
Please include your academic  results, and  provide your CV in English only.

company.name: PT. DGIT Systems Indonesia
company.description:
PENGUMUMAN :
  • PT. DGIT Systems Indonesia tidak pernah memungut biaya apapun dalam proses rekrutmen.
  • PT. DGIT Systems Indonesia tidak pernah bekerja sama dengan travel agent / biro perjalanan tertentu dalam proses rekrutmen.
  • Apabila Anda diminta untuk membayar sejumlah uang dalam bentuk pembayaran tiket pesawat dan hotel atau akomodasi lainnya agar diabaikan.
  • Jangan memberikan data pribadi atau data keuangan Anda kepada siapapun.
  • Jika membutuhkan klarifikasi lebih lanjut dapat langsung menghubungi PT. DGIT Systems Indonesia
DGIT is a specialist supplier of software and services to digital and communications service providers, using cutting-edge technology to create intuitive, flexible and highly customisable solutions for the modern digital marketplace.
DGIT is the creator of Telflow, the multi-award winning quote-to-cash platform that provides CPQ, order capture, provisioning and inventory management for digital and communications service providers. DGIT is also home to Inomial, the innovative revenue management and billing platform that handles subscription management and billing solutions for telecommunications carriers, digital media distributors, utilities companies and cloud service providers. Together, Telflow and Inomial can be used to seamlessly automate and effortlessly manage the complete end-to-end opportunity-to-operate journey for digital and communications services.
DGIT plays a key role in contributing to the B2B and REST API standards advanced by the TM Forum, and has been consistently recognised by TM Forum awards for its role in transforming the operations of digital and communications service providers, and for its outstanding open architecture and API design. DGIT is also a significant contributor to the Metro Ethernet Forum (MEF) in the area of inter-provider wholesale B2B APIs.
Originally founded in Melbourne in 2005, DGIT now has offices in Melbourne, Auckland and Denpasar – with around 100 employees across these three locations – and is represented by partners in the Asia-Pacific, the UK, North America, Africa and the Middle East. DGIT has almost 80 customers including Tier 1 and Tier 2 telecommunications providers, digital service providers and enterprise organisations, and is rapidly expanding its customer base around the world.

company.name: PT Repex Wahana
company.description:
The services that customers ask of a logistics company are becoming more and more varied and customized.  Whether you are sending goods or documents, you need the assurance that these will be sent quickly, safely and efficiently.  If your business involves  delivery of goods, you will need to contact various service providers for packaging, licensing, documentation services, and a courier or freight forwarder.  Each time you send a package, you will need to contact at least three different service providers.
RPX is here to facilitate and shorten this process. Whatever type of goods or documents you need to send, wherever you wish to send them, whether by air, land or sea, we have the infrastructure and network at your disposal. Even customs clearance and storage while your goods are in transit can be managed by RPX. RPX is supported by the latest state-of-the-art technology to answer your every needs. The comprehensive services offered by RPX along with our local and international network throughout the major cities in Indonesia and the world, will make everything easy for you.
For career development, RPX provides a various range of career opportunities at different levels throughout Indonesia. Here, you will be given chances to develop yourself, take responsibilities, master challenges, overcome problems, and improve your skills. We are committed to stimulate your improvement and development, and support your growth, to help you achieve your goals and succeed with us.

company.name: PT Kewalram Indonesia
company.description:
PT Kewalram Indonesia had a modest beginning with the installation of a spinning mill in 1976 in Bandung, Indonesia. Since then, it has grown to become a large integrated textile facility covering spinning, embroidery and a dye house equipped with state-of-the-art machineries. Our customer oriented approach, coupled with exacting quality led to increased demand for our products and thereby enabling our growth over the years.
Our products are exported to over 60 countries across the globe in 4 Continents, reflecting company's strong commitment and emphasis on quality. The company also has a substancial presence in the domestic markets with a wide range of products offering.
Kewalram has achieved leadership position in its product range based on its unwavering commitment to highest quality standards and drive towards total consumer satisfaction.
We are the first integrated textile unit to receive the ISO (ISO 9001 & OEKOTEX) accreditation for quality management in Indonesia. Adding to our ever growing quality standards, We are now a memeber of Better Cotton Initiative (BCI) and bearer of Global Recycle Standard Certification.

title: Business Development Executive
description:
Pengenalan Perusahaan
Kitchen Hub adalah Startup Baru untuk platform dapur Cloud yang meningkatkan bisnis restoran dan Kafe konvensional. Kami melayani infrastruktur dapur berkualitas tinggi di Lokasi terbaik di kota untuk pengiriman F&B. Selain itu, Kitchen Hub tidak hanya mendukung pengelolaan fasilitas tetapi juga memiliki tim yang berdedikasi untuk mendukung aktivitas penjualan & pemasaran bagi Food Makers Kitchen Hub membantu Pemilik bisnis F&B untuk memudahkan pendirian bisnis, Fokus pada kualitas makanan dan memaksimalkan keuntungan dengan investasi rendah
Lokasi
Kota Bandung (Dekat West Point Hotel / Bandara Husein Sastranegara)
Deskripsi Pekerjaan
Kami mencari Business Development Executive yang akan bertanggung jawab mengembangkan dan mendorong pertumbuhan Kitchen Hub. Anda akan memiliki dampak dalam mengembangkan dapur sebagai situs pilihan untuk Pemilik bisnis F&B dan bersama dengan peluang menarik untuk menumbuhkan & mengarahkan bisnis dapur Cloud kami, mengusulkan rencana dan pekerjaan ekspansi.
Kegiatan Sehari-hari
  • Bangun / Kelola hubungan dengan restoran untuk memenuhi kebutuhan mereka akan sukses sambil menutup kesepakatan dan menghasilkan prospek baru;
  • Secara aktif mencari prospek Penjualan baru melalui Telepon, email, Situs Web, dan SNS);
  • Bekerja dengan sejumlah jalur penjualan B2B dengan efisiensi tinggi (UKM, perusahaan, Pemerintah, dll.);
  • Mempresentasikan promosi penjualan yang disesuaikan kepada pelanggan termasuk pengetahuan pasar, pemahaman tinggi tentang RTB (alasan untuk percaya) dengan keterampilan persuasi tingkat lanjut;
  • Bepergian ke situs dalam wilayah penjualan untuk membangun hubungan dan menyampaikan promosi;
  • Berkomunikasi dan bekerja dengan tim dan departemen untuk meningkatkan efisiensi operasional, dan kinerja penjualan sehingga mitra dapat menerima layanan berkualitas tinggi;
Persyaratan
  • Minimal mempunyai gelar sarjana S1 di semua jurusan;
  • Memiliki pengalaman minimal 1 tahun di bidang terkait
  • Energetik dan mempunyai semangat dalam bisnis dan kemitraan;
  • Keterampilan komunikasi verbal dan tertulis yang sangat baik;
  • Pembelajar mandiri yang termotivasi dan pemula;
  • Terorganisir dan berorientasi pada detail;
  • Team Player yang percaya diri dan dapat berkolaborasi.
Nilai Pengalaman Tambahan
  • memiliki pengetahuan dan pengalaman dalam industri real estate, F&B atau teknologi;
  • Anda memiliki pengetahuan dan pengalaman dalam merencanakan strategi penjualan, pengembangan bisnis;
  • Pengalaman bekerja di lingkungan start-up yang serba cepat;
  • Pengalaman menggunakan Salesforce sebagai CRM.

  • At least 2 Year(s) of working experience in Tax Accountant is required for this position.
  • Proficient in Tax, PPH, PPN, SPT
  • Good understanding of MS Office and accounting software.
  • In-depth knowledge of accounting and bookkeeping processes.
  • Strong attention to detail with excellent analytical skills.
  • Outstanding written and verbal communication skills.
Job Duties:
  • Prepare tax returns, payments, necessary paperwork, and reports.
  • Assess and research difficult tax issues to identify solutions.
  • Manage and maintain the company’s tax database.
  • Determine tax savings and recommend strategies to improve profits.
  • Ensure you comply with regulations by forwarding required information to federal, state, and local authorities.
  • Offer support and guidance during audits.
  • Evaluate tax regulations and suggest policies that diminish tax burden.
  • Keep track of industry trends and changes related to taxes.
  • Prepare accurate quarterly and annual tax reports.

company.name: PT Shafira Laras Persada
company.description:
Through idealism and creativity, SHAFIRA has grown from a small muslim fashion studio into what it is now. Its name was inspired by the word “SHAF”, that does not only mean a line, but also indicates a properly structured organization.Pioneered by Feny Mustafa at Salman Mosque ITB on 8 January 1989, SHAFIRA has turned into a major company with 24 showrooms in 15 major cities across Indonesia.
With more than 30.000 active members spread across Indonesia and other countries, SHAFIRA has tried to build a good and healthy relationship with its members through activities such as health training, fashion consultation, jilbab classes and other regular member activities. In addition to the members of SHAFIRA, the company would not have been as succesful without the help and support of the mass media. SHAFIRA relatef publications have supported the company, and made it well known in public. Along with its development, Shafira’s consistency in one of the business mission that is giving benefits for others in Corporate Social Responsibility program is well managed by Shafira Foundations.
Through elegant and exclusive designs, SHAFIRA has tried its best to accommodate the needs of both men and women alike. now, at 24th years ols, SHAFIRA is trying to bring a new wave of style, with “total look” as the concept. SHAFIRA understands that attire is an important aspect of someone’s life, and tries to incorporate both design and comfort into its line of apparel. The combination of simple and elegant design in addition high quality fabric has allowed SHAFIRA to create something for every season, be it formal, or casual. Various accessories and jilbabs that are designed to harmonize with the chosen outfits are also available.

company.name: PT Bank Nationalnobu Tbk
company.description:
PT Bank Nationalnobu Tbk (NobuBank) adalah bank yang telah berdiri lebih dari 20 tahun di industri perbankan Indonesia yang kini hadir dengan konsep dan tampilan yang baru sebagai wujud dari diperbaruinya visi, misi dan strategi Perseroan.
Dengan semangat untuk lebih mampu memberikan kontribusi riil pada perekonomian di tanah air, NobuBank berusaha menciptakan nilai tambah bagi masyarakat luas melalui jasa intermediasi perbankan yang menjadi kompetensi inti yang dimiliki Perseroan. Melalui langkah-langkah strategis yang dilakukan, Perseroan ingin mempertajam kompetensi tersebut khususnya dalam bidangcommercial dan consumer banking dengan memilih segmentasi pasar pada usaha kecil dan menengah yang terbukti telah menjadi fondasi yang kuat dalam perekonomian Indonesia.
Dengan integritas yang tinggi, Perseroan ingin memperkuat dan memperluas jaringan kemitraan melalui pelayanan yang prima dan pembukaan kantor cabang di berbagai lokasi strategis di seluruh wilayah Indonesia.
Di masa datang, kepercayaan dari nasabah dan mitra bisnis akan mampu membawa Perseroan pada posisi terhormat di dalam dunia perbankan khususnya dalam hal asset, pangsa pasar, dan keluasan jaringan, tidak hanya dalam perspektif lokal namun juga dari sudut pandang regional dan global. Dengan tujuan untuk memperkuat struktur permodalan, maka Perseroan telah melakukan Penawaran Umum Perdana Saham (IPO) dan pada tanggal 20 Mei 2013 secara resmi telah mencatatkan diri di Bursa efek Indonesia dengan kode saham “NOBU”. Hal ini sekaligus menjadi momentum bagi Perseroan untuk mengajak masyarakat luas turut berpartisipasi dalam pengembangan Perseroan di masa datang.

title: Customer Business Development
description:
Job Description
  • This is a combination of sales (80%) and client management (20%)
  • Achieve agreed upon sales targets and outcomes within schedule
  • You will present, promote and sell employment opportunities of our client to existing and prospective candidates
  • Everyday you will identify and approach prospective candidates, lead generation, and conversion through cold calling
  • You will work closely with our clients to deliver the right candidates for them and maintain positive business relationship
  • Actively involve in tech community/tech ecosystem by creating and attending tech events
  • Expedite the resolution of problems and complaints to maximize satisfaction
  • There will be some administrative tasks involved.
Job Requirement
  • Must have minimum of 1.5 years of working experience in B2C or B2B sales.
  • Fresh graduate with proven track record of organization experience and achievements are welcome to apply.
  • Highly motivated and target driven with a proven track record in sales
  • Must have a “hunter mentality“, willing to work hard and work smart (sometimes late nights/on weekend if necessary)
  • Excellent selling, communication and negotiation skills
  • Prioritizing, time management and organizational skills
  • Relationship management skills and openness to feedback
  • Have a growth mindset
  • Agile and quick to adapt in a VUCA environment
  • Candidate must possess at least a Bachelor’s Degree, any field.
  • Required language(s): English (minimum TOEFL 500/IELTS 6 or equivalent), and Bahasa Indonesia
  • Work location: Jakarta/Bandung/Yogyakarta (will work remotely temporarily due to Covid19)
This is not for you, if you:
  • are #teamrebahan
  • are not ambitious and competitive
  • hate target/are not a number driven
  • Get stressed out/panic easily
  • generally dislike interacting with people (you will at least talk with 15 people per day on the phone)
  • are awkward when communicating with people
  • don’t have a strong work ethic and integrity
  • are not open-minded
  • are not good at business emailing and business messaging
  • are a fans of work life balance instead of work life integration

title: ReactJS Programmer
description:
RESPONSIBILITIES  
  • Develop web application using React JS and Firebase Platform

  • Write robust code to be used by millions of users
  • Work as part of a team, but with plenty of opportunity to take responsibility on an individual level

ADMINISTRATIVE REQUIREMENTS 
  • Able to work full-time at Agate HQ (Bandung, Indonesia)
REQUIREMENTS

  • Self motivated and fast learner

company.name: PT Agate International
company.description:
Agate is an award-winning game developer based in Bandung, Indonesia.
It was founded in April 2009 by 18 passionate and ‘crazy’ founders. We focus on crafting high quality entertainment game as well as delivering serious games for corporate and brand via training games, advertising games, and education games.

Started from a humble premise of fun.
Agate has produced over 200 games and it has been played by over 5 million people from Indonesia and the world. Agate is powered by 100 talented and spirited crews on their mission to make the world a better place for everyone.

Playing at work and working to play.
Work hard, play hard. That’s the usual thing in our workplace. Agate is a great place to work. You can work, have fun, and play games from arcade to board game in our workplace. We also provide many great books to develop our crew’s skill and broaden their knowledge.

Explore the game industry with us.
Not just making games, Agate always wanted to create better ecosystem for local game industry. We have established the Agate Academy to provide courses materials, and curriculum about game development. we also have partnered up with 10 universities to help us develop young and fresh talents who are interested in the game industry.

company.name: PT. Bank Mega, Tbk
company.description:
Berawal dari sebuah usaha milik keluarga bernama PT. Bank Karman yang didirikan pada tahun 1969 dan berkedudukan di Surabaya, selanjutnya pada tahun 1992 berubah nama menjadi PT. Mega Bank dan melakukan relokasi Kantor Pusat ke Jakarta.

Seiring dengan perkembangannya PT. Mega Bank pada tahun 1996 diambil alih oleh PARA GROUP (PT. Para Global Investindo dan PT. Para Rekan Investama). Untuk lebih meningkatkan citra PT. Mega Bank, pada bulan Juni 1997 melakukan perubahan logo dengan tujuan bahwa sebagai lembaga keuangan kepercayaan masyarakat, akan lebih mudah dikenal melalui logo perusahaan yang baru tersebut. Pada tahun 2000 dilakukan perubahan nama dari PT. Mega Bank menjadi PT. Bank Mega.

Dalam rangka memperkuat struktur permodalan maka pada tahun yang sama PT. Bank Mega melaksanakan Initial Public Offering dan listed di BEJ maupun BES. Dengan demikian sebagian saham PT. Bank Mega dimiliki oleh publik dan berubah namanya menjadi PT. Bank Mega Tbk.

Pada saat krisis ekonomi, Bank Mega mencuat sebagai salah satu bank yang tidak terpengaruh oleh krisis dan tumbuh terus tanpa bantuan pemerintah bersama-sama dengan Citibank, Deutche Bank dan HSBC.
PT. Bank Mega Tbk. dengan semboyan "To Be Pride of The Nation" tumbuh dengan pesat dan terkendali serta menjadi lembaga keuangan ternama yang mampu disejajarkan dengan bank-bank terkemuka di Asia Pasifik dan telah mendapatkan berbagai penghargaan dan prestasi baik di tingkat nasional, regional maupun internasional. Dalam upaya mewujudkan kinerja sesuai dengan nama yang disandangnya, PT. Bank Mega Tbk. berpegang pada azas profesionalisme, keterbukaan dan kehati-hatian dengan struktur permodalan yang kuat serta produk dan fasilitas perbankan terkini.
Pada tahun 2013 Bank Mega memperkenalkan identitas baru yang terdiri dari logo dan simbol grafis huruf “M” yang merefleksikan positioning dan acuan pertumbuhan yang baru bagi perusahaan.
Warna-warna hangat merupakan luapan energi dari logo baru Bank Mega yang energik dan solusi keuangan yang kompherensif kepada pelanggan. Warna kuning menggambarkan kecerdasan dan harapan. Warna abu-abu menggambarkan sistem yang canggih. Warna orange menggambarkan semangat dan optimisme, menunjukkan setiap insan Bank Mega selalu melihat sudut pandang positif atas tiap kejadian dan selalu mengupayakan hasil akhir yang terbaik. Identitas baru ini juga merefleksikan ambisi Bank Mega untuk mewujudkan masyarakat dan bangsa Indonesia yang maju dan sejahtera, dengan menyediakan berbagai solusi keuangan yang spesifik, sesuai kebutuhan sesuai nasabah secara lengkap dan menyeluruh, dikelola secara profesional dengan technologi berkelas dunia dan kontrol kualitas yang terjaga baik, yang memungkinkan setiap individu, keluarga, dan bisnis nasabah berada pada jalur tercepat dalam mencapai keberhasilan di bidang keuangan.

title: Software Engineer
description:
Have a seat with us!
The Company:
Geekseat has combined experiences more than 10 years in IT Industry. We value Work-Life Balance. You will work in fun environment with our awesome software engineering team at Bali or Bandung.
The Position:
Software Engineer  
  • Fluent with at least one of these programming languages: .NET, Java
  • Experienced in using MVC Framework
  • Experienced with Modern JavaScript Frameworks (Vue.js, ReactJS, or AngularJS)
  • Familiar with SQL or NoSQL
  • Familiar with Git
  • Strong in Object-Oriented Programming or Functional Concept.
Nice to have
  • Deep experience or interest in Code Refactoring and Software Design Pattern.
  • Deep knowledge of Software Process.
  • Experienced in Agile Development Methodologies.
  • Familiar with TDD or BDD.
How to apply
Please send your application through JobStreet or our website: geekseat.com.au/career

company.name: Geekseat
company.description:
About Geekseat
Geekseat is an Australian owned and managed IT Consultant company. Our software developers are all employees of Geekseat and are located in our development centres in Indonesia.
Our goal is to be the premier software company for both client and employee engagement. By providing fantastic customer service, on-time delivery, and smart and innovative solutions. Our smart and innovative solutions are provided by smart, keen, engaged employees, who have the opportunity to use their skills to their full capacity, and develop new skills in the process.
Geekseat is the perfect development partner for any organization looking to externally resource or extend their current development team, In particular:
- Software Houses
- IT Departments
- Digital Marketing Agencies
In Geekseat, in addition to your technical skills, your attitude will also determine your career. You not only need high individual skills, but you also need to be willing to help your fellow team members when they need it.

company.name: PT Indovisual Presentatama
company.description:
Kami menghimbau agar Anda berhati-hati saat melamar  pekerjaan dengan selalu memastikan iklan lowongan tersebut sesuai dengan profil perusahaannya.
Waspadalah jika Anda menemukan hal-hal di bawah ini :
  • PT Indovisual Presentatama tidak pernah memungut biaya apapun dalam proses rekrutmen.
  • PT Indovisual Presentatama tidak pernah bekerja sama dengan travel agent / biro perjalanan tertentu dalam proses  rekrutmen.
  • Apabila Anda diminta untuk membayar sejumlah uang dalam bentuk pembayaran tiket pesawat dan hotel atau  akomodasi lainnya agar diabaikan.
  • Apabila ada Panggilan wawancara di lokasi yang tidak sesuai dengan iklan yang tertera pada iklan lowongan.
  • Jangan memberikan data pribadi atau data keuangan Anda kepada siapapun.
============================================================================
PT. Indovisual Presentatama telah berdiri selama 18 tahun lebih sampai dengan sekarang. Didirikan pada tahun 1999, profil dari PT. Indovisual Presentatama adalah sebagai perusahaan yang menyediakan referensi untuk model sukses dan mengesankan dari segi audio visual perusahaan di Indonesia. Indovisual memulai bisnis sebagai sebuah perusahaan dengan tenaga kerja hanya dua karyawan, namun kini PT. Indovisual Presentatama telah menjadi pemain industri terbesar dan bereputasi di industri audio visual. Dengan anda bermitra dengan Indovisual, Anda akan yakin bahwa segala pertanyaan Anda, kebutuhan atau bahkan permintaan anda akan dijawab oleh seorang individu yang tahu Anda dan organisasi Anda secara tangan pertama. Dilengkapi dengan sertifikasi spesialis teknis dan dukungan fasilitas dan off-situs yang komprehensif, tim kami yang selalu ada setiap kali Anda memerlukan kami.

title: Guru Privat Al-Quran
description:
Requirements
  • Berusia maksimal 35 tahun.
  • Minimal lulusan SLTA.
  • Setidaknya memiliki 1 tahun pengalaman mengajar Al-Qur'an. 
  • Mampu menggunakan Bahasa Inggris aktif.
  • Mampu menangani anak usia 2 sampai 15 tahun.
  • Memiliki pemahaman dan pengaplikasian yang baik dalam Tajwid dan Tahsin.
  • Memahami dasar-dasar agama dengan baik.
  • Diutamakan lulusan pesantren.
  • Tidak terdaftar dalam organisasi yang dilarang pemerintah Republik Indonesia.
  • Memiliki kendaraan pribadi dan SIM.
  • Berdomisili di Bandung
Job Responsibilities
  • Travel to students' homes to conduct tutoring sessions.
  • Schedule tutoring appointments with students or their parents.
  • Always give lessons to the highest standards of Quran and Religious Education teaching.
  • Research or recommend textbooks, equipment, or other learning materials to complement tutoring.
  • Conduct tutoring sessions according to ALIF’s curriculum as well as standard operating procedures (SOP).
  • Participate in training and development sessions to improve tutoring practices or learn new tutoring techniques.
  • Monitor student performance or assist students in academic or non-academic environments.
  • Provide feedback to students using positive reinforcement techniques to encourage, motivate, or build confidence in students.
  • Prepare lessons in advance and ready all equipment before tutoring session begin.

company.name: ALIF IQRA
company.description:
Alif Iqra merupakan Platform aplikasi yang dikelola oleh PT. Sahabat Alif Indonesia bertujuan untuk mempertemukan murid dan guru mengaji yang kompeten dan berpengalaman. Berawal dari program home privat Alif School yang berjalan dengan sistem offline sejak 2016, permintaan privat di beberapa daerah semakin meningkat. Sehingga kami mulai merintis Alif Iqra di akhir tahun 2018 untuk memudahkan orang tua menemukan guru mengaji yang sesuai kebutuhannya dengan akses teknologi melalui sistem aplikasi.
Dengan keunggulan system pembayaran yang mudah serta laporan perkembangan anak setiap pertemuan secara langsung, Alif Iqra hadir untuk memudahkan pencarian guru mengaji dari mana pun dan kapan pun.
Hingga saat ini, Alif Iqra sudah hadir di kota-kota besar seluruh Indonesia antara lain: Jabodetabek, Bandung, Cirebon, Yogyakarta, Surabaya, Malang, Pontianak, Pekanbaru, Makassar, Medan, Denpasar, Palembang dan Balikpapan. ALIF (Alquran Learning and Islamic Foundation) sendiri merupakan lembaga pembelajaran Al-Quran dan Pembelajaran Islam (Islamic Studies) bagi anak-anak (3-9), Remaja (10-17), dan Dewasa (18+) dengan strategi pembelajaran Fun learning, Bilingual, dan Intensive.
Kami mengkombinasikan materi pembelajaran klasik dengan media kreatif yang akrab dengan anak-anak seperti tracing, colouring, painting, game-learning, video-learning, crafting, dan story telling. Materi tersebut kami sampaikan secara Bilingual (pembiasaan penggunaan Bahasa Inggris dan Arab dasar).
Follow our social media:
https://www.instagram.com/alifiqra/
https://www.facebook.com/alifiqraIndonesia

company.name: PT Agate International
company.description:
Agate is an award-winning game developer based in Bandung, Indonesia.
It was founded in April 2009 by 18 passionate and ‘crazy’ founders. We focus on crafting high quality entertainment game as well as delivering serious games for corporate and brand via training games, advertising games, and education games.

Started from a humble premise of fun.
Agate has produced over 200 games and it has been played by over 5 million people from Indonesia and the world. Agate is powered by 100 talented and spirited crews on their mission to make the world a better place for everyone.

Playing at work and working to play.
Work hard, play hard. That’s the usual thing in our workplace. Agate is a great place to work. You can work, have fun, and play games from arcade to board game in our workplace. We also provide many great books to develop our crew’s skill and broaden their knowledge.

Explore the game industry with us.
Not just making games, Agate always wanted to create better ecosystem for local game industry. We have established the Agate Academy to provide courses materials, and curriculum about game development. we also have partnered up with 10 universities to help us develop young and fresh talents who are interested in the game industry.

title: C++ Developers
description:
Build your Career with Mitrais!
We know that many C++ developers are stuck in jobs where they are supporting and enhancing legacy systems.  
Are you the C++ Developer we are looking for?
What will you be doing? 
  • Processing of analytics data 
  • Calling APIs to integrate with existing systems and hardware.

  • Analyzing payment transactions 
  • Optimizing payment environment
What about you ? 
  • Very strong C++ experience including the latest language features from C++ 11 and above
  • Understanding of the C++ standard namespace std::  features such as std::vector, std::set and std::for_each
  • Processing of streams in C++   
  • API Integration in C++
  • Understanding of Object-Oriented Principles eg SOLID, polymorphism, inheritance
  • Understanding of the application of Design Patterns
  • Code Refactoring 
  • Test Driven Development

And if you have exposure to any of the following then that will be a big plus:

  • Agile / SCRUM
  • Front end development (HTML5, CSS3, SPA)

  • MsSQL/PostgreSQL/ MySQL/ MongoDB

What can Mitrais offer you?
  • A CAREER, not a JOB!
  • Competitive salary
  • Excellent working environment, with the possibility to relocate to our regional offices and working remotely
  • Free English classes, English is our working language
  • Lots of opportunities to improve your competencies on our technical boot camps, certification programs and soft skills training courses?
  • Hackathons with big prizes!?
  • Take a break with Happy Hours, Billiard Tables, gaming rooms and free drinks and snacks to keep you 100% effective? 
Learn about life at Mitrais? from our current team by searching #mitraislife on Facebook or LinkedIn.
 
To Apply…? 
Simply click the apply button, complete the form and upload your latest CV in English! What are you waiting for?

company.name: PT Suparma Tbk
company.description:
PT Suparma Tbk was established in 1976 on a site of five (5) hectares land in Surabaya, Indonesia and employed approximately 100 people. The first paper was rolled out in 1978 using a 7,000 ton per year paper machine.
Responding to the growing paper demand in the country, in 1984 the company decided to roll out her first expansion program by adding there (3) units of Paper Machine and raised her total production capacity to 51,000 ton per year.
In 1992, the company further invested another two (2) units of Paper Machine with capacity of 99,000 tons p.a. to accommodate the strong increase of paper demand in the market in tandem with the Indonesian government industrialization program.
In line with globalization era, PT Suparma Tbk took a profound move in becoming a public company and listed in Jakarta Stock Exchange in 1994.
Today, located on a land of twenty one (21) hectares, PT Suparma Tbk operates 6 units of Paper Machine with a total combined capacity of 150,000 tons p.a. and supported by approximately 1,500 delegated employees.
Holding the motto of 'Continues Improvement', PT Suparma Tbk actively serves both domestic and international market with high quality products, services and meeting the customer expectations.

company.name: PT Wicaksana Overseas International,Tbk
company.description:
PENGUMUMAN :
  • PT Wicaksana Overseas International, Tbk. tidak pernah memungut biaya apapun dalam proses rekrutmen.
  • PT Wicaksana Overseas International, Tbk. tidak pernah bekerja sama dengan travel agent / biro perjalanan tertentu dalam proses rekrutmen.
  • Apabila Anda diminta untuk membayar sejumlah uang dalam bentuk pembayaran tiket pesawat dan hotel atau akomodasi lainnya agar diabaikan.
  • Jangan memberikan data pribadi atau data keuangan Anda kepada siapapun.
  • Jika membutuhkan klarifikasi lebih lanjut dapat langsung menghubungi PT Wicaksana Overseas International, Tbk.
About PT. Wicaksana Overseas International, Tbk.
Wicaksana was established in 1973, distributing fast moving consumer goods such as instant noodles, snacks, beverages, personal care and also pharmaceutical products. As the underlying goal of any business is to drive growth, DKSH’s acquisition of the majority of PT Wicaksana’s shares in 2017 has provided the basis for the expansion of Wicaksana’s market position. Leveraging DKSH’s long-standing experience, PT Wicaksana successfully increased its distribution centers and channels as well as its marketing and sales capabilities. After being part of DKSH for two years, Wicaksana is delighted to introduce its new logo in line with DKSH’s look and feel, referencing the Fantree plant.
With a strategy for growth and in-depth knowledge gathered in specialized Business Units, Wicaksana and DKSH focus on consistently delivering results. Two years after the acquisition, Wicaksana has been growing rapidly ever since. Wicaksana operates across Indonesia’s major cities and has more than 1,000 employees. The acquisition has helped build trust and has secured big partnerships with both multinational and local companies. The client portfolio includes names, such as Mars, Unilever Asia or Coca Cola Distribution Indonesia and the STT company, but also Tokopedia, as a local giant in the e-commerce sector.
To distribute all its clients’ products, Wicaksana operates across all major cities in Indonesia. Wicaksana recorded net sales of IDR 1,85 Trillion in 2019.

title: Warehouse Manager (West Java)
description:
Why Join Us?
Shipper is on a mission to invent a new standard of online shipping in Indonesia. We have assembled the largest asset-light delivery network to make shipping simple. reliable, and cost competitive. With over 17,000 islands, 2,500 logistics providers, and a fast growing e-commerce market, Indonesia is one of the most challenging markets to build a great online shipping experience and we are primed to be part of the solution. We are privileged to have some of the best global investors including Lightspeed, Y Combinator, and others. We are looking for a passionate and outstanding individuals to join our team.
What will you do:
  • Supervise the activities of workers engaged in receiving, storing, testing, and shipping products or materials.
  • Plan, develop, or implement warehouse safety and security programs and activities.
  • Inspect physical conditions of warehouses, vehicle fleets, or equipment and order testing, maintenance, repairs, or replacements.
  • Respond to customers' or shippers' questions and complaints regarding storage and distribution services.
  • Develop and document standard and emergency operating procedures for receiving, handling, storing, shipping, or salvaging products or materials.
  • Monitor inventory levels of products or materials in warehouses.
  • Develop storage and distribution models that include factors such as warehouse locations, customer locations, or available transportation modes to maximize operational efficiency or sustainability.
  • Completes warehouse operational requirements by scheduling and assigning employees; following up on work results.
  • Maintains warehouse staff job results by coaching, counseling, and disciplining employees; planning, monitoring, and appraising job results.
  • Controls inventory levels by conducting physical counts; reconciling with data storage system.
  • Maintains physical condition of warehouse by planning and implementing new design layouts; inspecting equipment; issuing work orders for repair and requisitions for replacement.
What are the requirements:
  • Candidate must possess at least Bachelor Degree in any field.
  • At least 5 years of relevant experience in logistics.
  • Able to work in fast-paced environment.
  • Able to build strong working relationships between co-workers.
  • Have superior communication skills.
  • Positive attitude, team player, adaptable, resourceful and able to work independently
  • Preferably Manager/Assistant Manager specialized in Logistics/Supply Chain or equivalent.
  • Willing to work on a contract base
  • Willing to be placed in Bandung, Cikampek, Cirebon, Sukabumi, or Tasikmalaya
  • The candidate who can join as soon as possible will be prioritized

title: Continuous Improvement Associate
description:
Duties and Responsibilities
  • Analyze Business Processes
    • Before continuous improvement associates can drive change across the organization, they first analyze existing business processes using various methods. This allows them to find opportunities for improvement as well as losses, which they troubleshoot further to determine root causes.
  • Develop Strategies
    • Continuous improvement associates act as internal consultants, developing short- and long-term strategies for the organization and incorporating proven practices. Their goal is to facilitate progress and reduce costs, both in terms of sales and workflow inefficiencies.
  • Monitor Progress
    • A crucial aspect of the continuous improvement methodology is monitoring progress in order to check if changes yield desirable results. Continuous improvement associates establish measurable standards at the start of a project and then compare actual project results against these, regularly generating detailed update reports for management.
Requirements:
  • Bachelor’s degree in Industrial Engineering or Mathematics or Accounting or Information System, or a related field with minimum GPA 3.50 from a reputable university. Fresh graduates are welcome to apply.
  • Technical expertise – it’s essential for continuous improvement associates to have a firm understanding of process improvement techniques and experience applying these if they are to make organizational changes
  • Organization skills – continuous improvement associates spearhead both the planning and implementation stages of multiple projects, so they must be organized and committed to meeting deadlines
  • Leadership skills – continuous improvement associates are coaches and company game-changers, inspiring other team members to give their best effort and setting the direction for many initiatives
  • Analytical thinking – continuous improvement associates critically evaluate individual processes and projects, then synthesize their insights to arrive at a summary of overall organizational status
  • Communication skills – being able to speak, listen, and write well is important, as continuous improvement associates often hold presentations, facilitate meetings and trainings, and create reports

company.name: PT Combiphar
company.description:
Kami menghimbau agar Anda berhati-hati saat melamar  pekerjaan dengan selalu memastikan iklan lowongan tersebut sesuai dengan profil perusahaannya. 
Waspadalah jika Anda menemukan hal-hal di bawah ini :
• PT Combiphar tidak pernah memungut biaya apapun dalam proses rekrutmen.
• PT Combiphar tidak pernah bekerja sama dengan travel agent / biro perjalanan tertentu dalam proses  rekrutmen.
• Apabila Anda diminta untuk membayar sejumlah uang dalam bentuk pembayaran tiket pesawat dan hotel atau  akomodasi lainnya agar diabaikan.
• Apabila ada Panggilan wawancara di lokasi yang tidak sesuai dengan iklan yang tertera pada iklan lowongan.
• Jangan memberikan data pribadi atau data keuangan Anda kepada siapapun.
Combiphar was founded in 1971 as a home industry in Bandung, West Java producing antibiotics, analgesics and the legendary OBH Combi cough syrup. In 1983, a larger manufacturing facility was established in Padalarang, West Java to support its growth. 
In 1985, two important figures in the development of the pharmaceutical industry in Indonesia, DR. Biantoro Wanandi - Doctor of Natural Sciences from Swiss Federal Institute of Technology in Zurich Switzerland who also served as Chief, Drug Policies and Management Unit at the World Health Organization (WHO) and Bapak Hamadi Widjaja - a graduate from INSEAD Fountainebleau in France, started a new era in Combiphar with one huge vision: to provide better access to the public through quality medicine. Through their leadership, Combiphar continued to grow and expand through a focused strategy and keen ability to take advantage of the opportunities even during the economic turbulence, a period which marked a significant turning point particularly in the history of OBH Combi’s nation-wide growth.
In response to Company’s increasingly rapid growth potential, Combiphar’s new vision “Championing a Healthy Tomorrow” has given birth to numerous business expansion opportunities outside of its main focus in prescription and over-the-counter categories, allowing the company to enter new business growth opportunities in nutrition and bio-research. 
Through the years, Combiphar has successfully established cooperation with international pharmaceutical companies from 18 countries across the globe, and today, is a trusted partner for these multi-national companies through licensing agreement and joint-venture. Through these partnerships, Combiphar undergoes regular quality control audits and is routinely equipped with the newest training and skills from its international counterparts, further strengthening its foundation in prioritizing the highest in quality.

company.name: PT Adira Dinamika Multi Finance Tbk
company.description:
PT Adira Dinamika Multi Finance Tbk atau Adira Finance (Perusahaan) merupakan perusahaan yang bergerak di sektor pembiayaan konsumen yang melayani berbagai jenis pendanaan mulai dari berbagai merek sepeda motor dan mobil, baik baru maupun bekas, hingga pendanaan multiguna yang sesuai dengan kebutuhan masyarakat.
Berdiri pada tahun 1990 dan mulai beroperasi pada tahun 1991, Adira Finance telah berkomitmen sejak awal untuk menjadi perusahaan terbaik dan terkemuka di sektor pembiayaan. Lebih dari itu, Adira Finance senantiasa berupaya untuk memberikan kontribusi kepada bangsa dan negara Indonesia dengan misi yang berujung pada peningkatan kesejahteraan masyarakat melalui pemberdayaan komunitas.
Dengan mengoperasikan lebih dari 600 jaringan usaha di seluruh Indonesia dan mempekerjakan lebih dari 18.000 karyawan untuk melayani lebih dari 3 juta konsumen beserta rekan usaha, Adira Finance saat ini telah berdiri tegak sebagai perusahaan pembiayaan konsumen yang terkemuka dan terpercaya.

company.name: RGF HR Agent Indonesia
company.description:
Kami menghimbau agar Anda berhati-hati saat melamar  pekerjaan dengan selalu memastikan iklan lowongan tersebut sesuai dengan profil perusahaannya.

Waspadalah jika Anda menemukan hal-hal di bawah ini :
  • RGF HR Agent Indonesia tidak pernah memungut biaya apapun dalam proses rekrutmen
  • RGF HR Agent Indonesia tidak pernah bekerja sama dengan travel agent / biro perjalanan tertentu dalam proses  rekrutmen.
  • Apabila Anda diminta untuk membayar sejumlah uang dalam bentuk pembayaran tiket pesawat dan hotel atau  akomodasi lainnya agar diabaikan.
  • Apabila ada Panggilan wawancara di lokasi yang tidak sesuai dengan iklan yang tertera pada iklan lowongan.
  • Jangan memberikan data pribadi atau data keuangan Anda kepada siapapun.
__________________________________________________________________________________
RGF is stands for RECRUIT GLOBAL  FAMILY, a global brand of Japan’s largest recruiting and information service company, Recruit Holdings co., Ltd.
We created this brand of our commitment to take on a new challenge to leverage on Recruit Group’s more over 50 years of industry experience and business network in Japan, to provide new opportunities to our clients across the region.
RGF HR AGENT takes charge of RGF’s business entity in general recruitment services. We provide total human resource services to clients at every stage of staff placement, such as evaluation, remuneration, and staff training. At the same time, we assist job-seekers in various ways to find the right job according to their individual preferences and experiences. Besides our services to assist full time staff recruitment, we also offer a range of support services for RPO (Recruitment Process Outsourcing) and contract base/temporary recruitment needs.
Our Company’s status as the Japan #1 market share holder in human resource, temporary staffing, and job advertisement field makes it possible for us to provide high quality total human resource management services not only in Japan but across the region.
We just open our RGF HR AGENT Brand in Indonesia on 1st May, 2013 and will continue and expand the business for the future.

title: Front End Developer
description:
FRONT END DEVELOPER - IMMEDIATE START
 
Our client is a tech startup founded nine years ago in Europe and expanded its operations into Indonesia six years ago.
 
Their service predominantly focuses on the health and well-being of individuals. Their modules, personalised feedback and 24/7 coaching service through the use of web and mobile applications have helped thousands of individuals that avail their services.
 
This is a full-time position, office-based and the work hours are Monday to Friday (9am-6pm) with 1-hour lunch break.
 
YOUR RESPONSIBILITIES WILL INCLUDE
  • Focus on the company’s web and mobile applications by providing elegant front-end solutions.
  • Troubleshoot, debug and resolve production issues.
  • Collaborate with the Product Manager, the Head of Engineering and other software engineers to deliver a solid product.
  • Deliver good quality code in a reasonable timeline.
  • Stay up-to-date with the latest design, UI trend and emerging front-end technologies.
WHAT YOU NEED TO SUCCEED
  • At least 3+ years of software development experience
  • At least 3 years of experience in Javascript, React.js and Typescript
  • Bilingual: Bahasa Indonesia and proficiency in English is required
  • A team player and strong ability to work well in a team environment
  • Strong attention to detail
  • Possess strong debugging skills
WHAT IS ON OFFER
  • Very competitive salary package
  • Complete BPJS
  • THR
  • Private health insurance after the probationary period
  • Ongoing training and development eg. seminars, courses etc
  • Paid annual leave (12 days per year)
  • Company laptop (MacBook)
  • Company lunches and different team outings and events
  • Be 1 of 4 new employees to visit the company’s office in Europe (once a year)
 
If you are interested in this role or similar roles, please apply today as we will be conducting interviews as soon as possible. Please submit your CVs in English and PDF format and only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

Please also follow our Emerhub Talent Solutions Linkedin page for more updates.

company.name: PT Temprina Media Grafika
company.description:
PT Temprina Media Grafika adalah percetakan dalam bidang Web Rotary Offset Printing, Sheetfed Printing dan Finishing yang menghasilkan produk koran, tabloid, majalah, buku dan produk media cetak lainnya. PT Temprina Media Grafika didukung oleh SDM berkualitas yang tersebar di wilayah Surabaya (Karah Agung, Graha Pena, dan Sumengko), Bekasi, Cengkareng, Surakarta, Semarang, Nganjuk, Jember, dan Denpasar mulai dari tingkat Direksi, Operasional Manager, Manager, Kepala Seksi, Kepala Divisi, Kepala Regu, Wakil Kepala Regu, dan staff pelaksana serta operator.
Lahirnya PT Temprina Media Grafika yang beralamat di Jl. Karah Agung No. 45, Surabaya tidak bisa dilepaskan dari PT Jawa Pos. Perkembangan PT Jawa Pos yang semakin pesat perlu didukung oleh layanan percetakan yang harus mampu mendukung aspek mutu atau kualitas, ketepatan waktu, dan jumlah sesuai yang diminta. Untuk itu bagian percetakan yang awal mulanya merupakan bagian dari departemen produksi PT Jawa Pos kemudian dipisahkan menjadi perusahaan berbadan hukum sendiri dengan Akta Pendirian Perusahaan tertanggal 29 Nopember 1996.
Sejak tahun 2002 Temprina mulai memantapkan diri sebagai salah satu perusahaan percetakan media cetak terbesar di Indonesia. Bidang kegiatan utama Temprina adalah percetakan dalam bidang Web Rotary Offset Printing, Sheetfed Printing dan finishing yang menghasilkan produk koran, tabloid, majalah, buku dan produk media cetak lainnya. Seiring dengan tuntutan peningkatan kualitas produk dan layanan yang prima maka Temprina telah menggunakan teknologi grafika terkini seperti yang terdapat pada mesin-mesin cetak yang berteknologi tinggi serta mesin-mesin pendukung proses produksi seperti Computer To Plate (CTP). Selain itu Temprina juga didukung oleh teknologi Sistem Cetak Jarak Jauh (SCJJ) yang sudah menjangkau di hampir seluruh kota-kota besar Indonesia.
Di samping mesin dan teknologi, Temprina juga didukung oleh SDM unggul dan berkualitas yang tersebar di wilayah Jawa-Bali meliputi Surabaya, Malang, Bekasi, Cengkareng, Surakarta, Semarang, Nganjuk, Jember, dan Denpasar. Keunggulan Temprina yang lain adalah adanya dukungan pasokan kertas dari pabrik kertas PT Adiprima Suraprinta (Jawa Pos Group) untuk menjaga kontinuitas ketersediaan bahan baku utama percetakan serta dukungan suplai energi listrik dari PT Prima Elektrik Power (Jawa Pos Group) untuk kelancaran operasional sehari-hari dan kelancaran proses produksi di Temprina.

title: Operations and Supply Chain Manager
description:
Your daily routine will be:
  • Implementing the best processes and practices across the Department including formulating strategy, improving performance, procuring material and resources, as well as developing operational policies and procedures.
  • Overseeing and managing company's overall supply chain and logistics strategy and operations in in order to maximize the process efficiency and productivity.
  • Ensuring all legal and regulatory documents are filed, monitoring compliance with laws and regulations.
  • Training, coaching and motivating team member.
  • Overseeing and managing Department’s supply strategy in order to maximize the process efficiency and productivity.
  • Suggesting solutions for process improvements.

You'll enjoy (or survive, depends on the case) if you:

  • Have excellent leadership experience managing at least 5 subordinates.
  • Have outstanding organizational and project management skills.

company.name: PT Multidaya Teknologi Nusantara
company.description:
What We Are
We are the internet of things (IoT) startup for fish/shrimp farming, purely local, based on Bandung, full of action, all passion, no drama, no bullshit 
What We Do
We build a smart feeding solution that can automatically feed the fish, sense the fish’s appetite, and connected to the internet 
Why We Do It
We want to solve the biggest problem from one of the most crucial and fastest-growing industry in the world: aquaculture. We strive to help hundreds of millions of farmers globally by delivering this breakthrough, especially for people at the bottom of the pyramid. eFishery is trying to disrupt aquaculture industry and tackles global challenge in food security, creating real impacts for our mankind.

company.description:
Kami menghimbau agar Anda berhati-hati saat melamar  pekerjaan dengan selalu memastikan iklan lowongan tersebut sesuai dengan profil perusahaannya.
Waspadalah jika Anda menemukan hal-hal di bawah ini :

• PT Transpacific Finance tidak pernah memungut biaya apapun dalam proses rekrutmen.
• PT Transpacific Finance tidak pernah bekerja sama dengan travel agent / biro perjalanan tertentu dalam proses  rekrutmen.

PT Transpacific Finance was established in 1994 with the first name as PT Transpacific Mutual Finance Corporation. After changing the company names for several times, the company changed its name into PT Transpacific Finance in 2006 which has been approved by the Ministry of Finance through the Letter of Decision KEP-032/KM.5/2006.
PT Transpacific Finance is an Independent Finance Company which its primary activity is to provide financial solutions to the customers in the form of leasing financing, factoring financing, and consumer financing for new and used vehicle ownership.
With the support of the new management and a reliable resource, PT Transpacific Finance is always committed to provide financial solutions according to the customer needs by providing a quick process, flexible and professional services.
It is proven from the awards received by the company from Infobank Multifinance Awards for 2013, 2014, and 2017 successively. In addition, an award from Indonesian Financial Services Association (IFSA) as the Best Finance Company 2013 for Total Assets Under Rp 500 Billion Category.
Currently, PT Transpacific Finance focuses in developing business in Jabotabek and Bandung through the office outlets located in Jakarta, Tangerang, Depok, and Bandung. The management is committed to provide the best financial solutions for the customers, but keep prioritizing the principles of prudence and compliance with the regulations. PT Transpacific Finance has been registered and supervised by the Financial Services Authority (OJK).

company.name: PT Adira Dinamika Multi Finance Tbk
company.description:
PT Adira Dinamika Multi Finance Tbk atau Adira Finance (Perusahaan) merupakan perusahaan yang bergerak di sektor pembiayaan konsumen yang melayani berbagai jenis pendanaan mulai dari berbagai merek sepeda motor dan mobil, baik baru maupun bekas, hingga pendanaan multiguna yang sesuai dengan kebutuhan masyarakat.
Berdiri pada tahun 1990 dan mulai beroperasi pada tahun 1991, Adira Finance telah berkomitmen sejak awal untuk menjadi perusahaan terbaik dan terkemuka di sektor pembiayaan. Lebih dari itu, Adira Finance senantiasa berupaya untuk memberikan kontribusi kepada bangsa dan negara Indonesia dengan misi yang berujung pada peningkatan kesejahteraan masyarakat melalui pemberdayaan komunitas.
Dengan mengoperasikan lebih dari 600 jaringan usaha di seluruh Indonesia dan mempekerjakan lebih dari 18.000 karyawan untuk melayani lebih dari 3 juta konsumen beserta rekan usaha, Adira Finance saat ini telah berdiri tegak sebagai perusahaan pembiayaan konsumen yang terkemuka dan terpercaya.

company.name: PT Asuransi Bintang, Tbk
company.description:
PT Asuransi Bintang Tbk. is one of oldest public insurance company, established on March 17th, 1955 by numbers of ex-1945 independence heroes: Bapak Soedarpo Sastrosatomo, Bapak Idham, Bapak Wibowo, Bapak Pang Lay Kim, Bapak Ali Budiarjo, Bapak Roestam Moenaf, Bapak J.R Koesman and Bapak Ismet. While world business competition has become very tight, and globalization effect has entered into whole business sector, PT Asuransi Bintang Tbk. keep standing itself through the insurance market which has celebrated its 60th anniversary in 2015.
Thanks to the experience, when a big flood disaster attacked Jakarta and its surroundings in early 2002, PT Asuransi Bintang Tbk. has handled the massal assurance claim very well within short time. Also in settlement of Interm Payment claim about Terrorism & Sabotage at JW Marriot Hotel, PT Asuransi Bintang Tbk. were doing excellent and within short time the hotel returned to its normal activity. Immediately before the end of 2006, PT Asuransi Bintang Tbk. has done its first Limited General Bidding for gaining capital addition used to increase its capacity to the risk restraint. And then managed to step into Sharia Insurance Business in 2007. Interm Payment claim continously strengthen itself by get focus on the service as well as on the company’s infrastrucuture improvement.
Looking up how assurance market behave now, and later on, PT Asuransi Bintang Tbk. has determined the new mission, to be a leading assurance service provider in margin of profit, by means of adaptation ability, creativity, and technology.
In the course of our change and growth, we are looking for dynamic and energetic people, highly motivated, strong responsibility, talented and committed People who possess strong interpersonal, recpect with others, and trusted with a continuous record of achievements to be a part of our spirit team to develop career at  PT Asuransi Bintang Tbk.

Who are we looking for:

company.name: PT Ninety Nine Dotco
company.description:
Property is the single largest financial decision anyone would make in their lifetime, and, on average, it accounts for over half of the assets of most families. It is how most people accumulate wealth, for their children, for healthcare, for retirement. More importantly, it is where one grow their family and build their career.
99.co’s mission is to use technology, design and data, to help the 99% make the best decision when finding a home.

By providing the largest set of listings in the market, and designing easy beautiful tools and synthesizing data to help property seekers search for, learn about, sieve through and compare thousands of potential options, 99.co help to make that journey reliable, easy and trustworthy.
To put it simply, 99.co mission is to be – Your Way Home.

company.name: PT Welty Indah Perkasa
company.description:
WEALTHY didirikan pada tahun 2006 untuk memenuhi permintaan pasar dengan produk-produk berkualitas dan dapat diandalkan dibidang pemeliharaan aftermarket otomotif di Asia.
Dengan menggabungkan pengetahuan pendiri dan teknologi dari Eropa, kami telah menghasilkan banyak produk andalan dengan kualitas tinggi seperti Magic Spray 9 in 1, Wiper Blade, Wiper Blade Refill, Auto Bulbs, Automatic Transmission Conditioner, Power Steering Conditioner dan banyak produk lainnya dimana setiap orang dapat melakukan perawatan pada kendaraan atau aktifitas lainnya secara pribadi.
Kami menciptakan produk-produk ramah lingkungan. Hal ini telah menjadi komitmen kami sejak perusahaan ini didirikan. Seperti halnya produk berbahan dasar air yang kami buat diantaranya Karburator Foam Cleaner, produk untuk poles body kendaraan dll.
Perkembangan teknologi industri otomotif semakin meningkat. Begitu juga WEALTHY yang akan terus tumbuh dan berkembang melalui R&D Departemen untuk memenuhi industri otomotif.
Dengan berkembangnya usaha utama, Wealthy Group mengembangkan bisnisnya dibidang material bangunan diantaranya Microfiber Chamois Cloth, Cutting Disk, Granding Disk dll.
Jika suatu hari melihat pengembangan produk aftermarket untuk industri otomotif dan material bangunan, dapat dipastikan itu adalah WEALTHY.

title: Experienced Developers from any background
description:
Build your Career with Mitrais ! 
 
We're looking for experienced Software Engineers from any background to be part of our team. 
What will you be doing? 
  • Coding high-quality software using distributed computing, messaging, microservices, performance tuning and memory and resource management techniques
  • Developing data-driven solutions for a range of clients - frontend as well as backend. 
  • Collaborating within cross-functional and international agile teams.
  • Testing, debugging, re-testing, and coordinating with QA, validating software as ready for shipping
  • Reviewing code and acting as a subject matter expert for juniors in the team 
What about you ? 
  • You already have 2+ years of experience as an application developer. 
  • You can speak reasonable English 
  • You are well versed in best practices in OOP, design patterns, SOLID principles, and data driven design 
  • You are comfortable using git or TFS in a CI/CD environment
  •  You enjoy working on lean and agile development projects using Scrum & Kanban
  • You love clean and beautiful code, with an eye for simplicity and pragmatism. 
What can Mitrais offer you ?
  • A CAREER, not a JOB !
  • Competitive salary
  • Excellent working environment, with the possibility to relocate to our regional offices and working remotely 
  • Free English classes, English is our working language 
  • Lots of opportunities to improve your competencies on our technical bootcamps, certification programs and soft skills training courses
  • Hackathons with big prizes !
  • Office preference location in Bali, Jakarta, Bandung or Yogyakarta
  • Take a break with Happy Hours, Billiard Tables, gaming rooms and free drinks and snacks to keep you 100% effective 
Learn about life at Mitrais from our current team by searching #mitraislife on Facebook or LinkedIn.
To Apply… 
Simply click the apply button, complete the form and upload your latest CV in English ! What are you waiting for?

company.name: PT Intan Pertiwi Industri
company.description:
PT INTAN PERTIWI INDUSTRI(INTIWI) didirikan pada tahun 1976 dan telah memproduksi kawat las pada tahun 1977. Sejak itu produksi INTIWI secara teknis telah bekerjasama dengan Kobe Stell, Ltd. Jepang.
Setelah lebih dari 25 tahun bekerjasama dengan Kobe Steel, saat ini INTIWI memproduksi dan memasok berbagai jenis kawat las Kobelco, mulai dari Mild Stell, High Tensile Stell, Stainless Stell, Hardfacing, dan Cast iron. Selain memproduksi, INTIWI juga menyimpan stock las siap pakai yang dibuat oleh Kobe Stell Jepang.
Untuk menjaga dan meningkatkan Kualitas kawat las KOBELCO yang diproduksi, INTIWI terus melakukan pengawasan yang tinggi dalam proses produksi melalui bagian Quality Control dengan standarisasi yang ditetapkan oleh Jepang dan dalam pengembangan produk INTIWI mendapatkan support dari Departemen Teknis Kobe Steel secara penuh, sehingga untuk kualitas kawat las sudah tidak diragukan lagi.
Jika anda adalah lulusan fresh graduated maupun profesional yang tertarik dan tertantang untuk mengoptimalkan kompetensi anda. Mari bergabunglah bersama kami.

company.name: PT Pintu Mas Mulia Kimia
company.description:
Kami menghimbau agar Anda berhati-hati saat melamar  pekerjaan dengan selalu memastikan iklan lowongan tersebut sesuai dengan profil perusahaannya.
Waspadalah jika Anda menemukan hal-hal di bawah ini :
  • PT Pintu Mas Mulia Kimia tidak pernah memungut biaya apapun dalam proses rekrutmen.
  • PT Pintu Mas Mulia Kimia tidak pernah bekerja sama dengan travel agent / biro perjalanan tertentu dalam proses  rekrutmen.

  • Jangan memberikan data pribadi atau data keuangan Anda kepada siapapun.
==========================================================
PT Pintu Mas Mulia Kimia (PMMK) was established in 1981. It is a privately owned company, engaged in the business of chemicals, machinery & parts, and laboratory testing instruments supply to a number of industries. In 1985, with the remarkable growth and diversification, a strong marketing network was established in Jakarta, Bandung, Semarang, Solo, and Surabaya handling the distribution of products manufactured by many of the world's most renowned chemicals producers. By the year 2000, the company expanded the business area by establishing a branch operation in Pekan Baru.

Technological advancement and market conditions continue to dictate what manufacturers will produce to fulfil consumer demands. PMMK continues to sharpen its competitive edge through collaboration with leading manufacturers of specialty chemicals around the world.

To be able to serve our customers well, our sales team is made up of a group of talents that possess good market knowledge and relevant technical expertise. While serving our customers, our sales, technical, and support team members also believe in building long-term customer relationships and excel in applications knowledge. Timely response and polite attitude are our service spirit.

Our company is here to create values for our customers, principals, shareholders, and employees. We believe all parties are interdependent to cooperate together, to support one another in a respectful manner. This we believe is the foundation of establishing long-term relationships.

company.name: PT SanSan Saudaratex Jaya
company.description:
Pada bulan Agustus tahun 1987, P.T. Sansan Saudaratex Jaya Garment membuka pabrik Garment pertamanya yang berlokasi di Jl. Cibaligo No. 33 Leuwigajah – Cimahi – Jawa Barat – Indonesia. Selama lebih dari dua puluh tahun, perusahaan kami telah berkembang pesat dan saat ini telah mempekerjakan lebih dari 8000 karyawan di 8 lokasi pabrik.
P.T. Sansan Saudaratex Jaya Garment merupakan perusahaan yang menghasilkan garment dengan kualitas tinggi untuk pasar dunia dengan harga yang sangat bersaing.
Perusahaan kami mampu menghasilkan berbagai jenis garment, dengan berbagai macam model, antara lain jenis pakaian Men, Ladies, Children, dan Babies dengan total kapasitas mencapai 2,550,000 pieces per bulan. Pelanggan kami di seluruh dunia mengakui produk kami dikarenakan kualitasnya, keseragaman produknya, dengan harganya yang bersaing dan mereka secara konsisten terus melakukan kerjasama dan berkembang bersama kami.
Dalam menghasilkan produk yang berkualitas tinggi, perusahaan kami didukung oleh teknologi yang canggih dan tentunya dibantu oleh tenaga kerja ahli yang kompeten di bidangnya. Selain itu kami juga didukung oleh kantor kami di Hongkong, untuk membantu kami dalam menyediakan semua kebutuhan kami, seperti halnya mesin-mesin, accessories, material, dan lain-lain yang dibutuhkan dalam memproduksi produk kami.
Perusahaan kami secara tegas mengikuti semua peraturan-peraturan Compliance (Persetujuan) dan juga Kode Etika BSCI (yang telah disepakati oleh PBB untuk penerapan Hak Asasi Manusia).
VISI : "Diakui sebagai perusahaan kelas dunia dan dipercaya atas komitmennya terhadap kepuasan pelanggan."
MISI : "Kami merupakan perusahaan yang menghasilkan produk-produk apparel yang berkualitas tinggi untuk masyarakat dunia yang ingin meningkatkan standar kehidupan mereka."
Produk yang kami hasilkan saat ini telah menembus pasar ekspor, karena produk kami dapat memenuhi standard quality requirement dari buyer yang sangat ketat, sehingga kami dipercaya oleh buyer untuk membuat produk-produk yang sesuai dengan keinginan mereka.
Adapun beberapa negara dan buyer yang telah menjadi tujuan export kami adalah sebagai berikut:
USA : GAP, OshKosh B'Gosh, Carter's, Disney, Target Corp, Austin, Aeropostale, etc.
Europe : H&M, C&A, etc.

company.name: PT B. Braun Medical Indonesia
company.description:
B. Braun Melsungen AG is one of the world's leading providers and manufacturers of healthcare solutions today. Every service that B. Braun provides incorporates the entirety of our knowledge and skills, the company's deep understanding of users'​ needs, and more than 175 years of extensive expertise. With its constantly growing portfolio of effective medical care solutions, B. Braun makes a substantial contribution towards protecting and improving people's health. In total, the B. Braun product range comprises 5,000 different products, 95 percent of which are manufactured by the company. By offering supplementary services and consulting, B. Braun is a system supplier that develops the best solution for patients in close partnership with our customers, making a significant contribution to medical advancements.
B.Braun Indonesia, a fast growing subsidiary of B. Braun Melsungen AG. We are seeking qualified individuals to join our team of highly trained and dedicated professionals who are committed to make B.Braun Indonesia a reliable partner to healthcare providers in Indonesia. It is our mission to help our medical professionals to provide affordable and safe healthcare for all Indonesians.
Hence, if you are in line with our mission and take great pride in doing so, you are very welcome to join our team.

title: UX Designer (Senior Level)
description:
Your daily routine will be:
  • Collaborate with Product Manager to define and implament the innovative solutions for product and user experience
  • Conduct User Research to get the product requirement
  • Build the empathy from organization to user for increasing the quality of product
  • Responsible in field research to gather the user needs
  • Provide new ideas and concepts to develop interactive design
  • Responsible in wireframe and validating ideas
  • To validate and make sure the prototype align with the concept & idea that have been planned
You'll enjoy (or survive, depends on the case) if you:
  • Have professional experience at least 3 years as UX Designer 
  • Have excellent communication and presentation skill along with extensive experience in user research
  • Passionate in understanding users and their motivation (especially for rural society)
  • Have strong portfolio and proven record in UX Design
  • Experience in developing persona, customer journey, wireframe and user research report

company.name: PT Multidaya Teknologi Nusantara
company.description:
What We Are
We are the internet of things (IoT) startup for fish/shrimp farming, purely local, based on Bandung, full of action, all passion, no drama, no bullshit 
What We Do
We build a smart feeding solution that can automatically feed the fish, sense the fish’s appetite, and connected to the internet 
Why We Do It
We want to solve the biggest problem from one of the most crucial and fastest-growing industry in the world: aquaculture. We strive to help hundreds of millions of farmers globally by delivering this breakthrough, especially for people at the bottom of the pyramid. eFishery is trying to disrupt aquaculture industry and tackles global challenge in food security, creating real impacts for our mankind.

title: Senior Web Developer (React) - Bandung
qualification: Sarjana (S1), Diploma Pascasarjana, Gelar Professional, Magister (S2)
description:
We are looking for an experienced React Developer to take our products to the next level. You will get to be part of an international and passionate team to contribute to one of the biggest challenges in healthcare.
What you’ll do:
  • Designing, architecting, and developing our web portal built using React and coordinating with the back-end and mobile teams during development
  • Safeguarding the quality and stability of the codebase of our web portal
  • Work with a strong team of engineers and designers across Indonesia and the Netherlands to improve our product
What we’d like to see from you:
  • Advanced knowledge of JavaScript and a good understanding of TypeScript
  • Advanced knowledge of React for web development
  • Knowledge of popular JS library/frameworks like Redux & Sagas is preferred
  • Experience in maintaining codebase for a long-running project
  • Familiar with unit tests, CI, lint, etc
  • Passion for writing clean code with excellent readability
  • Great team player with good communication skills in English
  • Experience with agile development
  • A great feeling of responsibility for the output of your development team
  • Eager to learn new technologies
  • Github or Bitbucket account with relevant projects or contributions
What We Can Offer You:
  • The rare opportunity to really make an impact on healthcare and personal health
  • The opportunity to work on cutting-edge technologies
  • Awesome and motivated co-workers in an informal working atmosphere
  • Freedom and flexibility to develop both professional and personal skills
