company.name: RGF HR Agent Indonesia
company.description:
Kami menghimbau agar Anda berhati-hati saat melamar  pekerjaan dengan selalu memastikan iklan lowongan tersebut sesuai dengan profil perusahaannya.

Waspadalah jika Anda menemukan hal-hal di bawah ini :
  • RGF HR Agent Indonesia tidak pernah memungut biaya apapun dalam proses rekrutmen
  • RGF HR Agent Indonesia tidak pernah bekerja sama dengan travel agent / biro perjalanan tertentu dalam proses  rekrutmen.
  • Apabila Anda diminta untuk membayar sejumlah uang dalam bentuk pembayaran tiket pesawat dan hotel atau  akomodasi lainnya agar diabaikan.

  • Jangan memberikan data pribadi atau data keuangan Anda kepada siapapun.
__________________________________________________________________________________
RGF is stands for RECRUIT GLOBAL  FAMILY, a global brand of Japan’s largest recruiting and information service company, Recruit Holdings co., Ltd.
We created this brand of our commitment to take on a new challenge to leverage on Recruit Group’s more over 50 years of industry experience and business network in Japan, to provide new opportunities to our clients across the region.
RGF HR AGENT takes charge of RGF’s business entity in general recruitment services. We provide total human resource services to clients at every stage of staff placement, such as evaluation, remuneration, and staff training. At the same time, we assist job-seekers in various ways to find the right job according to their individual preferences and experiences. Besides our services to assist full time staff recruitment, we also offer a range of support services for RPO (Recruitment Process Outsourcing) and contract base/temporary recruitment needs.
Our Company’s status as the Japan #1 market share holder in human resource, temporary staffing, and job advertisement field makes it possible for us to provide high quality total human resource management services not only in Japan but across the region.
We just open our RGF HR AGENT Brand in Indonesia on 1st May, 2013 and will continue and expand the business for the future.

Kami menghimbau agar Anda berhati-hati saat melamar  pekerjaan dengan selalu memastikan iklan lowongan tersebut sesuai dengan profil perusahaannya.
Waspadalah jika Anda menemukan hal-hal di bawah ini :

PT Transpacific Finance was established in 1994 with the first name as PT Transpacific Mutual Finance Corporation. After changing the company names for several times, the company changed its name into PT Transpacific Finance in 2006 which has been approved by the Ministry of Finance through the Letter of Decision KEP-032/KM.5/2006.
PT Transpacific Finance is an Independent Finance Company which its primary activity is to provide financial solutions to the customers in the form of leasing financing, factoring financing, and consumer financing for new and used vehicle ownership.
With the support of the new management and a reliable resource, PT Transpacific Finance is always committed to provide financial solutions according to the customer needs by providing a quick process, flexible and professional services.
It is proven from the awards received by the company from Infobank Multifinance Awards for 2013, 2014, and 2017 successively. In addition, an award from Indonesian Financial Services Association (IFSA) as the Best Finance Company 2013 for Total Assets Under Rp 500 Billion Category.
Currently, PT Transpacific Finance focuses in developing business in Jabotabek and Bandung through the office outlets located in Jakarta, Tangerang, Depok, and Bandung. The management is committed to provide the best financial solutions for the customers, but keep prioritizing the principles of prudence and compliance with the regulations. PT Transpacific Finance has been registered and supervised by the Financial Services Authority (OJK).

company.name: PT Surya Multi Laksana (LOGO Jeans)
company.description:
Logo De Corps is one of  leading fashion retail company group in Indonesia,  Logo De Corps has several brands of fashion products which is growing rapidly in the business of fashion and controlled most of casual fashion products market share in Indonesia. Our brand consist of LOGO, BOMBBOOGIE, NINETY DEGREES, BODY TALK, 10PM and FOD.
The Successful of Logo De Corps was developed by the persistence and focus to provide quality and best design. Supported by powerful teams and retail partners, Logo De Corps expect to be able to deliver excellence in every brand management.
History
Starting from the aspiration to develop the fashion business in 1980, Logo De Corps strive to make the formulation of business and started with launch the casual fashion products under the brand of LOGO for female adolescent and woman. As time goes by, LOGO became one of the fashion trend center in Indonesia. Logo De Corps seeing the considerable oppoturnities for developing the retail business in Indonesia and tried to launch others fashion products to reach different target markets. Continues with launching several barands such as BOMBBOOGIE which is casual fashion products for young men and men. In the next year, Logo De Corps launched NINETY DEGREES which is the next casual fashion products for female adolescent. Logo De Corps is also launched fashion products for woman under BODY TALK brand. Further, the development in retailing business still continued by giving new colors for consumers and also preparing all new products and brands. With the increasing number of brands and the development of retailing business, Logo De Corps very optimistic about the development of this fashion business. At this time, Logo De Corps owned 4 brands of fashion and will grow over the time. LOGO, BOMBBOOGIE, NINETY DEGREES, and BODYTALK will continue to evolve along with the development of fashion, and fashion’s trends in Indonesia and also all over the world.

title: Creative Director
description:
• Build, lead, and review work of the creative team in the production of all web, print, and digital marketing collateral especially production content for Facebbok, Instagram and Tiktok.
  • Spearhead and manage content strategy for both small-scale and large-scale projects, harnessing strategy, digital and brand design, compelling content, and technology
  • Collaborate with the marketing and sales departments in developing marketing plans, analyzing results, and identifying opportunities
  • Develop internal marketing campaigns that translate marketing objectives across business units into clear and motivating creative strategies
  • Analyze brand tracking, market trends, consumer need, and the competitive landscape
  • Meet budget standards by forecasting and managing expenses
Daily and Monthly Responsibilities
  • Supervise a cross-functional team of graphic designers, copywriters, social media experts, photographers/videographers, and project managers in the strategic development of messages and deliverables
  • Prioritize work and resources across engagements based on short- and long-term needs, establishing production schedules by collaborating with designers, copywriters, and production departments
  • Conduct brainstorming sessions with creative team, maintaining strategic and creative thinking to develop innovative and actionable creative initiatives in a fiscally responsible manner
  • Review and approve art and copy developed by the team, ensuring deliverables that effectively address marketing goals and challenges
  • Produce fresh, innovative work that translates complex ideas into compelling print materials and digital experiences for visually sophisticated audiences
  • Present, or oversee presentation of final concepts, and obtain approvals for deliverables
Skills and Qualifications
  • 10 years of related experience with 7+ years of creative direction in agency or corporate setting
  • Years of experience creating marketing/advertising campaigns from developing vision and the message platform to overseeing production on time and budget
  • Understanding and past experience creating integrated content across all marketing channels from digital, social media, paid media, mobile, but also understand offline and print
  • Proven experience with concept development
  • Highly skilled with leading a team of creative talent
  • Strong creative vision with an understanding of business objectives
Preferred Qualifications
  • Prior experience with copywriting, design, or production
  • Prior project management experience, with a focus on creative direction
  • Candidate must possess at least Bachelor's Degree in Advertising/Media or equivalent.
  • At least 10 Year(s) of working experience in the related field is required for this position.
  • Preferably Manager/Assistant Manager specialized in Arts/Creative/Graphics Design or equivalent.

company.name: China Railway Group Limited
company.description:
China Railway Group Limited (known as CREC) is a world-leading construction conglomerate with more than 120 years of history. As one of the world’s largest construction and engineering contractors, CREC takes a leading position in infrastructure construction, industrial equipment manufacturing, scientific research and consulting, real estate development, resources development, financial trust, trade, and other fields.
The Company ranked the 56th among "Fortune Global 500" in 2018, the 13th successive year being listed, while at home it ranked the 13th among Top 500 Chinese Enterprises. Over the decades, the Company has built more than 2/3 of China’s national railway network, 90% of China’s electrified railways, 1/8 of the national expressways, and 3/5 of the urban rail transit system.
In addition, CREC has long enjoyed a good reputation in the global market. Since the construction of the 1,861-kilometer Tazara railway in the 1970s, the Company has successfully built a large number of excellent projects in Asia, Africa, Europe, South America, and the Atlantic. The Company currently operates in more than 90 countries and regions around the world. The Company is willing to work together with friends from all over the world, to make greater contributions to the global economic, social, and infrastructure development.
BUT China Railway Group Limited (Indonesia) is registered for implementing Jakarta-Bandung High-Speed Railway Project as an official standing organization of CREC in Indonesia. With the rapid development of the business, we are looking for qualified candidates for the position: General Manager Assistant and Translator.

company.name: PT Pipamas Primasejati
company.description:
Sebagai bagian dari Group PMPS (Pancamas Pipasakti), kami berdiri sejak Tahun 2005 dan kami hadir di tengah masyarakat Indonesia sebagai salah satu produsen yang bergerak dalam bidang plastik khususnya pipa uPVC  dan HDPE dengan merek dagang PiPAMAS
Sadar akan pertumbuhan industri konstruksi dan infrastruktur di Indonesia yang semakin hari semakin berkembang, sesuai dengan visi PiPAMAS yaitu menjadi produsen pipe plastik pilihan pertama di Indonesia, kami berkomitmen untuk selalu mengutamakan kepuasan pelanggan dan senantiasa menghasilkan produk berkualitas tinggi yang memenuhi standar (JIS K-6742 dan SNI), kami pun senantiasa melakukan evaluasi dan perbaikan terhadap produk, proses, sistem, dan manajemen untuk menunjang pelayanan kami kepada Anda.
Kami telah menangani prcyek dari beragam sektor seperti irigasi rumah tangga, permukiman, gedung perkantoran, water plant, dan Iain-Iain Kami selalu siap memberikan penjelasan untuk membantu masalah yang dihadapi konsumen seat pemasangan di lapangan dan layanan purna jual kami dapat selalu diandalkan untuk mengatasi masalah yang timbul setelah pipa terpasang
PiPAMAS adalah pilihan yang tepat untuk sistem pipa yang berkualitas karena PiPAMAS adalah sarana kehidupan berkualitas begi masyarakat.

What We Do
We build a smart feeding solution that can automatically feed the fish, sense the fish’s appetite, and connected to the internet 
Why We Do It
We want to solve the biggest problem from one of the most crucial and fastest-growing industry in the world: aquaculture. We need you, Creative people !

We are Creative Squad (creative agency) based in Bandung Indonesia. We're not just agency. We actually think, create and produce our ideas. That approaces each project with passion , excitement and curiosity with method and precision.

Because of you , we make it happen.

company.name: PT Sanggar Catur Utama (Levi's Original Store)
company.description:
PT SANGGAR CATUR UTAMA (SCU) adalah distributor sekaligus Master Franchise yang membawa brand Levi's masuk ke Indonesia pertama kali pada periode tahun 1980an. Sejak saat itu PT SCU telah berhasil mengembangkan brand Levi's di Indonesia hingga sebesar saat ini. Memasuki periode awal tahun 2000an, Levi Strauss Indonesia mulai berdiri sebagai principal resmi dari Levi's dan sejak saat itu PT SCU fokus sebagai salah satu retailer utama dari Levi's Indonesia.
Saat ini kami memiliki 19 store / showroom yang tersebar di mall-mall kelas A dan A+ di daerah Jakarta, Bekasi, Tangerang, Bandung dan Surabaya. Dengan misi untuk memberikan pelayanan terbaik bagi pelanggan, kami berkomitmen dalam memberikan pengalaman "Levi's" kepada setiap pelanggan kami, yang dapat dirasakan mulai dari store kami hingga produk yang digunakan dapat menunjang segala jenis kebutuhan pelanggan kami.

Merupakan anak perusahaan dari Bank Rakyat Indonesia, yang didirikan sejak tahun 1983. Secara geografis, perusahaan menyediakan jasa keuangan ke seluruh Indonesia tanpa ada batasan pada merk produk, tipe, area atau industri tertentu.
Didukung oleh para staf yang kompeten dan profesional, PT BRI Multifinance Indonesia berkomitmen untuk terus meningkatkan pelayanannya kepada nasabah dan menjadi perusahaan pembiayaan terkemuka dengan standar pelayanan internasional. Dengan dukungan jaringan BRI sebagai pemegang saham dan salah satu bank terbesar di Indonesia, pertumbuhan usaha PT BRI Multifinance Indonesia di masa mendatang diharapkan dapat semakin signifikan dengan tingkat kesehatan yang baik.

company.name: PT Kereta Cepat Indonesia China
company.description:
PT KCIC is a joint venture company that was established on October, 16th 2015 and has been approved by the Ministry of Law and Human Rights of Republic Indonesia on October, 20th 2015. PT KCIC was established to build a high-speed railway that will extend for 142.3 kilometers long between Jakarta and Bandung in West Java. The company consists of a consortium of State-Owned enterprises (SOEs) named PT Pilar Sinergi BUMN Indonesia, led by a construction company, PT Wijaya Karya (Persero) Tbk. and a consortium of Chinese companies named Beijing Yawan HSR Co.Ltd.
The High-Speed Railway corridor is known as a pioneer in one of the developments of Indonesia's modernization vision. There are 4 stations planned to be located along the route namely Halim, Karawang, Walini, and Tegalluar, where the depot position for maintenance and store railway carriage will be in Tegalluar station. The Jakarta-Bandung High-Speed rail trace will pass through various areas including DKI Jakarta, Bekasi City, Bekasi District, Karawang District, Purwakarta District, West Bandung District, Cimahi City, Bandung City, and Bandung District.

company.name: PT Bandung Pakar
company.description:
Di kawasan utara Kota Bandung, ada sebuah kawasan hunian eksklusif dan prospektif yang strategis dan prestisius yang bisa mewujudkan citra Anda sebagai penghuni istimewa.
Adalah Dago, sebuah kawasan perbukitan berhawa sejuk dengan panorama alam nan menawan, serta aneka wisatanya. Di areal inilah PT. Bandung Pakar, pengembang Resor Dago Pakar mengembangkan hunian dan kavling siap bangun yang di kelilingi hamparan padang hijau yang di lengkapi fasilitas bertaraf Internasional.
Tak hanya itu, sebagai hunian tinggal sekaligus citra prestisius yang berada di kawasan elite, kawasan Resor Dago Pakar di rancang eksklusif untuk memberi kenyamanan penghuninya. Kelebihan yang tidak dimiliki oleh kawasan lain yang menawarkan beberapa kluster yang masing – masing memiliki keunggulan view yang berbeda, anda bisa memilih view Kota Bandung, Golf, Perbukitan. Kemudian, lingkungan perumahannya pun di tata rapi dengan dihiasi banyak taman serta seluruh jaringan listrik, telepon dan air dirancang tertutup dan berada dibawah tanah.
Dago memang terkenal sebagai kawasan prestisius di daerah Bandung karena dikenal sebagai kawasan elite. Ini terbukti dengan kenaikan harga tanah yang signifikan di wilayah ini, dimana hingga saat ini telah banyak rumah dan kavling yang terjual di kawasan Resor Dago Pakar telah ditempati oleh para penghuninya. Ditambah lagi hunianpun dikembangkan tanpa memakai pagar. Tentunya, ini ditujukan memberikan keleluasaan bagi para penghuni dalam menikmati alam Dago yang asri dan sejuk dengan suhu berkisar 16 – 22 derajat celcius.
Dengan, berbagai konsep, serta fasilitas yang ada tak salah jika anda menjadi bagian dari warga Resor Dago Pakar sebagai hunian yang mampu menunjang kehidupan menjadi lebih baik dan sehat serta citra gaya hidup penghuninya. Dan, jelas lokasi yang premium di kawasan Dago ini akan mengangkat nilai investasi di kawasan Resor Dago Pakar.

  • Penempatan di Bandung (Cimahi).
TUGAS & TANGGUNG JAWAB :
1. Bertanggung jawab terhadap gudang dan isi didalamnya serta mengatasi segala permasalah yang timbul di olehnya, yaitu sbb :
  • Memastikan ketepatan stok barang dengan rutin melakukan pengecekan harian, random stok dan stok opname bulanan,
  • Memastikan ketepatan stok barang servis,
  • Mengatur karyawan,
  • Mengatur dan melakukan perawatan terhadap kendaraan,
  • Menjaga dan melakukan perawatan terhadap semua inventasi kantor yang ada di gudang,
  • Melakukan evaluasi kerja team ( gaji,promosi, demosi ,mutasi dan SP) serta kehadiran team,
  • Memonitor dan menyetujui pinjaman karyawan,
  • Monitoring kinerja AR Staff, Kolektor, Tradisional Sales Staff (Khusus WL Cikampek dan WL Serang),
  • Memeriksa Saldo kas kecil setiap hari.
2. Bertanggung jawab untuk memastikan semua proses di gudang dapat terlaksana dengan baik, yaitu sbb :
  • Bekerja sama dengan supervisor Operasional  penerimaan dan pengiriman barang agar penerimaan barang dapat berlangsung dengan baik sesuai dengan SOP yang ada,
  • Bekerja sama dengan supervisor servis agar penerimaan dan pengiriman barang servis dapat berlangsung dengan baik sesuai dengan SOP yang ada,
  • Bekerja sama dengan HRD agar pengaturan karyawan dapat berlangsung dengan baik,
  • Bekerja sama dengan pihak luar dalam mem back up kendaraan agar proses pengiriman barang tidak terganggu,
  • Melakukan koordinasi antar sesama WLM untuk pelaksanaan TO dan Servis yang lebih baik,
  • Melakukan kontrol terhadap seluruh pengeluaran di gudang,
  • Memonitor penyusunan barang baik di gudang mau pun di mobil.
3. Bertanggung jawab untuk memastikan agar target yang di berikan ke gudang dapat tercapai, Yaitu sbb :
  • Bekerja sama dengan bagian terkait ( sales dan finance ) dalam mencapai target,
  • Mengatur pengiriman barang dengan supervisor Operasional agar target dapat tercapai serta mencari cara untuk mengatasi masalah yang timbul dalam mencapai target tersebut,
  • Mengatur jadwal lembur ( jika diperlukan ) apabila terjadi pendingan pengiriman.

title: Area Manager (Bandung, Surabaya, Yogyakarta)
description:
Why Join Us?
Shipper is on a mission to invent a new standard for online shipping in Indonesia. We have assembled the largest asset-light delivery network to make shipping simple, reliable, and cost competitive. With over 17,000 islands, 2,500 logistics providers, and a fast growing e-commerce market, Indonesia is one of the most challenging markets to build a great online shipping experience and we are primed to be a part of the solution. We are privileged to have some of the best global investors including Lightspeed, Y Combinator, and others. We are looking for passionate and outstanding individuals to join our team.
What will you do
  • Lead, plan, and oversee all Mitra Hub operations 
  • Coordinate all operational activities required for timely and efficient distribution of products to customers
  • Maintains Mitra Hub current volume of packages and relationship
  • Ensure maximum return on investment through effective operational performance and the successful completion of assigned projects
  • Evaluate and recommend training resources to support employee development
What are the requirements
  • Minimum of 5 years of relative operations supervision/management experience within a 3PL, vendor, and/or distribution environment is required
  • Highly motivated and target driven with a proven track record.
  • Experience leading a team and developing strategic plans
  • Relationship management skills and openness to feedback
  • Able to work comfortably in a fast paced environment.

company.name: Yayasan Konservasi Alam Nusantara
company.description:
Yayasan Konservasi Alam Nusantara (YKAN) is a local affiliate of The Nature Conservancy. We seeks to improve welfare in Indonesia without compromising the sustainability of natural resources for present and future generations by promoting the value of nature, accelerating the transformation in conservation and utilization of natural resources in a sustainable manner through a series of protected area management, conservation of important species, and community empowerment.
Our Mission
Our mission is to conserve the lands and waters on which all life depends. Together, we promote the value of nature and catalyze transformational change in conservation and sustainable use of natural resources for the benefit of people and nature.
Our Vision
Our vision is to leave a sustainable world for future generations. A prosperous Indonesia where the needs of people and the sustainability of nature are in balance for today’s and future generations.

company.name: PT Kereta Cepat Indonesia China
company.description:
PT KCIC is a joint venture company that was established on October, 16th 2015 and has been approved by the Ministry of Law and Human Rights of Republic Indonesia on October, 20th 2015. PT KCIC was established to build a high-speed railway that will extend for 142.3 kilometers long between Jakarta and Bandung in West Java. The company consists of a consortium of State-Owned enterprises (SOEs) named PT Pilar Sinergi BUMN Indonesia, led by a construction company, PT Wijaya Karya (Persero) Tbk. and a consortium of Chinese companies named Beijing Yawan HSR Co.Ltd.
The High-Speed Railway corridor is known as a pioneer in one of the developments of Indonesia's modernization vision. There are 4 stations planned to be located along the route namely Halim, Karawang, Walini, and Tegalluar, where the depot position for maintenance and store railway carriage will be in Tegalluar station. The Jakarta-Bandung High-Speed rail trace will pass through various areas including DKI Jakarta, Bekasi City, Bekasi District, Karawang District, Purwakarta District, West Bandung District, Cimahi City, Bandung City, and Bandung District.

title: Account Associate Jawa Barat
description:
About Ninja Van
Ninja Van is on a mission to dominate e-commerce logistics in Southeast Asia. We are one of the fastest growing startups in the region - founded in mid-2014, we have already won over 6,000 merchants and deliver more than 2 million parcels a month across six countries. In Jan 2018, we raised one of the largest Series C rounds ever in Southeast Asia and are well-positioned for our next phase of rapid growth.
At our core we are a technology company that is disrupting a massive industry with cutting edge software and operational concepts. Powered by algorithm-based optimization, dynamic routing, end-to-end tracking and a data-driven approach, we provide best-of-class delivery services that delight both the shippers and end customers.
But we are just getting started! We have much room for improvement and many ideas that will further shape the industry.
Responsibilities : 
  • Build, maintain, and continuously improve the relationship with Ninja partner “Mitra” to ensure that the interests of both parties are well managed.
  • Ensure long-term win/win business relationship.
  • Act as trusted consultant for Ninja Mitra from headquarter office and the specific region.
  • Clearly communicate the progress of weekly/monthly/quarterly initiatives which aims to engage with Mitra.
  • Collaborate with Business development team to identify and grow opportunities within territory.
Requirements : 
  • Having a bachelor degree or equivalent with minimum 1-2 years of related working experience.
  • Having a good communication and interpersonal skills.
  • Fast, Focus and responsive to needs of colleagues and customers.
  • Customer Oriented.
  • Able to handle multiple projects and/or tasks in a fast-paced environment.
  • Self Starter
  • Willing to travel

company.name: Ninja Xpress
company.description:
About Ninja Van
Ninja Van is a tech-enabled logistics company on a mission to provide hassle-free delivery services for businesses of all sizes across Southeast Asia. Launched in 2014, we started operations in Singapore and have become the region's largest and fastest growing last-mile logistics company, partnering with over 35,000 merchants and delivering more than 1,000 parcels every minute across six countries. 
At our core, we are a technology company that is disrupting a massive industry with cutting-edge software and operational concepts. Powered by algorithm-based optimisation, dynamic routing, end-to-end tracking and a data-driven approach, we provide best-of-class delivery services that delight both the shippers and end customers. But we are just getting started! We have much room for improvement and many ideas that will further shape the industry.

company.description: Kami merupakan perusahaan yang bergerak dalam bidang manufacturing. Produk yang kami hasilkan adalah konsentrasi produk Hollow Core Slab ( HCS) . Kami selalu mengacu pada teknologi Jerman. Pengalaman di bidang concrete manufacturing sudah lebih dari 20 tahun dimulai dari perusahaan pertama PT Cisangkan dan berkembang dengan industri lain, seperti PT Beton Elemenindo Putra dan PT Beton Elemen Persada.  Visi kami adalah untuk menjadi perusahaan terkemuka dan terpercaya dalam industri beton bermutu tinggi. company.name: PT Combiphar
company.description:
Kami menghimbau agar Anda berhati-hati saat melamar  pekerjaan dengan selalu memastikan iklan lowongan tersebut sesuai dengan profil perusahaannya. 
Waspadalah jika Anda menemukan hal-hal di bawah ini :
• PT Combiphar tidak pernah memungut biaya apapun dalam proses rekrutmen.
• PT Combiphar tidak pernah bekerja sama dengan travel agent / biro perjalanan tertentu dalam proses  rekrutmen.
• Apabila Anda diminta untuk membayar sejumlah uang dalam bentuk pembayaran tiket pesawat dan hotel atau  akomodasi lainnya agar diabaikan.
• Apabila ada Panggilan wawancara di lokasi yang tidak sesuai dengan iklan yang tertera pada iklan lowongan.
• Jangan memberikan data pribadi atau data keuangan Anda kepada siapapun.
Combiphar was founded in 1971 as a home industry in Bandung, West Java producing antibiotics, analgesics and the legendary OBH Combi cough syrup. In 1983, a larger manufacturing facility was established in Padalarang, West Java to support its growth. 
In 1985, two important figures in the development of the pharmaceutical industry in Indonesia, DR. Biantoro Wanandi - Doctor of Natural Sciences from Swiss Federal Institute of Technology in Zurich Switzerland who also served as Chief, Drug Policies and Management Unit at the World Health Organization (WHO) and Bapak Hamadi Widjaja - a graduate from INSEAD Fountainebleau in France, started a new era in Combiphar with one huge vision: to provide better access to the public through quality medicine. Through their leadership, Combiphar continued to grow and expand through a focused strategy and keen ability to take advantage of the opportunities even during the economic turbulence, a period which marked a significant turning point particularly in the history of OBH Combi’s nation-wide growth.
In response to Company’s increasingly rapid growth potential, Combiphar’s new vision “Championing a Healthy Tomorrow” has given birth to numerous business expansion opportunities outside of its main focus in prescription and over-the-counter categories, allowing the company to enter new business growth opportunities in nutrition and bio-research. 
Through the years, Combiphar has successfully established cooperation with international pharmaceutical companies from 18 countries across the globe, and today, is a trusted partner for these multi-national companies through licensing agreement and joint-venture. Through these partnerships, Combiphar undergoes regular quality control audits and is routinely equipped with the newest training and skills from its international counterparts, further strengthening its foundation in prioritizing the highest in quality.

company.name: PT. Gadingmas Wirajaya
company.description:
Kami menghimbau agar Anda berhati-hati saat melamar  pekerjaan dengan selalu memastikan iklan lowongan tersebut sesuai dengan profil perusahaannya.
Waspadalah jika Anda menemukan hal-hal di bawah ini :
  • PT Gadingmas Wirajaya tidak pernah memungut biaya apapun dalam proses rekrutmen.
  • PT Gadingmas Wirajaya tidak pernah bekerja sama dengan travel agent / biro perjalanan tertentu dalam proses  rekrutmen.
  • Apabila Anda diminta untuk membayar sejumlah uang dalam bentuk pembayaran tiket pesawat dan hotel atau  akomodasi lainnya agar diabaikan.
  • Apabila ada Panggilan wawancara di lokasi yang tidak sesuai dengan iklan yang tertera pada iklan lowongan.
  • Jangan memberikan data pribadi atau data keuangan Anda kepada siapapun.
Sejarah Perusahaan
PT. Gadingmas Wirajaya memulai awal kiprahnya pada tahun 1996 di Kota Bandung dengan memproduksi flexible polyurethane (Busa centian / spon) untuk mebel dan kasur busa dengan skala industri rumahan dengan merk GMW FOAM. Berkat kegigihan dan kerja keras bersama yang bertahun-tahun, PT. Gadingmas Wirajaya secara perlahan mampu memperluas jaringan pemasaran ke luar Kota Bandung. Pada tahun 2001 PT. Gadingmas Wirajaya berhasil membangun pabrik pertamanya di Cimincrang Kota Bandung yang menjadi basisnya dalam berkembang. PT. Gadingmas Wirajaya memulai pengembangan produksi spring bed (kasur pegas) berkualitas tinggi dengan harga terjangkau dengan merk Javaland Spring bed pada tahun 2004. Pada tahun 2017 siap diluncurkan merk spring bed (kasur pegas) dengan teknologi pocket spring dengan nama Ausi Spring dari PT. Gadingmas Wirajaya yang memiliki kualitas tidak kalah dengan merk-merk spring bed (kasur pegas) internasional.
Saat ini, PT. Gadingmas Wirajaya berfokus memproduksi busa / spon centian untuk mebel dan industri, kasur busa, dan kasur pegas. PT. Gadingmas Wirajaya berkembang pesat hingga mampu mengoperasikan empat buah pabrik produksi yang berlokasi di Bandung sebagai pusat dan tiga buah lokasi pabrik berstatus cabang di Cibubur, Semarang, dan Sidoarjo. PT. Gadingmas Wirajaya yang sekarang ini lebih dikenal dengan GMW menjadi salah satu perusahaan flexible polyurethane (busa / spon) yang diperhitungkan. Produk busa, kasur busa GMW FOAM yang bergaransi, dan produk spring bed (kasur pegas) Javaland Spring Bed berkembang pesat hingga mudah ditemukan di toko-toko furniture di Pulau Jawa dan Bali.
Visi Perusahaan:
- Menjadi pemimpin pasar flexible polyurthane, kasur busa, dan kasur pegas di Indonesia yang mengedepankan kualitas dan pelayanan  serta kepuasan kepada konsumen dengan harga yang terjangkau
Misi Perusahaan
-  Meningkatkan kualitas dan menambah produk-produk yang dihasilkan dengan harga terjangkau
-  Meningkatkan  pelayanan yang memuaskan kepada  konsumen
-  Meningkatkan jaringan distribusi hingga terjangkau ke pelosok

__________________________________________________________________________________
RGF is stands for RECRUIT GLOBAL  FAMILY, a global brand of Japan’s largest recruiting and information service company, Recruit Holdings co., Ltd.
We created this brand of our commitment to take on a new challenge to leverage on Recruit Group’s more over 50 years of industry experience and business network in Japan, to provide new opportunities to our clients across the region.
RGF HR AGENT takes charge of RGF’s business entity in general recruitment services. We provide total human resource services to clients at every stage of staff placement, such as evaluation, remuneration, and staff training. At the same time, we assist job-seekers in various ways to find the right job according to their individual preferences and experiences. Besides our services to assist full time staff recruitment, we also offer a range of support services for RPO (Recruitment Process Outsourcing) and contract base/temporary recruitment needs.
Our Company’s status as the Japan #1 market share holder in human resource, temporary staffing, and job advertisement field makes it possible for us to provide high quality total human resource management services not only in Japan but across the region.
We just open our RGF HR AGENT Brand in Indonesia on 1st May, 2013 and will continue and expand the business for the future.

company.name: PT Sanbe Farma
company.description:
PT Sanbe Farma adalah perusahaan farmasi yang berkantor pusat di Bandung, saat ini Kami sedang membutuhkan karyawan baru yang professional, cekatan dan bertanggung jawab untuk dapat bergabung bersama kami
Sanbe Farma was founded in 1975. As of now after more than three decades since inception, we are the largest pharmaceutical manufacturers in Indonesia and according the recent IMS Report, we rank highest among all the Pharmaceutical Manufacturers in Indonesia including Multinational Companies. Out of top 10 products ethically prescribed, 4 products are from Sanbe. Our market coverage in Indonesia includes more than 37,000 Doctors served by 1,000 Medical Representatives, through our associate’s net-work of 1,100 Sales persons, 35 depots, 60 sub-depots and our corporate work force consisting 8,000 personnel. Our eight manufacturing facilities in Indonesia are cGMP approved plants as per the International Standards. Our sterile preparations unit (LVPs & SVPs) is the first in South East Asia with State-of-the-Art manufacturing equipment and technology from US and Europe and PIC(S) & TGA, Australia compliant.
Our international operations in 20 countries are set to make substantial contribution to the global healthcare. Our international operations cover not only export of our formulations to various developing and under developed countries, but also seek partnerships and alliances from and to developed and regulated markets such as North America and Europe with an aim to put Sanbe Farma on the global map to supply Generic and specialty formulations not only for Indonesia but also to the rest of the world. We are also looking for new acquisitions in potential markets to make our products globally available at affordable prices.
Our propinquity to invest in profitable and strategic ventures would encourage potential and strategic companies to partner with us for mutual benefit not only for generic formulations but also for New Drug Delivery Systems (NDDs), New Chemical Entities (NCEs) and Biosimilar products.
We are committed to strive for continued achievement to provide quality products for quality health through our sincere endeavor to become global generic pharmaceutical manufacturer from Indonesia in the days to come.

company.name: PT Asuransi Raksa Pratikara
company.description:
PENGUMUMAN :
  • Asuransi Raksa Pratikara tidak pernah memungut biaya apapun dalam proses rekrutmen.
  • Asuransi Raksa Pratikara tidak pernah bekerja sama dengan travel agent / biro perjalanan tertentu dalam proses rekrutmen.
  • Apabila Anda diminta untuk membayar sejumlah uang dalam bentuk pembayaran tiket pesawat dan hotel atau akomodasi lainnya agar diabaikan.

  • Jika membutuhkan klarifikasi lebih lanjut dapat langsung menghubungi Asuransi Raksa Pratikara
Asuransi Raksa Pratikara was established in 1975 and conducts business operation based on the motto “Prudent and Trusted”. Our service qualities are enshrined in our professional, reliable, experienced and conscientious staff. Armed with the latest innovative insurance knowledge, we are constantly prepared to deliver high quality insurance services to our clientele. Our services comprise 19 offices nation-wide in Indonesia supported by the latest information technology. Communications among branches are performed through on-line network.
Product & Services
Driven by the customers trust built up over the years, we never stop endeavoring to improve the quality of our services. As a testimony to our commitment to quality service, we implemented 24-hour customer service and free car-towing service within the Jakarta-Bogor-Depok-Tangerang-Bekasi area in 2003. Having gained wide acclaim from customers, the free car-towing service was expanded to the area of Bandung and Surabaya. In 2004, we once again materialized our commitment to the enhancement of customer satisfaction by launching Raksa Gold Club (RGC), which provides dedicated services to motor-car policy holders with sum-insured of and above US$ 70,000. No efforts have been spared to ensure our best services to our customers. In 2005, we created Raksa Emergency Quick Service (REQS) rendering quick assistance to customers encountering emergency on the road, such as flat tires and car engine failure. Following the success of Raksa Gold Club, we achieved another milestone in upgrading our claim service by launching Raksa Silver Club (RSC) which is specifically aimed at pampering customers with motor insurance coverage below US$ 70,000. The advent of RSC brings in a new touch in insurance world which distinguishes Asuransi Raksa Pratikara from other insurers. Under our claim service motto “MUCAK” (Mudah, Cepat, Akrab which is translated as Easy, Fast, Friendly) all customers visiting RSC will enjoy relaxing ambience and affable claim service.

company.name: PT CIMB Niaga Auto Finance
company.description:
Profil CIMB Niaga Auto Finance
CIMB Niaga Auto Finance adalah perusahaan pembiayaan otomotif terkemuka yang merupakan anak perusahaan dari Bank CIMB Niaga Tbk.
CIMB Niaga Auto Finance, dahulu dikenal sebagai Saseka Gelora Finance, telah berpengalaman dalam pembiayaan selama lebih dari 30 tahun. Sebagai anak perusahaan Bank CIMB Niaga Tbk, bank peringakat lima besar dalam asset di Indonesia, CIMB Niaga Auto Finance berhasil meningkatkan kinerja perusahaan dengan sangat signifikan di tahun 2011 dibanding tahun 2010, antara lain: pertumbuhan penyaluran kredit otomotif mencapai 165%, peningkatan profit perusahaan sampai dengan 169%, pertumbuhan total asset hingga 271%, dengan tetap menjaga NPL dilevel 0,55%.
Sebagai perusahaan pembiayaan yang memfokuskan pada transaksi otomotif, CNAF mendiversifikasikan produknya menjadi 3 besar yakni: Pembiayaan Mobil, Pembiayaan Sepeda Motor, dan Pembiayaan Fleet.
Sejarah Perusahaan.
1981
Saseka Gelora Leasing pertama kali didirikan, dengan fokus bisnis sewa guna usaha.
1993
Saseka mengganti namanya menjadi PT Saseka Gelora Finance dan mengembangkan usahanya dalam industri pembiayaan, dimana Bank Niaga  merupakan pemegang saham urutan ketiga terbesar dengan 18% kepemilikan saham  di Saseka setelah Bank Uppindo (38%) dan Indover (19%).
1996
Bank Niaga menjadi pemegang saham mayoritas dengan 79.65% kepemilikan saham.
2002
Bank Niaga Tbk meningkatkan kepemilikannya atas Saseka Gelora Finance menjadi 81.96%.
2007
Keseriusan Bank Niaga Tbk untuk menggarap pasar industri pembiayaan Indonesia secara fokus dibuktikan dengan menambah porsi kepemilikan saham di Saseka menjadi 95.91%.
2008
Penandatanganan perjanjian merger antara Bank Niaga Tbk dan LippoBank pada bulan Juni 2008, dan secara resmi menjadi Bank CIMB Niaga pada November 2008 untuk memenuhi kebijakan SPP (Single Presence Policy) yang ditetapkan oleh Bank Indonesia. (Dengan kata lain, Saseka pun kini berada dalam naungan Bank CIMB Niaga Tbk).
2009
Proyek Transformasi di Saseka dimulai pada tanggal 6 Oktober 2009 dalam rangka melanjutkan rencana Bank CIMB Niaga Tbk untuk terus menggarap industri pembiayaan di Indonesia. Transformasi ini meliputi perubahan fokus bisnis Saseka (business focus) dari leasing menjadi consumer finance, serta transformasi model bisnis (business model) Saseka.
2010
Bank CIMB Niaga Tbk menambah kepemilikan sahamnya atas Saseka menjadi 99.9%, sedangkan 0.1% saham dipegang oleh NMC. (PT Niaga Manajemen Citra). Agustus 2010, PT Saseka Gelora Finance secara resmi berubah namanya menjadi PT CIMB Niaga Auto Finance diikuti dengan perubahan logo.

company.name: PT Daya Anugrah Mandiri
company.description:
PT. DAYA ANUGRAH MANDIRI 
DAYA MOTOR
PERUSAHAAN RETAIL SEPEDA MOTOR HONDA BERSKALA NASIONAL MEMILIKI JARINGAN YANG MENYEBAR DI SELURUH INDONESIA. DAYA MOTOR MERUPAKAN MEMBER TRIPUTRA GROUP.
History
Pada tanggal 10 Agustus 1948 Bpk.Raphael Adi Rachmat mendirikan  perusahaan jasa kurir, yang bernama "PEKALIPAN".
1972 dibangun "PD. DAYA "sebagai distributor sepeda motor Honda.
1984 berubah menjadi Perseroan Terbatas (PT), bernama PT. Daya Adira Mustika, yang terbagi menjadi 3 divisi:
-Divisi Sales
-Divisi Service
-Divisi Sparepart
6 Mei 2002 didirikan PT. DAYA  ANUGRAH MANDIRI dengan Branding DAYA MOTOR dan bisnis utamanya adalah Ritel Sepeda Motor Honda,yang merupakan bagian dari PT. Daya Adira Mustika.
Januari 2004 Daya Motor dipisahkan secara resmi dari PT. Daya Adira Mustika.

Tahun 2007 Branding DAYA MOTOR berubah menjadi ADIRA MOTOR.
Tahun 2011 Bersamaan pendirian Daya Group, PT. DAYA ANUGRAH MANDIRI kembali menggunakan bendera DAYA MOTOR dan telah memiliki lebih dari 89 Cabang dan 112 Bengkel yang tersebar di Indonesia.

H1, Penjualan Sepeda Motor HONDA
H2, Pelayanan Service
H3, Penjualan Suku Cadang Sepeda Motor HONDA

company.name: Commonwealth Bank Indonesia
company.description:
PT. Bank Commonwealth (Commonwealth Bank) with more than 20 years of presence in Indonesia is a subsidiary of Bank Commonwealth of Australia (CBA), the largest service provider listed on the Australian Securities Exchange and is included the Morgan Stanley Capital Global Index. Commonwealth Bank today offers customers a variety of banking products in 25 cities across Indonesia such as savings, deposits, mortgage, various investment products and bancassurance, working capital credit for Small and Medium Enterprises (SME) and Safe Deposit Box (SDB), 24-hours Call Centre, as well as internet banking with special features that offer transaction flexibility.
In line with its Mission “to be the market leader in providing digital financial solutions for our Retail & SME target customers”, Commonwealth Bank has broken three records of Indonesian Record Museum (MURI) through Tyme Digital – the first end-to-end digital onboarding platform that allows customers to open bank account in less than 10 minutes –, KTA Tyme Digital – the first unsecured loan with its digital submission process and instant decision making –, and Commonwealth Bank’s Mobile Banking, as the first mobile banking application with investment features. Besides Tyme Digital, Commonwealth Bank also offers best in class customer experience through branch with digital capability that has been present in Kensington – Kelapa Gading, PIK, and WTC 6.
Visit www.commbank.co.id for further information on Commonwealth Bank.

company.name: PT Mowilex Indonesia
company.description:
A dream was started in March 1970, a dream to create a high quality Decorative Paint product. A dream which transformed into an ambition to create paint and coating products that can stand on the international stage. As a local brand, we have been continually striving to improve and push ourselves to the limit of creating products that caters to the needs of our customers and to keep up with the ever evolving technological advancement. Our commitment to quality is the one thing that defines our company. Consistently using the best manufacturing practices with the best material available, we deliver products that will satisfy and even exceed the expectations of our customers.
We're proud to announce that our products has been used in many premium class housing projects, premium commercial blocks, and various hotels and apartments throughout the country. Our values makes us work with all our hearts to create a product that can touch all aspects of our customer's life, including but not limited to their family, their workplace, their house, and their immediate surroundings.
We aim to be the market leader of paint and coating industry in Indonesia, and afterwards, the world.

company.name: PT Rumah Cahaya Utama
company.description:
PT. Rumah Cahaya Utama berdiri pada tahun 2019, yang merupakan perubahan restruktur dari perusahaan Arga group (PT. Arga Arta Utama) memulai bisnis sejak tahun 1995, dimana bidang  distribusi peralatan rumah tangga secara direct selling untuk area pulau jawa.
PT. Arga Arta Utama yang Usaha dimulai di sebuah garasi rumah dengan karyawan lebih kurang 10 orang , perusahaan terus berkembang pada tahun 2005 membangun pabrik Kompor Minyak Tanah dan Pada tahun 2007 dengan dimulainya program Pemerintah yaitu konversi energi dari penggunaan minyak tanah ke gas. Maka pada tahun 2010 PT. Arga Arta Utama memproduksi kompor gas 2 tungku untuk mengikuti perkembangan industry dan kebutuhan masyarakat.
Dengan berkembangnya perusahaan, maka dibentuklah unit bisnis baru perusahaan distribusi pada tahun 2011-2013 PT. Kunci sukses Sejahtera, PT. Arga Arta Kencana, dan pada tahun 2018 berdiri unit bisnis industry stamping plat, powder coating dan injection plastic PT Dena Pres metal serta akuisi perusahaan distribusi di Yogyakarta PT. Usaha Putra Hamdan.
Dengan Perkembangan perusahaan tersebut, maka ditahun 2019 dilakukan restruktur perusahaan Arga Group diganti kepemilikannya menjadi PT. Rizki Lima Cahaya (RLC) yang mendirikan 3 Perusahaan Holding dengan bisnis baru yang berbeda, dan menunjuk PT. Rumah Cahaya Utama (RCU) sebagai Holding yang mengatur 5 perusahaan Arga Group.

Anak Perusahaan PT Rumah Cahaya Utama :
• PT Arga Arta Utama (Est. 1995) : Manufaktur peralatan rumah tangga
• PT. Dena Pres Metal (Est. 2018) : manufaktur Stamping, powder couting dan injection plastic
• PT. Kunci Sukses Sejahtera (Est. 2011) : Distributor peralatan rumah tangga
• PT. Arga Arta Kencana (Est. 2012) : Distributor peralatan rumah tangga
• PT. Usaha Putra Hamdan (Est. 2019) : Distributor peralatan rumah tangga

company.name: PT Transpacific Finance
company.description:
Kami menghimbau agar Anda berhati-hati saat melamar  pekerjaan dengan selalu memastikan iklan lowongan tersebut sesuai dengan profil perusahaannya.
Waspadalah jika Anda menemukan hal-hal di bawah ini :

• PT Transpacific Finance tidak pernah memungut biaya apapun dalam proses rekrutmen.
• PT Transpacific Finance tidak pernah bekerja sama dengan travel agent / biro perjalanan tertentu dalam proses  rekrutmen.
• Apabila Anda diminta untuk membayar sejumlah uang dalam bentuk pembayaran tiket pesawat dan hotel atau  akomodasi lainnya agar diabaikan.
• Apabila ada Panggilan wawancara di lokasi yang tidak sesuai dengan iklan yang tertera pada iklan lowongan.
• Jangan memberikan data pribadi atau data keuangan Anda kepada siapapun.
PT Transpacific Finance was established in 1994 with the first name as PT Transpacific Mutual Finance Corporation. After changing the company names for several times, the company changed its name into PT Transpacific Finance in 2006 which has been approved by the Ministry of Finance through the Letter of Decision KEP-032/KM.5/2006.
PT Transpacific Finance is an Independent Finance Company which its primary activity is to provide financial solutions to the customers in the form of leasing financing, factoring financing, and consumer financing for new and used vehicle ownership.
With the support of the new management and a reliable resource, PT Transpacific Finance is always committed to provide financial solutions according to the customer needs by providing a quick process, flexible and professional services.
It is proven from the awards received by the company from Infobank Multifinance Awards for 2013, 2014, and 2017 successively. In addition, an award from Indonesian Financial Services Association (IFSA) as the Best Finance Company 2013 for Total Assets Under Rp 500 Billion Category.
Currently, PT Transpacific Finance focuses in developing business in Jabotabek and Bandung through the office outlets located in Jakarta, Tangerang, Depok, and Bandung. The management is committed to provide the best financial solutions for the customers, but keep prioritizing the principles of prudence and compliance with the regulations. PT Transpacific Finance has been registered and supervised by the Financial Services Authority (OJK).

title: Risk Management Officer
description:
DESCRIPTION
  • Kandidat harus memiliki setidaknya Diploma, Gelar Sarjana di bidang apapun.
  • Bahasa yang harus dimiliki: Bahasa Indonesia
  • Setidaknya memiliki 2 tahun pengalaman dalam bidang yang sesuai untuk posisi ini.
  • Lebih disukai Pegawai (non-manajemen & non-supervisor) khusus dalam Pemasaran/Pengembangan Bisnis atau setara di perusahaan Tekstil.
JOB DESCRIPTION
  • Mengidentifikasi risiko finansial, keselamatan, atau keamanan yang mungkin akan dihadapi perusahaan.
  • Menyiapkan rencana dan tindakan untuk mengurangi faktor risiko.
  • Mengumpulkan informasi keuangan dari klien seperti pendapatan, aset, dan utang.
  • Mengelola kebijakan asuransi perusahaan.
  • Melakukan risk evaluation. Sebuah penilaian terhadap cara perusahaan menangani risiko sebelum-sebelumnya.
  • Menetapkan kebijakan terhadap jumlah risiko yang dapat diambil perusahaan.
  • Menjelaskan kemungkinan risiko eksternal yang ditimbulkan oleh tata kelola perusahaan kepada para stakeholder.
  • Melakukan audit terhadap kebijakan dan kepatuhan pengambilan risiko.
  • Bekerja sama dengan auditor internal dan eksternal perusahaan.
  • Mendokumentasikan catatan kebijakan dan klaim asuransi perusahaan.
  • Meninjau kontrak baru atau proposal bisnis internal.
  • Membangun kesadaran mengenai risiko pada staf perusahaan dengan memberikan penyuluhan dan pelatihan.

A Sundanese restaurant Sindang Reret featuring food typical sundanese and parahyangan food, had stood since 1973. Philosophy of buildings, blend of hospitality services typical Sundanese work with professionalism and a touch of West Javanese culture can be felt by every guest and domestic tourists who come to the city of Bandung. Bumi Parahyangan is always get people interested to stop by, to complement its foods of West Java, Sundanesse food in particular became an integral part on the Parahyangan. company.name: Ray White Sukajadi ( Bandung )
company.description:
Ray White Sukajadi adalah kantor property yang telah berdiri sejak awal tahun 2015. Dalam waktu kurang dari 2 tahun Ray White Sukajadi telah berhasil mendapatkan penghargaan dari Ray White Indonesia sebagai kantor terbaik di wilayah regional Indonesia di tahun 2016. Selain itu pada tahun 2016, terdapat 4 orang Marketing Eksekutif yang berhasil menjadi Alan Elite Performers Club (EPC).
Di awal tahun 2017 Ray White Sukajadi kembali memecahkan rekor sebagai salah satu kantor di Bandung dangan jumlah marketing berprestasi yang terbanyak yang mendapatkan penghargaan dari Ray White Indonesia.
Berikut adalah daftar awards yang telah diterima oleh Ray White Sukajadi :
Maret 2017 
- Annual Awards 2017: Top Ray White Regional Office #1
- Annual Awards 2017: Top Ray White National Office #11
Maret 2018

- Annual Awards 2018: Top Ray White Regional Office #4
- 2 Alan White Elite Performers Club

Maret 2019

Juni 2019

September 2020

Ray White Sukajadi sudah dipercaya para klien-klien kami sehingga kami beruntung menjadi kantor Ray White terbaik selama 4 tahun berturut-turut. Kami sadar bahwa pembelian dan penjualan property adalah salah satu hal terpenting dalam hidup seorang manusia, sehingga kepuasan klien betul-betul kami utamakan dengan cara memberikan pelatihan terbaik di bidang property untuk marketing eksekutif kami.

company.name: PT Transpacific Finance
company.description:
Kami menghimbau agar Anda berhati-hati saat melamar  pekerjaan dengan selalu memastikan iklan lowongan tersebut sesuai dengan profil perusahaannya.
Waspadalah jika Anda menemukan hal-hal di bawah ini :

• PT Transpacific Finance tidak pernah memungut biaya apapun dalam proses rekrutmen.
• PT Transpacific Finance tidak pernah bekerja sama dengan travel agent / biro perjalanan tertentu dalam proses  rekrutmen.
• Apabila Anda diminta untuk membayar sejumlah uang dalam bentuk pembayaran tiket pesawat dan hotel atau  akomodasi lainnya agar diabaikan.
• Apabila ada Panggilan wawancara di lokasi yang tidak sesuai dengan iklan yang tertera pada iklan lowongan.
• Jangan memberikan data pribadi atau data keuangan Anda kepada siapapun.
PT Transpacific Finance was established in 1994 with the first name as PT Transpacific Mutual Finance Corporation. After changing the company names for several times, the company changed its name into PT Transpacific Finance in 2006 which has been approved by the Ministry of Finance through the Letter of Decision KEP-032/KM.5/2006.
PT Transpacific Finance is an Independent Finance Company which its primary activity is to provide financial solutions to the customers in the form of leasing financing, factoring financing, and consumer financing for new and used vehicle ownership.
With the support of the new management and a reliable resource, PT Transpacific Finance is always committed to provide financial solutions according to the customer needs by providing a quick process, flexible and professional services.
It is proven from the awards received by the company from Infobank Multifinance Awards for 2013, 2014, and 2017 successively. In addition, an award from Indonesian Financial Services Association (IFSA) as the Best Finance Company 2013 for Total Assets Under Rp 500 Billion Category.
Currently, PT Transpacific Finance focuses in developing business in Jabotabek and Bandung through the office outlets located in Jakarta, Tangerang, Depok, and Bandung. The management is committed to provide the best financial solutions for the customers, but keep prioritizing the principles of prudence and compliance with the regulations. PT Transpacific Finance has been registered and supervised by the Financial Services Authority (OJK).

company.description:
PENGUMUMAN :
  • PT Wicaksana Overseas International, Tbk. tidak pernah memungut biaya apapun dalam proses rekrutmen.
  • PT Wicaksana Overseas International, Tbk. tidak pernah bekerja sama dengan travel agent / biro perjalanan tertentu dalam proses rekrutmen.

About PT. Wicaksana Overseas International, Tbk.
Wicaksana was established in 1973, distributing fast moving consumer goods such as instant noodles, snacks, beverages, personal care and also pharmaceutical products. As the underlying goal of any business is to drive growth, DKSH’s acquisition of the majority of PT Wicaksana’s shares in 2017 has provided the basis for the expansion of Wicaksana’s market position. Leveraging DKSH’s long-standing experience, PT Wicaksana successfully increased its distribution centers and channels as well as its marketing and sales capabilities. After being part of DKSH for two years, Wicaksana is delighted to introduce its new logo in line with DKSH’s look and feel, referencing the Fantree plant.
With a strategy for growth and in-depth knowledge gathered in specialized Business Units, Wicaksana and DKSH focus on consistently delivering results. Two years after the acquisition, Wicaksana has been growing rapidly ever since. Wicaksana operates across Indonesia’s major cities and has more than 1,000 employees. The acquisition has helped build trust and has secured big partnerships with both multinational and local companies. The client portfolio includes names, such as Mars, Unilever Asia or Coca Cola Distribution Indonesia and the STT company, but also Tokopedia, as a local giant in the e-commerce sector.
To distribute all its clients’ products, Wicaksana operates across all major cities in Indonesia. Wicaksana recorded net sales of IDR 1,85 Trillion in 2019.

company.name: PT Coway International Indonesia
company.description:
We COWAY is Water and Air Specialist Company.
COWAY want to provide clean water and pure air for Indonesian and has a vision to grow into a great company loved by Indonesian.
Our Business
We care for the world's water and air
We set our sights on the overseas market based on our world's top-notch water and air R&D infrastructure. Our main products are home wellness appliances, including air purifiers, water purifiers. Based on our internationally integrated brand ‘Coway', we are accelerating our overseas business through active cooperation for sales with global home appliances manufacturers. Currently, with operations in the US, Malaysia, China and Thailand, we are developing products and services and implementing marketing strategies to meet the local needs, thereby achieving a sustainable growth.
Overseas Business Sales 
Innovation Acclaimed by the World Innovative values that we are delivering on the global stage bring out the desire of people around the world. We are awarded innovation prizes in 8 sectors at CES 2016, the world's largest consumer electronics tradeshow.
Regional Differentiation Strategy
We develop regionally-differentiated strategic product lineups and a specialized service model. 
We ranked No. 1 in the water purifier industry in Malaysia. That is a successful achievement made through localization of Cody services and rental service system.

company.name: PT Combiphar
company.description:
Kami menghimbau agar Anda berhati-hati saat melamar  pekerjaan dengan selalu memastikan iklan lowongan tersebut sesuai dengan profil perusahaannya. 
Waspadalah jika Anda menemukan hal-hal di bawah ini :
• PT Combiphar tidak pernah memungut biaya apapun dalam proses rekrutmen.
• PT Combiphar tidak pernah bekerja sama dengan travel agent / biro perjalanan tertentu dalam proses  rekrutmen.
• Apabila Anda diminta untuk membayar sejumlah uang dalam bentuk pembayaran tiket pesawat dan hotel atau  akomodasi lainnya agar diabaikan.
• Apabila ada Panggilan wawancara di lokasi yang tidak sesuai dengan iklan yang tertera pada iklan lowongan.
• Jangan memberikan data pribadi atau data keuangan Anda kepada siapapun.
Combiphar was founded in 1971 as a home industry in Bandung, West Java producing antibiotics, analgesics and the legendary OBH Combi cough syrup. In 1983, a larger manufacturing facility was established in Padalarang, West Java to support its growth. 
In 1985, two important figures in the development of the pharmaceutical industry in Indonesia, DR. Biantoro Wanandi - Doctor of Natural Sciences from Swiss Federal Institute of Technology in Zurich Switzerland who also served as Chief, Drug Policies and Management Unit at the World Health Organization (WHO) and Bapak Hamadi Widjaja - a graduate from INSEAD Fountainebleau in France, started a new era in Combiphar with one huge vision: to provide better access to the public through quality medicine. Through their leadership, Combiphar continued to grow and expand through a focused strategy and keen ability to take advantage of the opportunities even during the economic turbulence, a period which marked a significant turning point particularly in the history of OBH Combi’s nation-wide growth.
In response to Company’s increasingly rapid growth potential, Combiphar’s new vision “Championing a Healthy Tomorrow” has given birth to numerous business expansion opportunities outside of its main focus in prescription and over-the-counter categories, allowing the company to enter new business growth opportunities in nutrition and bio-research. 
Through the years, Combiphar has successfully established cooperation with international pharmaceutical companies from 18 countries across the globe, and today, is a trusted partner for these multi-national companies through licensing agreement and joint-venture. Through these partnerships, Combiphar undergoes regular quality control audits and is routinely equipped with the newest training and skills from its international counterparts, further strengthening its foundation in prioritizing the highest in quality.

title: Finance Manager
description:
Kualifikasi
  • Kandidat harus memiliki setidaknya Diploma, Gelar Sarjana di Keuangan/Akuntansi/Perbankan atau setara.

Deskripsi Pekerjaan
  • Mengkoordinasikan dan mengontrol perencanaan, pelaporan, serta pembayaran kewajiban pajak perusahaan agar efisien, akurat, tepat waktu, dan sesuai dengan peraturan pemerintah yang berlaku.
  • Merencanakan dan mengkoordinasikan penyusunan anggaran perusahaan, serta mengontrol penggunaan anggaran tersebut untuk memastikan penggunaan dana secara efektif dan efisien dalam menunjang kegiatan operasional perusahaan.
  • Mengelola fungsi akuntansi dalam memproses data dan informasi keuangan untuk menghasilkan laporan keuangan yang dibutuhkan perusahaan secara akurat.

company.name: Lazada eLogistics Indonesia
company.description:
Everything written about eCommerce opportunity in Southeast Asia is overwhelmingly positive - a population of 600 million plus consumers, growing internet connectivity, broad penetration of smartphones, a young and tech-savvy population and expanding GDP and purchasing power. The region’s rate of eCommerce share of total retail at around 1 percent shows enormous opportunity in comparison to 14-17% in the west and China.
Despite these extraordinary possibilities, the logistics environment in Southeast Asia remains a huge challenge.
Lazada eLogistics (LeL) mission is to address these challenges, delight customers and win them over to eCommerce. We are building an innovative, highly visible, low-cost logistics network. Our operating model is based on an ecosystem of logistics partners stitched together with state of the art technology and our modular infrastructure
Lazada eLogistics (LeL) is the Logistics arm of the Lazada Group and is structured around four operating Business Units
  • Express: own B2C last mile delivery capabilities from pick-up to sort to delivery
  • Transport: Management of our ecosystem of partners (3PLs) along all the transportation components
  • Fulfilment: Operation of a network of warehouses that can fill retail orders on our own behalf, as well as providing fulfilment services to merchants and international brands
  • Crossborder: Build-up & management of international logistics network giving seamlessly access to ASEAN

company.name: PT. Gadingmas Wirajaya
company.description:
Kami menghimbau agar Anda berhati-hati saat melamar  pekerjaan dengan selalu memastikan iklan lowongan tersebut sesuai dengan profil perusahaannya.
Waspadalah jika Anda menemukan hal-hal di bawah ini :
  • PT Gadingmas Wirajaya tidak pernah memungut biaya apapun dalam proses rekrutmen.
  • PT Gadingmas Wirajaya tidak pernah bekerja sama dengan travel agent / biro perjalanan tertentu dalam proses  rekrutmen.
  • Apabila Anda diminta untuk membayar sejumlah uang dalam bentuk pembayaran tiket pesawat dan hotel atau  akomodasi lainnya agar diabaikan.
  • Apabila ada Panggilan wawancara di lokasi yang tidak sesuai dengan iklan yang tertera pada iklan lowongan.
  • Jangan memberikan data pribadi atau data keuangan Anda kepada siapapun.
Sejarah Perusahaan
PT. Gadingmas Wirajaya memulai awal kiprahnya pada tahun 1996 di Kota Bandung dengan memproduksi flexible polyurethane (Busa centian / spon) untuk mebel dan kasur busa dengan skala industri rumahan dengan merk GMW FOAM. Berkat kegigihan dan kerja keras bersama yang bertahun-tahun, PT. Gadingmas Wirajaya secara perlahan mampu memperluas jaringan pemasaran ke luar Kota Bandung. Pada tahun 2001 PT. Gadingmas Wirajaya berhasil membangun pabrik pertamanya di Cimincrang Kota Bandung yang menjadi basisnya dalam berkembang. PT. Gadingmas Wirajaya memulai pengembangan produksi spring bed (kasur pegas) berkualitas tinggi dengan harga terjangkau dengan merk Javaland Spring bed pada tahun 2004. Pada tahun 2017 siap diluncurkan merk spring bed (kasur pegas) dengan teknologi pocket spring dengan nama Ausi Spring dari PT. Gadingmas Wirajaya yang memiliki kualitas tidak kalah dengan merk-merk spring bed (kasur pegas) internasional.
Saat ini, PT. Gadingmas Wirajaya berfokus memproduksi busa / spon centian untuk mebel dan industri, kasur busa, dan kasur pegas. PT. Gadingmas Wirajaya berkembang pesat hingga mampu mengoperasikan empat buah pabrik produksi yang berlokasi di Bandung sebagai pusat dan tiga buah lokasi pabrik berstatus cabang di Cibubur, Semarang, dan Sidoarjo. PT. Gadingmas Wirajaya yang sekarang ini lebih dikenal dengan GMW menjadi salah satu perusahaan flexible polyurethane (busa / spon) yang diperhitungkan. Produk busa, kasur busa GMW FOAM yang bergaransi, dan produk spring bed (kasur pegas) Javaland Spring Bed berkembang pesat hingga mudah ditemukan di toko-toko furniture di Pulau Jawa dan Bali.
Visi Perusahaan:
- Menjadi pemimpin pasar flexible polyurthane, kasur busa, dan kasur pegas di Indonesia yang mengedepankan kualitas dan pelayanan  serta kepuasan kepada konsumen dengan harga yang terjangkau
Misi Perusahaan
-  Meningkatkan kualitas dan menambah produk-produk yang dihasilkan dengan harga terjangkau
-  Meningkatkan  pelayanan yang memuaskan kepada  konsumen
-  Meningkatkan jaringan distribusi hingga terjangkau ke pelosok

title: Sales Manager (Jakarta Bandung Karawang Bekasi)
description:
Who we are looking for
We are looking for a high performing Sales Manager to help us meet our customer acquisition and revenue targets. The Sales Manager will be responsible for maximizing our sales team potential and crafting sales plans to hit company sales target.
A Bachelor Degree in Business or related filed is required. In order to succeed in this role, you will need excellent communication skills and the ability to lead a sales team. Previous experience in sales-related role is a must.
What will you do
  • Develop sales strategies to acquire new customers or clients.
  • Analyse sales data on sales results and develop plans to address performance gaps.
  • Collaborate with marketing team to develop lead generation plans.
  • Designing and implementing a strategic sales plan that expands Shipper’s customer base and ensure its strong presence
  • Achieving growth and hitting sales targets by successfully managing the sales team
  • Managing objectives setting, coaching and performance monitoring of sales representatives
  • Build and promote strong, long-lasting customer relationships by partnering with them and understanding their needs
  • Present sales, revenue and expenses reports and realistic forecasts to the management team
  • Maintain a deep understanding of customer needs and monitor their preferences.
  • Resolve escalated customer issues and customer complaints regarding sales and service.
  • Provide advanced negotiation expertise.
What are the requirements
  • Bachelor’s degree in business or related field.
  • Successful previous experience as a sales representative or sales manager who consistently meeting or exceeding targets
  • Demonstrated ability to communicate, present and influence credibly and effectively at all levels of the organization
  • Proven experience to drive the sales process from plan to close
  • Strong business sense and industry expertise
  • Excellent mentoring, coaching and people management skills
  • Experience in customer relationship management.
  • Experience managing and directing a sales team.
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
  • Successful experience building a territory from scratch is a plus

Radya Labs juga menawarkan BPJS dan makan siang. Semua perjalanan ke luar Bandung akan ditanggung kantor bersama dengan kebutuhan akomodasi

Kami bekerja 8 jam sehari dan menghindari overtime, karena mencintai keseimbangan kerja. Namun, pada waktu tertentu tetap dibutuhkan, jadi kamu harus tetap bersiap (misal end of project, kebutuhan UAT onsite di client).

company.name: Radya Labs
company.description:
WE ARE RADYA LABS
We enable digital transformation through innovative solution and service excellence!
Misi kami adalah PIC - People, Innovation, and Creation - Manusia, Inovasi, dan Karya. Kami berkarya membangun solusi yang meningkatkan produktivitas dan kepuasan pelanggan, serta membangun lingkungan kerja yang inovatif dan kreatif untuk para kru.
Radya Labs berdiri tahun 2011, dan sudah membantu puluhan perusahaan dalam membuat aplikasi yang membantu bisnisnya. Dari perusahaan transportasi, media, bisnis, hingga teknologi berskala nasional maupun internasional telah menjadi customer yang setia dan puas menggunakan layanan yang kami berikan. Microsoft Indonesia, Pertamina Hulu Energi, Bank MNC, Zurich, MPM, and Kompas Gramedia adalah contoh klien-klien kami yang puas dengan hasil kerja kami.
Setelah 6 tahun berjalan, prinsip kami dalam menjalankan perusahaan tidak pernah berubah. Kami selalu menjadi perusahaan yang jujur pada customer, selalu memberikan ide kreatif, flexibel, dan komunikatif. Kami adalah perusahaan muda yang dinamis, kreatif, dan penuh integritas dalam menjalankan semua kebutuhan customer kami.

title: B2B Senior Sales Officer
description:
This position is to expand the client base with public and private K12 schools, maintain good relationships, conduct business presentations, deliver services, and assure client satisfaction to maintain retention.
 
For placement in branch: Jakarta, Bandung, Makassar, Malang, Medan, Palembang, Semarang, Surabaya, and Yogyakarta.
 
Responsibilities
  • Develop a sales proposal according to clients needs
  • Generate sales from new and existing clients to achieve the sales target
  • Deliver product and quality services to assure clients satisfaction
  • Build and maintain good relationships with all the stakeholders
  • Provide sales clerical and administrative works 
  • Provide training support to junior team members
 
Requirements
  • Minimum 2- year experience in B2B business as sales/business development preferably from education industry
  • Having previous/existing connections/network with K12 private/public schools is a strong advantage
  • Demonstrate strong sales skills: persuasive communication, lobby, negotiation, and persistence.
  • Possess analytical and problem-solving skills
  • Self-driven and able to work independently

company.name: PT. Quipper Edukasi Indonesia
company.description:
Kami menghimbau agar Anda berhati-hati saat melamar  pekerjaan dengan selalu memastikan iklan lowongan tersebut sesuai dengan profil perusahaannya.
Waspadalah jika Anda menemukan hal-hal di bawah ini :
  • PT Quipper Edukasi Indonesia tidak pernah memungut biaya apapun dalam proses rekrutmen.
  • PT Quipper Edukasi Indonesia tidak pernah bekerja sama dengan travel agent / biro perjalanan tertentu dalam proses  rekrutmen.
  • Apabila Anda diminta untuk membayar sejumlah uang dalam bentuk pembayaran tiket pesawat dan hotel atau  akomodasi lainnya agar diabaikan.
  • Apabila ada Panggilan wawancara di lokasi yang tidak sesuai dengan iklan yang tertera pada iklan lowongan.
  • Jangan memberikan data pribadi atau data keuangan Anda kepada siapapun.
=======================================
Quipper merupakan perusahaan teknologi pendidikan dengan Misi - Memberikan pendidikan terbaik hingga ke daerah terpencil. Berdiri pertama kali pada tahun 2010 di London - Inggris, Layanan Quipper saat ini telah dapat dinikmati di beberapa negara seperti Jepang, Mexico, Filipina dan Indonesia.
Sejak tahun 2015, Quipper telah menjadi bagian dari ekosistem pendidikan Indonesia dengan turut menyediakan, memperbaiki, dan mendistribusikan pendidikan berkualitas untuk guru dan siswa. 
Dengan Visi - Distributors of Wisdom - Bring the best education to all corners of the world, kami percaya bahwa akses pendidikan berkualitas adalah hak mendasar bagi setiap anak Indonesia.
Selama 3 tahun Quipper di Indonesia, kami terus bertumbuh untuk mendukung peningkatan kualitas pendidikan ke seluruh wilayan di Indonesia.
  • 34 Provinsi di Indonesia telat dijangkau 
  • 8.500+ Sekolah sudah dikunjungi 
  • 96.000 Ruang kelas sudah dikunjungi
  • 350.000+ Jumlah guru terdaftar 
  • 950.000+ Jumlah pengikut di sosial media Quipper Indonesia 
  • 5jt+ Jumlah siswa yang terdaftar 
Dengan peningkatan pertumbuhan Quipper di Indonesia, kami mencari seorang yang Smart, Creative and Willing to grow untuk menjadi bagian dari kontributor kemajuan pendidikan di Indonesia.

ANDA SUKA BERTEMU DENGAN BANYAK ORANG?

SEGERA RAIH KESEMPATAN ANDA UNTUK MENGEMBANGKAN SKILL, PERSONALITY DAN CAREER ANDA DISINI, BERSAMA KAMI PT MITRA AMERTHA SEJAHTERA.
APPLY SEKARANG JUGA!
NB: CANTUMKAN SPESIFIK DOMISILI PADA PROFILE ANDA

company.name: PT Pipamas Primasejati
company.description:
Sebagai bagian dari Group PMPS (Pancamas Pipasakti), kami berdiri sejak Tahun 2005 dan kami hadir di tengah masyarakat Indonesia sebagai salah satu produsen yang bergerak dalam bidang plastik khususnya pipa uPVC  dan HDPE dengan merek dagang PiPAMAS
Sadar akan pertumbuhan industri konstruksi dan infrastruktur di Indonesia yang semakin hari semakin berkembang, sesuai dengan visi PiPAMAS yaitu menjadi produsen pipe plastik pilihan pertama di Indonesia, kami berkomitmen untuk selalu mengutamakan kepuasan pelanggan dan senantiasa menghasilkan produk berkualitas tinggi yang memenuhi standar (JIS K-6742 dan SNI), kami pun senantiasa melakukan evaluasi dan perbaikan terhadap produk, proses, sistem, dan manajemen untuk menunjang pelayanan kami kepada Anda.
Kami telah menangani prcyek dari beragam sektor seperti irigasi rumah tangga, permukiman, gedung perkantoran, water plant, dan Iain-Iain Kami selalu siap memberikan penjelasan untuk membantu masalah yang dihadapi konsumen seat pemasangan di lapangan dan layanan purna jual kami dapat selalu diandalkan untuk mengatasi masalah yang timbul setelah pipa terpasang
PiPAMAS adalah pilihan yang tepat untuk sistem pipa yang berkualitas karena PiPAMAS adalah sarana kehidupan berkualitas begi masyarakat.

company.name: PT Bank Permata, Tbk
company.description:
PT. Bank Permata Tbk  (PermataBank) merupakan hasil merger 5 (lima) Bank yaitu, PT. Bank Bali Tbk, PT. Bank Universal Tbk, PT. Bank Artamedia, PT. Bank Patriot dan PT. Bank Prima Ekspress pada tahun 2002, dan saat ini telah berkembang menjadi sebuah bank swasta Utama yang menawarkan produk dan jasa inovatif serta komprehensif terutama di sisi delivery channel-nya termasuk Internet Banking dan Mobile Banking. PermataBank memiliki aspirasi untuk menjadi penyedia jasa keuangan terkemuka di Indonesia, dengan fokus di segmen Konsumer dan Komersial.

DI tahun 2004, Standard Chartered Bank dan PT. Astra Internasional Tbk mengambil alih PermataBank dan memulai proses transformasi secara besar-besaran di dalam organisasi. Selanjutnya, terhadap wujud komitmennya terhadap PermataBank, kepemilikan gabungan saham utama ini meningkat menjadi 89.01% pada tahun 2006.
Kombinasi unik dari kedua pemegang saham strategis merupakan salah satu kekuatan Utama PermataBank. PT. Astra Internasional Tbk merupakan perusahaan Indonesia yang besar dan memiliki pengalaman kuat di pasar domestik. Standard Chartered Bank dengan keahlian dan pengalaman global terkemuka yang dimilikinya menjadikan PermataBank berada dalam posisi yang unik.

Dan saat ini PermataBank telah berkembang menjadi sebuah bank swasta utama yang menawarkan produk dan jasa inovatif serta komprehensif terutama di sisi delivery channel-nya termasuk Internet Banking dan Mobile Banking. PermataBank memiliki aspirasi untuk menjadi penyedia jasa keuangan terkemuka di Indonesia dengan fokus di segmen Konsumer dan Komersial.
VISI
Menjadi Bank pilihan dengan terus membina kemitraan dan menciptakan nilai bermakna bagi stakeholders
MISI
  • Berperan aktif sebagai mitra di bidang keuangan dan agen pembangunan yang efisien bagi nasabah dan mayarakat.
  • Memberikan layanan keuangan menyeluruh secara sederhana, cepat, andal dan inovatif.
  • Berkomitmen untuk memberikan pengalaman unggul bagi pemangku kepentingan dan membangun nilai positif bagi pemegang saham.

title: Project Analyst Section Chief
description:
Jobdesk:
  1. Memeriksa budget project (RAP) awal project berdasarkan nilai material, upah dan pengeluaran.
  2. Melakukan analisa terhadap RAP Project vs RAP dari Engineering Business.
  3. Memberikan feedback kepada Engineering Business Dept. terhadap perhitungan RAP dan RAB yang lebih baik untuk project-project berikutnya.
  4. Menganalisa dan mengusulkan standar Upah Pekerja harian.
  5. Memeriksa dan menyetujui perhitungan upah pekerja harian.
  6. Memeriksa Laporan Realisasi Cash Flow dan membuat interpretasi/ penjelasan dari laporan tersebut untuk dipresentasikan kepada manajemen.
  7. Memberikan rekomendasi progress yang harus dicapai oleh suatu project berdasarkan analisa data-data yang ada.
  8. Mengevaluasi nilai kerja tambah/kurang terhadap kontrak utama dan memastikan terbitnya SPK dan penagihan terhadap kerja tambah/kurang yang dikerjakan.
  9. Memastikan semua administrasi project dikerjakan baik oleh Site Project maupun tim dalam bagiannnya.
  10. Menganalisa pengeluaran yang terjadi di Site Project.
Persyaratan:
  • Usia maks. 30 tahun.
  • Pendidikan minimal S1 Teknik Industri/ Akuntansi.
  • Menyukai detail.
  • Memiliki kemampuan analitis yang kuat.
  • diutamakan berpengalaman dalam analisa control budget.
  • Senang belajar hal baru.
  • Bersedia untuk ditugaskan ke luar kota.
  • Rajin, tekun, tepat waktu.
  • Teliti, Kreatif dan Inovatif.
  • Menguasai Microsoft Office.

company.name: PT Unicorn Tosan Perkasa
company.description:
PT. Unicorn Tosan Perkasa was established on July 16th, 1993. It was started from the love and passion of the founders to electrical installation. Since the formative years, our hard works, experiences, high standard services, and up to date innovations has made our small business into a well-known company with over wider scope of works.
We offer wide range of services from conceptualization to design, installation, commissioning, and testing. To guarantee the best quality of our projects, we produce switchboard that integrates with our system installation. For every projects that we do, innovation to achieve optimal system with reliable products is our priority, so clients will have efficient system with lower investment or lower operational cost.
To ensure our project’s result, we provide professional human resources, excellent customer services and quality management to come up clients' expectation.
