title: Sales & Consultant Supervisor
description:
• Candidate must possess at least Bachelor's Degree in Finance/Accountancy/Banking or equivalent.
  • Required language(s): English
  • At least 2 Year(s) of working experience in the related field is required for this position.
  • Required Skill(s):  Memiliki pemahaman terhadap prosedur pelayanan perpajakan dan struktur organisasi di Direktorat Jendral Pajak dengan tingkat pemahaman tinggi.,  Memiliki Pemahaman terhadap Perpajakan domestik yang berlaku Dengan tingkat pemahaman menengah.,  Memiliki pemahaman terhadap standar akutansi keuangan yang berlaku dengan tingkat pemahaman menengah.,  Memiliki pemahaman dan mengerti aplikasi perpajakan e-SPT, e-Faktur, e-Bukpot, e-Filing.,  Memiliki pemahaman dan mengerti mengenai aplikasi MYOB, Zahir dan/atau Accurate.,  Memiliki pemahaman terhadap tax planning.,  Memiliki pemahaman terhadap Peraturan Perpajakan Internasional.,  Memiliki pemahaman terhadap peraturan perpajakan domestik terkait transfer pricing dan OECD Transfer Pricing guidelines.,  Memiliki Pemahaman terhadap struktur Tax Treaty.,  Memiliki pemahaman terhadap peraturan perpajakan domestik terkait Perpajakan Internasional serta OECD Model Tax Convention dan UN Model.
  • Preferably Supervisor/Coordinator specialized in Finance - Audit/Taxation or equivalent.

company.description:
Sebagai bagian dari Group PMPS (Pancamas Pipasakti), kami berdiri sejak Tahun 2005 dan kami hadir di tengah masyarakat Indonesia sebagai salah satu produsen yang bergerak dalam bidang plastik khususnya pipa uPVC  dan HDPE dengan merek dagang PiPAMAS
Sadar akan pertumbuhan industri konstruksi dan infrastruktur di Indonesia yang semakin hari semakin berkembang, sesuai dengan visi PiPAMAS yaitu menjadi produsen pipe plastik pilihan pertama di Indonesia, kami berkomitmen untuk selalu mengutamakan kepuasan pelanggan dan senantiasa menghasilkan produk berkualitas tinggi yang memenuhi standar (JIS K-6742 dan SNI), kami pun senantiasa melakukan evaluasi dan perbaikan terhadap produk, proses, sistem, dan manajemen untuk menunjang pelayanan kami kepada Anda.
Kami telah menangani prcyek dari beragam sektor seperti irigasi rumah tangga, permukiman, gedung perkantoran, water plant, dan Iain-Iain Kami selalu siap memberikan penjelasan untuk membantu masalah yang dihadapi konsumen seat pemasangan di lapangan dan layanan purna jual kami dapat selalu diandalkan untuk mengatasi masalah yang timbul setelah pipa terpasang
PiPAMAS adalah pilihan yang tepat untuk sistem pipa yang berkualitas karena PiPAMAS adalah sarana kehidupan berkualitas begi masyarakat.

company.name: PT Shafira Laras Persada
company.description:
Through idealism and creativity, SHAFIRA has grown from a small muslim fashion studio into what it is now. Its name was inspired by the word “SHAF”, that does not only mean a line, but also indicates a properly structured organization.Pioneered by Feny Mustafa at Salman Mosque ITB on 8 January 1989, SHAFIRA has turned into a major company with 24 showrooms in 15 major cities across Indonesia.
With more than 30.000 active members spread across Indonesia and other countries, SHAFIRA has tried to build a good and healthy relationship with its members through activities such as health training, fashion consultation, jilbab classes and other regular member activities. In addition to the members of SHAFIRA, the company would not have been as succesful without the help and support of the mass media. SHAFIRA relatef publications have supported the company, and made it well known in public. Along with its development, Shafira’s consistency in one of the business mission that is giving benefits for others in Corporate Social Responsibility program is well managed by Shafira Foundations.
Through elegant and exclusive designs, SHAFIRA has tried its best to accommodate the needs of both men and women alike. now, at 24th years ols, SHAFIRA is trying to bring a new wave of style, with “total look” as the concept. SHAFIRA understands that attire is an important aspect of someone’s life, and tries to incorporate both design and comfort into its line of apparel. The combination of simple and elegant design in addition high quality fabric has allowed SHAFIRA to create something for every season, be it formal, or casual. Various accessories and jilbabs that are designed to harmonize with the chosen outfits are also available.

title: Supply Chain Supervisor ( Urgently Required)
description:
Job Summary
The Supply Chain Supervisor ensures the availability of the right product in the right quantity at the right time by collaborating with all functions on site and in the region to prepare and achieve the supply plan. The Supply Chain Supervisor also provides visibility on stock availability and supply constraints, risks including inventory management.
About the job: 
  • Master Production Scheduling (supply planning)
    • Determine the net monthly requirements for the next 3 months based on contract demand and call-offs and available FG, RM inventory, and provide input for the site scheduler for the detail weekly, daily production plan.
    • Ensure all supply chain units (warehouse, shipping) are fully aware of the production status, and all work planning and execution are integrated and communicated.
    • Resolves problems expeditiously to ensure customer requirements are met.
    • Escalates unresolved issues to regional SC team
  • Material Requirements Planning
    • Schedules expedite and coordinate the delivery of all raw and packaging materials, including inter-company transfers
    • Maintains inventory above safety stock level at all times
  • Daily tracking and monitoring
    • Monitoring the daily production and QA stock releases
    • Maintaining accurate loading date in the shipping system
    • Keeping track of priority orders and shipments
  • Monitors, analyzes & reports performance utilizing information derived from each supply chain units
    • Work closely with all the supply chain units to meet the shipping dates according to sales forecast or customer requirements.
    • Constantly monitoring and analyzing the production output to meet changing customer demand and aligned with business goals
  • Define and ensure stock targets (Inventory overview, Stock level, Qualitative aspect, Coverage, stock parameters)
  • Facilitate and drive system driven planning in the site
About you: 
  • Diploma/Degree in any technical discipline &/or post graduation in supply chain/operation
  • 3+ years experience in supply chain (including but not limited to creating MRP, MPS, arrange delivery schedule, etc) IS A MUST
  • Working experience in SAP/Oracle and APO is an advantage.
  • Attention to details and ability to dealing with data by spreadsheet.
  • Strong analytical and mathematical abilities.
  • Good communication skill
  • Advance English is a MUST
  • Willing to work at Rancaekek, Sumedang

company.name: PT Welty Indah Perkasa
company.description:
WEALTHY didirikan pada tahun 2006 untuk memenuhi permintaan pasar dengan produk-produk berkualitas dan dapat diandalkan dibidang pemeliharaan aftermarket otomotif di Asia.
Dengan menggabungkan pengetahuan pendiri dan teknologi dari Eropa, kami telah menghasilkan banyak produk andalan dengan kualitas tinggi seperti Magic Spray 9 in 1, Wiper Blade, Wiper Blade Refill, Auto Bulbs, Automatic Transmission Conditioner, Power Steering Conditioner dan banyak produk lainnya dimana setiap orang dapat melakukan perawatan pada kendaraan atau aktifitas lainnya secara pribadi.
Kami menciptakan produk-produk ramah lingkungan. Hal ini telah menjadi komitmen kami sejak perusahaan ini didirikan. Seperti halnya produk berbahan dasar air yang kami buat diantaranya Karburator Foam Cleaner, produk untuk poles body kendaraan dll.
Perkembangan teknologi industri otomotif semakin meningkat. Begitu juga WEALTHY yang akan terus tumbuh dan berkembang melalui R&D Departemen untuk memenuhi industri otomotif.
Dengan berkembangnya usaha utama, Wealthy Group mengembangkan bisnisnya dibidang material bangunan diantaranya Microfiber Chamois Cloth, Cutting Disk, Granding Disk dll.
Jika suatu hari melihat pengembangan produk aftermarket untuk industri otomotif dan material bangunan, dapat dipastikan itu adalah WEALTHY.

company.name: PT Syapril Janizar
company.description:
PT. SYAPRIL JANIZAR adalah perusahaan swasta di bidang jasa konsultan yang berkedudukan di Bandung, dimiliki dan dikelola sepenuhnya oleh tenaga ahli Indonesia.
PT. SYAPRIL JANIZAR didirikan pada tanggal 12 Juli 2013 oleh tenaga-tenaga profesional yang tergerak nuraninya untuk lebih memberikan sumbangsih pemikiran, kemampuan dan kompetensinya di dalam merancang bangun, meneliti dan mengembangkan potensi sumber daya guna kepentingan pembangunan wilayah/daerah dan kesejahteraan masyarakat.
Diawali dengan beberapa tenaga ahli muda, saat ini PT. SYAPRIL JANIZAR telah memiliki tenaga ahli yang kompeten dan berpengalaman luas dalam bidang keahliannya masing-masing, agar selalu dapat mengikuti perkembangan teknologi yang senantiasa terbaharui dan untuk mempertinggi kualitas layanan kami, para tenaga ahli secara aktif ikut serta dalam program-program pengembangan sumber daya manusia, pelatihan dan seminar-seminar. Disamping itu kami juga mengundang para spesialis lokal maupun asing yang sudah diakui kepakarannya untuk dilibatkan dalam proyek-proyek yang kami laksanakan sebagai penasihat teknis apabila dibutuhkan. Dalam menangani proyek-proyek yang membutuhkan pengetahuan sangat spesifik, kami menjalin kerjasama dengan perusahaan perusahaan konsultan nasional yang berkualitas maupun konsultan asing ternama.
PT. SYAPRIL JANIZAR dalam memberikan bantuan teknis dan layanan konsultansi engineering berkualitas tinggi, perusahaan telah memiliki beberapa keunggulan sebagai berikut :
  • Tenaga inti yang terdiri dari para doktor, master dan insinyur dan spesialis profesional lainnya yang qualified sehingga dapat menjamin terlaksananya suatu pekerjaan dengan mutu terbaik.
  • Suatu database dan jaringan Tenaga Ahli berpengalaman, yang dapat menghasilkan kualitas kerja yang baik pada berbagai macam proyek.
  • Pengalaman yang cukup dalam manajemen bisnis untuk menjamin terlaksananya proyek secara ekonomis dan efisien, serta ketepatan waktu dalam pelaporan kemajuan pekerjaan.

company.name: PT Surya Multi Laksana (LOGO Jeans)
company.description:
Logo De Corps is one of  leading fashion retail company group in Indonesia,  Logo De Corps has several brands of fashion products which is growing rapidly in the business of fashion and controlled most of casual fashion products market share in Indonesia. Our brand consist of LOGO, BOMBBOOGIE, NINETY DEGREES, BODY TALK, 10PM and FOD.
The Successful of Logo De Corps was developed by the persistence and focus to provide quality and best design. Supported by powerful teams and retail partners, Logo De Corps expect to be able to deliver excellence in every brand management.
History
Starting from the aspiration to develop the fashion business in 1980, Logo De Corps strive to make the formulation of business and started with launch the casual fashion products under the brand of LOGO for female adolescent and woman. As time goes by, LOGO became one of the fashion trend center in Indonesia. Logo De Corps seeing the considerable oppoturnities for developing the retail business in Indonesia and tried to launch others fashion products to reach different target markets. Continues with launching several barands such as BOMBBOOGIE which is casual fashion products for young men and men. In the next year, Logo De Corps launched NINETY DEGREES which is the next casual fashion products for female adolescent. Logo De Corps is also launched fashion products for woman under BODY TALK brand. Further, the development in retailing business still continued by giving new colors for consumers and also preparing all new products and brands. With the increasing number of brands and the development of retailing business, Logo De Corps very optimistic about the development of this fashion business. At this time, Logo De Corps owned 4 brands of fashion and will grow over the time. LOGO, BOMBBOOGIE, NINETY DEGREES, and BODYTALK will continue to evolve along with the development of fashion, and fashion’s trends in Indonesia and also all over the world.

company.name: PT Shafira Laras Persada
company.description:
Through idealism and creativity, SHAFIRA has grown from a small muslim fashion studio into what it is now. Its name was inspired by the word “SHAF”, that does not only mean a line, but also indicates a properly structured organization.Pioneered by Feny Mustafa at Salman Mosque ITB on 8 January 1989, SHAFIRA has turned into a major company with 24 showrooms in 15 major cities across Indonesia.
With more than 30.000 active members spread across Indonesia and other countries, SHAFIRA has tried to build a good and healthy relationship with its members through activities such as health training, fashion consultation, jilbab classes and other regular member activities. In addition to the members of SHAFIRA, the company would not have been as succesful without the help and support of the mass media. SHAFIRA relatef publications have supported the company, and made it well known in public. Along with its development, Shafira’s consistency in one of the business mission that is giving benefits for others in Corporate Social Responsibility program is well managed by Shafira Foundations.
Through elegant and exclusive designs, SHAFIRA has tried its best to accommodate the needs of both men and women alike. now, at 24th years ols, SHAFIRA is trying to bring a new wave of style, with “total look” as the concept. SHAFIRA understands that attire is an important aspect of someone’s life, and tries to incorporate both design and comfort into its line of apparel. The combination of simple and elegant design in addition high quality fabric has allowed SHAFIRA to create something for every season, be it formal, or casual. Various accessories and jilbabs that are designed to harmonize with the chosen outfits are also available.

company.name: PT Maha Kreasi Indonesia
company.description:
Kami menghimbau agar Anda berhati-hati saat melamar  pekerjaan dengan selalu memastikan iklan lowongan tersebut sesuai dengan profil perusahaannya.

Waspadalah jika Anda menemukan hal-hal di bawah ini :
  • PT Maha Kreasi Indonesia tidak pernah memungut biaya apapun dalam proses rekrutmen.
  • PT Maha Kreasi Indonesia tidak pernah bekerja sama dengan travel agent / biro perjalanan tertentu dalam proses  rekrutmen.
  • Apabila Anda diminta untuk membayar sejumlah uang dalam bentuk pembayaran tiket pesawat dan hotel atau  akomodasi lainnya agar diabaikan.
  • Apabila ada Panggilan wawancara di lokasi yang tidak sesuai dengan iklan yang tertera pada iklan lowongan.
  • Jangan memberikan data pribadi atau data keuangan Anda kepada siapapun.
We need you, Creative people !

We are Creative Squad (creative agency) based in Bandung Indonesia. We're not just agency. We actually think, create and produce our ideas. That approaces each project with passion , excitement and curiosity with method and precision.
 
We hade worked in new ways of communicating and new digital solutions since 2004, always trying to invent something new and different. We mix creativity, usability and millions idea to delivering awesome experiences for your event and your business
 
Everyone knows what to do. Like a family, we gather together and work with skill, care and method.
And like every family, we discuss, laugh, argue, decide and even hug sometimes. we Like each other and work well together.
Because of you , we make it happen.

company.name: Twin Tulipware
company.description:
Profil Perusahaan
Dimulai pada tahun 2000 dimana menyuguhkan hidangan dalam peralatan plastik merupakan pemandangan yang kian akrab dengan keunggulan praktis, anti pecah, desain yang menawan dan nuansa warna yang kaya. Semua dimulai dari satu kantor dan satu pabrik di kota kembang, Bandung, Jawa Barat.
Sampai saat ini, kami berkembang memasarkan produk-produk yang inovatif dan fungsional terintegrasi melalui dua divisi usaha: Divisi Twin Tulipware dengan produk penyimpanan makanan dan peralatan masak yang ramah lingkungan dan Divisi Lady Tulip dengan produk kecantikan dan kesehatan.
Dengan filosofi Care & Grow, kami akan terus peduli dan berkembang bersama Indonesia melalui mitra kerja dan salesforce tersebar diseluruh Indonesia.
Visi dan Misi Kita
Setiap orang dan setiap rumah di Indonesia memiliki dan memakai produk Tulipware adalah visi kami dan berlandaskan bahwa kita sebagai orang Indonesia harus bangga dan menggunakan produk buatan Indonesia.
Misi kami untuk mewujudkan visi tersebut adalah sebagai berikut:
  • Kualitas (Quality and Affordable) - Menciptakan produk-produk kebutuhan rumah tangga yang berkualitas tinggi dan ramah lingkungan dengan harga terjangkau.
  • Kepuasan (Customer Satisfaction) - Mengutamakan dan meningkatkan kepuasan konsumen.
  • Karakter (Build and Empower) - Membangun institusi yang unggul di bidang pemasaran langsung dan pelatihan sumber daya manusia yang handal dibidangnya masing-masing.
  • Kesempatan (Business Opportunity) - Menjadikan peluang usaha yang menguntungkan dan berkesinambungan.

company.name: PT Karyaputra Suryagemilang ( KPSG )
company.description:
KPSG is a business service company that has 10 Branches and 12 Recruitment Center in major cities across Indonesia. Within 27 years of operation, KPSG have been serving major first tiered multinational and local companies particularly in the financial industries in the areas of Human Resource Services, Information Technology Services, and Business Process Services.

Due to significant business expansion, we just launch New KPSG as SMART business services provider that focuses in Systemized Channel Interaction, Marketing, Architecture and Interior Design, Retail, and Talent Management services, with its Out-of-the box philosophy, both by organic and by un-organic growth strategy.
For the purpose, here at Human Resource Services division, we invite you to explore your talent, skill and passion to empower clients’ confidence in their business growth by professionally-delivering trustworthy services with a personal touch.

We believe that with our reborn focus on the talents and positive work environment, you could grow together with us in a full range of future career path that mostly suitable with you.

If that sounds like you, then start your journey with us, be part of us and grow with us.

For more information about who we are, what we do and our achievement, please visit www.kpsg.com

company.name: PT Bank IBK Indonesia, Tbk
company.description:
PT Bank IBK Indonesia Tbk merupakan Bank Buku 2 hasil dari penggabungan antara PT Bank Agris Tbk dan PT Bank Mitraniaga Tbk yang resmi dilakukan pada September 2019. Perusahaan ini bergerak dalam menghimpun dan memberikan pembiayaan kepada nasabah dari berbagai segmen kredit.
Melalui dukungan dari pemilik saham mayoritas yaitu Industrial Bank of Korea, salah satu Bank Pemerintah terbesar di Korea Selatan, PT Bank IBK Indonesia berkeyakinan dapat bertumbuh dan menjadi mitra bisnis bagi masyarakat Indonesia.

title: Human Resources Officer
description:
The chance to join our dynamic Administrative Team at Bandung Independent School is an excellent opportunity for professional growth.  BIS is committed to providing a world class education for our students.  The Marketing and Events Secretary must be committed to the Vision, Mission and Values of our school community.
The successful candidate will be expected to support the programme in other areas of the school as deemed necessary by the Principal and Head of School. We offer a one-year contract.
Summary Responsibilities:
  • Responsible for personnel administration and all related to all employee administration.
  • Responsible for All aspects of financial compensation of support staff including overtime and service payments
  • Supervision of medical Insurance and BPJS Tenagakerja of administrative and support staff
  • Supervision of all leave arrangements of support staff including the recording of sick leave
  • Explaining duties to new employees
  • Preparation of Job Evaluations of support staff
  • Arrangements of daily driver assignments and transport for special occasions.
  • Budgets and purchase lists for uniforms for support staff.
Qualifications:
  • Good English communication skills
  • Minimum education: D3 in Administration, Bachelor degree majoring Management
  • 2-3 years working experience on human resources, but fresh graduate also welcome to apply
  • Familiar with BPJS Kesehatan and BPJS Ketenagakerjaan regulation
  • Knowledge of local labour laws and regulation.
  • Computer literate (Windows 7, Office 2010, Google Apps)
  • Experience in dealing and communicating with expatriates is an advantage
  • Creative-but-organized
  • Can work in team and individually with tight deadline
  • Supportive of the BIS Vision, Mission and Values
Interested applicants please submit CV including professional references, outlining your strengths, experience, and interest in BIS through Jobsreet advertisement

company.name: Bandung Independent School
company.description:
School and Community

The Bandung Independent School is a private, independent, non-profit, co-ed school located in Bandung, Indonesia. It (formerly named Bandung International School) was established in 1972 and now serves the needs of expatriate and local community in Bandung. The student population is approximately 200 and represents 21 nationalities. The language of instruction is English. The interactive, inquiry-based program is designed to offer high academic standards through innovative teaching and learning practices.

Accreditation

The school is fully accredited by the Council of International School (CIS) based in UK; the New England Associations of School and Colleges (NEASC) based in USA, and authorized by the International Baccalaureate Organization in Geneva, Switzerland.

company.name: Restaurant Angke Group
company.description:
KELEZATAN "CITA RASA KHAS HAKKA" WARISAN DARI NEGERI TIONGKOK Restoran Angke menyajikan masakan Cina khas Hakka, Food, masakan khas propinsi Kwang Tung. Ada rahasia dibalik kelezatan dan kekhasan masakan di restoran Angke, yaitu : Resep orisinil yang langsung dibawa dari Tiongkok oleh "Koh Po Hon" yang telah diwariskan kepada anak-anaknya, diantaranya seperti menu andalannya yaitu : ayam garam, lindung cah fumak, mun saklon, ikan tahu taosi, mun haisom. Bahan-bahan untuk makanan tidak memakai jasa pemasok, tetapi turun langsung sendiri ke pasar, sehingga bisa memilih bahan bagus dan berkwalitas yang sangat berpengaruh nantinya kepada cita rasa masakan yang disajikan
Product & Services
RESTORAN ANGKE MEMBUKA CABANG BARU DI KELAPA GADING, MENJAWAB KEBUTUHAN PENGANTIN "Menjelang ulang tahunnya yang ke 40, kami akan membuka cabang baru di Kelapa Gading Square, yang sepenuhnya dikelola dan dimiliki oleh keluarga besar restoran Angke," demikian penuturan dari Peter Leeansyah mewakili pihak keluarga restoran Angke. Bangunan ini terdiri dari 4 lantai dan akan segera beroperasi dan melakukan grand opening pada pertengahan September 2005. Restoran Angke Kelapa Gading merupakan cabang baru yang memiliki konsep perpaduan resto dan function hall/banquet dimana sangat cocok untuk acara pernikahan, ulang tahun, seminar, pameran karena ditunjang dengan fasilitas dan prasarana yang nyaman, Restoran Angke memiliki luas total 6.000 m², dibangun dengan biaya diatas 50 milyar.

company.name: PT Kino Indonesia Tbk
company.description: The Kino Group is a fast growing and fully diversified consumer goods manufacturing company with four main lines of business, as follows: Snacks & Confectionery, Personal Care & Household products, Pharmaceutical / Over The Counter Products, and Food & Beverages. The Kino Group started the first manufacturing venture in 1997 by establishing Kino Sentra Industrindo, a confectionery manufacturing company with its factory located in Semarang, Central Java. The instant success of Kino Coffee Candy paved the way for further expansion. In 1999 Kinocare Era Kosmetindo was founded by Kino Group to compete in the highly competitive personal care market with the launch of Ovale facial cleansers. After four years the company has produced more than ten major brands in skin care, mass cologne, feminine hygiene, kids grooming and household products. In early 2003, the Kino Group expanded into the pharmaceutical market by establishing KinoAid Indonesia, which manufactures K-100 Cold Flu Medicine and Panther Energy Drink.

title: Assistant Manager Working Capital and Treasury
qualification: Sertifikat Professional, D3 (Diploma), D4 (Diploma), Sarjana (S1), Diploma Pascasarjana, Gelar Professional, Magister (S2)
description:
Assistant Manager Working Capital and Treasury
Bandung, Full-time
Assistant Working Capital and Treasury Manager has responsibilities for cash and treasury operations, short-term borrowing and investments, as well as payments, working capital management and cash flow management. Together with Cash management specialist monitors compliance with Treasury department goals.
Things you will do
  • Lead cash management team
  • Direct, monitor project portfolios including working capital, inventory, receivable, and payable.
  • Responsible for overall Cash Management for business units within Bobobox Group
  • Manage Account Receivable and Cash Collection towards achieving timely and end to end AR ownership in terms of outstanding and overdue for each cluster
  • Participate in Supply Chain and/or Finance Performance Improvement engagements, which involve looking at inventory and project management
  • Manage relationships with key banking institutions
  • Monitor compliance activities associated with the usage of bank accounts
  • Ensure minimum cash holding and maximization of available cash
  • Provide liquidity reports for business units within the Bobobox Group
  • Monitor and coordinate cash flow forecasting for business units within Bobobox Group
  • Review weekly and monthly reporting of Bobobox performance against pre-set working capital targets
  • Present net working capital report including inventory on hand report, inventory aging, receivable aging payable aging and cash balance report to Treasury and Internal Control Manager and Head of Finance
You’ll fit in this job if you
  • Financial/Business/Accounting degree
  • At least 4 years experience of Treasury Management Systems, cash flow management techniques and working capital management
  • Proven leadership experience of multinational company, culturally diverse teams
  • Strong numerical and analytical skills, problem solver
  • Advanced skills in Excel and Powerpoint.
  • Ability to multi-task and work within tight timelines
  • High standards of Integrity and Reliability
  • Collaborative approach with the ability to work effectively in a matrix environment and across multiple teams
  • Ability to take the Initiative to make decisions and problems solve
  • Able to communicate effectively across internal & external parties
  • Excellent interpersonal and communication skills
  • Enjoys operating with a sleeves rolled up approach and can balance operational execution with leading a team
  • Specialization in Treasury is added advantage
  • Required Languages - English

company.name: PT Asuransi Raksa Pratikara
company.description:
PENGUMUMAN :
  • Asuransi Raksa Pratikara tidak pernah memungut biaya apapun dalam proses rekrutmen.
  • Asuransi Raksa Pratikara tidak pernah bekerja sama dengan travel agent / biro perjalanan tertentu dalam proses rekrutmen.
  • Apabila Anda diminta untuk membayar sejumlah uang dalam bentuk pembayaran tiket pesawat dan hotel atau akomodasi lainnya agar diabaikan.
  • Jangan memberikan data pribadi atau data keuangan Anda kepada siapapun.
  • Jika membutuhkan klarifikasi lebih lanjut dapat langsung menghubungi Asuransi Raksa Pratikara
Asuransi Raksa Pratikara was established in 1975 and conducts business operation based on the motto “Prudent and Trusted”. Our service qualities are enshrined in our professional, reliable, experienced and conscientious staff. Armed with the latest innovative insurance knowledge, we are constantly prepared to deliver high quality insurance services to our clientele. Our services comprise 19 offices nation-wide in Indonesia supported by the latest information technology. Communications among branches are performed through on-line network.
Product & Services
Driven by the customers trust built up over the years, we never stop endeavoring to improve the quality of our services. As a testimony to our commitment to quality service, we implemented 24-hour customer service and free car-towing service within the Jakarta-Bogor-Depok-Tangerang-Bekasi area in 2003. Having gained wide acclaim from customers, the free car-towing service was expanded to the area of Bandung and Surabaya. In 2004, we once again materialized our commitment to the enhancement of customer satisfaction by launching Raksa Gold Club (RGC), which provides dedicated services to motor-car policy holders with sum-insured of and above US$ 70,000. No efforts have been spared to ensure our best services to our customers. In 2005, we created Raksa Emergency Quick Service (REQS) rendering quick assistance to customers encountering emergency on the road, such as flat tires and car engine failure. Following the success of Raksa Gold Club, we achieved another milestone in upgrading our claim service by launching Raksa Silver Club (RSC) which is specifically aimed at pampering customers with motor insurance coverage below US$ 70,000. The advent of RSC brings in a new touch in insurance world which distinguishes Asuransi Raksa Pratikara from other insurers. Under our claim service motto “MUCAK” (Mudah, Cepat, Akrab which is translated as Easy, Fast, Friendly) all customers visiting RSC will enjoy relaxing ambience and affable claim service.

company.name: PT Finansia Multi Finance (Kredit Plus)
company.description:
PT Finansia Multi Finance (“FMF” or “the Company”) was founded in 1994. FMF received its multifinance licence in 1994 and is fully licenced to conduct a full range of multifinance activities including consumer finance, leasing, factoring and credit cards.
Today, FMF and its kreditplus brand are established as leading players within the multifinance sector with a focus on the used motorcycle financing, used car financing and white goods financing segments. As at 30 June 2014, FMF finances 772,234 customers through a proprietary distribution network of 313 branches / POS outlets and supported by a workforce of 13,682 employees.
On its establishment, FMF adopted a dual focus on both the retail and commercial segment largely in response to the opportunities available in the market. Following the Asian Financial Crisis (“AFC”), FMF, like many other financial institutions in Indonesia, adjusted its strategic business model and risk management framework to reflect lessons learnt over the period.
Over its 20 years of operation, FMF has weathered the course of a number of credit cycles and financial crises through a willingness and flexibility to adapt its business model and practices in response to shifting regulatory and operating environments. This adaptability has provided FMF with valuable operating experience within a number of different business segments and product groups across both the retail and commercial markets.

company.description:
Through idealism and creativity, SHAFIRA has grown from a small muslim fashion studio into what it is now. Its name was inspired by the word “SHAF”, that does not only mean a line, but also indicates a properly structured organization.Pioneered by Feny Mustafa at Salman Mosque ITB on 8 January 1989, SHAFIRA has turned into a major company with 24 showrooms in 15 major cities across Indonesia.
With more than 30.000 active members spread across Indonesia and other countries, SHAFIRA has tried to build a good and healthy relationship with its members through activities such as health training, fashion consultation, jilbab classes and other regular member activities. In addition to the members of SHAFIRA, the company would not have been as succesful without the help and support of the mass media. SHAFIRA relatef publications have supported the company, and made it well known in public. Along with its development, Shafira’s consistency in one of the business mission that is giving benefits for others in Corporate Social Responsibility program is well managed by Shafira Foundations.
Through elegant and exclusive designs, SHAFIRA has tried its best to accommodate the needs of both men and women alike. now, at 24th years ols, SHAFIRA is trying to bring a new wave of style, with “total look” as the concept. SHAFIRA understands that attire is an important aspect of someone’s life, and tries to incorporate both design and comfort into its line of apparel. The combination of simple and elegant design in addition high quality fabric has allowed SHAFIRA to create something for every season, be it formal, or casual. Various accessories and jilbabs that are designed to harmonize with the chosen outfits are also available.

company.name: PT Agate International
company.description:
Agate is an award-winning game developer based in Bandung, Indonesia.
It was founded in April 2009 by 18 passionate and ‘crazy’ founders. We focus on crafting high quality entertainment game as well as delivering serious games for corporate and brand via training games, advertising games, and education games.

Started from a humble premise of fun.
Agate has produced over 200 games and it has been played by over 5 million people from Indonesia and the world. Agate is powered by 100 talented and spirited crews on their mission to make the world a better place for everyone.

Playing at work and working to play.
Work hard, play hard. That’s the usual thing in our workplace. Agate is a great place to work. You can work, have fun, and play games from arcade to board game in our workplace. We also provide many great books to develop our crew’s skill and broaden their knowledge.

Explore the game industry with us.
Not just making games, Agate always wanted to create better ecosystem for local game industry. We have established the Agate Academy to provide courses materials, and curriculum about game development. we also have partnered up with 10 universities to help us develop young and fresh talents who are interested in the game industry.

company.name: PT Suparma Tbk
company.description:
PT Suparma Tbk was established in 1976 on a site of five (5) hectares land in Surabaya, Indonesia and employed approximately 100 people. The first paper was rolled out in 1978 using a 7,000 ton per year paper machine.
Responding to the growing paper demand in the country, in 1984 the company decided to roll out her first expansion program by adding there (3) units of Paper Machine and raised her total production capacity to 51,000 ton per year.
In 1992, the company further invested another two (2) units of Paper Machine with capacity of 99,000 tons p.a. to accommodate the strong increase of paper demand in the market in tandem with the Indonesian government industrialization program.
In line with globalization era, PT Suparma Tbk took a profound move in becoming a public company and listed in Jakarta Stock Exchange in 1994.
Today, located on a land of twenty one (21) hectares, PT Suparma Tbk operates 6 units of Paper Machine with a total combined capacity of 150,000 tons p.a. and supported by approximately 1,500 delegated employees.
Holding the motto of 'Continues Improvement', PT Suparma Tbk actively serves both domestic and international market with high quality products, services and meeting the customer expectations.

Vela Prima Nusantara a privately funded startup company with a mission to create safe, reliable, clean, and economic urban mobility solutions. Currently our company is in conceptual design phase for urban air mobility (UAM) project. This is a good opportunity for you to be involved in the early aircraft development design process for compliance with strict airworthiness requirements for commercial transport. You will work with very experienced senior engineers from aerospace industry here in Indonesia. Let’s build a great product to be remembered by future generations.

  • Required Skill(s): Basic Aircraft Development and one of the following aeronautics specialisation knowledge: Configuration, Flight Control, Avionics, Flight Physics, Propulsion, Lightweight Structure, Electrical, Safety
  • Related skill(s), specialisation specific: Matlab, Python, C, C++, AutoCAD, Catia, Solidworks, ANSYS Mechanical, ANSYS CFD, Nastran
  • Preferably Staff (non-management & non-supervisor) specialized in Engineering - Others or equivalent.
  • Good communication skill and team player
  • Excited to explore many design considerations

company.name: PT Shafira Laras Persada
company.description:
Through idealism and creativity, SHAFIRA has grown from a small muslim fashion studio into what it is now. Its name was inspired by the word “SHAF”, that does not only mean a line, but also indicates a properly structured organization.Pioneered by Feny Mustafa at Salman Mosque ITB on 8 January 1989, SHAFIRA has turned into a major company with 24 showrooms in 15 major cities across Indonesia.
With more than 30.000 active members spread across Indonesia and other countries, SHAFIRA has tried to build a good and healthy relationship with its members through activities such as health training, fashion consultation, jilbab classes and other regular member activities. In addition to the members of SHAFIRA, the company would not have been as succesful without the help and support of the mass media. SHAFIRA relatef publications have supported the company, and made it well known in public. Along with its development, Shafira’s consistency in one of the business mission that is giving benefits for others in Corporate Social Responsibility program is well managed by Shafira Foundations.
Through elegant and exclusive designs, SHAFIRA has tried its best to accommodate the needs of both men and women alike. now, at 24th years ols, SHAFIRA is trying to bring a new wave of style, with “total look” as the concept. SHAFIRA understands that attire is an important aspect of someone’s life, and tries to incorporate both design and comfort into its line of apparel. The combination of simple and elegant design in addition high quality fabric has allowed SHAFIRA to create something for every season, be it formal, or casual. Various accessories and jilbabs that are designed to harmonize with the chosen outfits are also available.

company.name: Erajaya Group
company.description:
Established in 1996, PT Erajaya Swasembada Tbk. (“Erajaya”) has grown beyond an integrated mobile telecommunication device importer, distributor and retailer, where the Company is also acknowledged as the largest and most trusted companies in its business in Indonesia.
Erajaya engages in the distribution and retail of mobile telecommunication devices, such as mobile phones and tablets, subscriber identity module card (SIM Card), mobile network operator voucher top-up, accessories, and gadgets such as computers and other electronic devices.
By the end of 2011, Erajaya executed initial public offering (IPO) corporate action by offering 31.7% of its shares. With ERAA ticker code, Erajaya is officially listed as Issuer at Indonesia Stock Exchange.
In September 2012, PT Eralink International, one of Erajaya’s majority shareholders released another 8.3% shares ownership to public that brought final shares ownership owned by public to 40.03% as end of 2012.
Erajaya has built strategic partnership with various distinguished global brands, in addition, the Company also ditributes Venera, a product of Erajaya. The Company, further, also cooperates with credible network operators in Indonesia for their products distribution.

company.name: PT Repex Wahana
company.description:
The services that customers ask of a logistics company are becoming more and more varied and customized.  Whether you are sending goods or documents, you need the assurance that these will be sent quickly, safely and efficiently.  If your business involves  delivery of goods, you will need to contact various service providers for packaging, licensing, documentation services, and a courier or freight forwarder.  Each time you send a package, you will need to contact at least three different service providers.
RPX is here to facilitate and shorten this process. Whatever type of goods or documents you need to send, wherever you wish to send them, whether by air, land or sea, we have the infrastructure and network at your disposal. Even customs clearance and storage while your goods are in transit can be managed by RPX. RPX is supported by the latest state-of-the-art technology to answer your every needs. The comprehensive services offered by RPX along with our local and international network throughout the major cities in Indonesia and the world, will make everything easy for you.
For career development, RPX provides a various range of career opportunities at different levels throughout Indonesia. Here, you will be given chances to develop yourself, take responsibilities, master challenges, overcome problems, and improve your skills. We are committed to stimulate your improvement and development, and support your growth, to help you achieve your goals and succeed with us.

company.name: VERANDA EXECUTIVE RESOURCES
company.description:
Since 2009, VERANDA EXECUTIVE RESOURCES has been providing human resources management consulting services to businesses, industry, non-profits, schools, and healthcare organizations.
Our mission is to provide customized, results driven, cost effective services to its client companies so that human resources management problems can be addressed, resolved and stay resolved.
For organizations to stay effective and competitive in today's market, quality training and staff development for management employees is essential. Human resources managment consultant services are a good investment because:
  • 80% of all employees discharged from a company are let go because of poor interpersonal skills.
  • On-site training, coaching and team building programs are more cost effective than sending employees out to a conference site.
  • VERANDA EXECUTIVE RESOURCES programs are customized to meet specific needs.
If your management employees need training in a human resources topic not listed in this brochure, please call our office.

company.name: Lazada eLogistics Indonesia
company.description:
Everything written about eCommerce opportunity in Southeast Asia is overwhelmingly positive - a population of 600 million plus consumers, growing internet connectivity, broad penetration of smartphones, a young and tech-savvy population and expanding GDP and purchasing power. The region’s rate of eCommerce share of total retail at around 1 percent shows enormous opportunity in comparison to 14-17% in the west and China.
Despite these extraordinary possibilities, the logistics environment in Southeast Asia remains a huge challenge.
Lazada eLogistics (LeL) mission is to address these challenges, delight customers and win them over to eCommerce. We are building an innovative, highly visible, low-cost logistics network. Our operating model is based on an ecosystem of logistics partners stitched together with state of the art technology and our modular infrastructure
Lazada eLogistics (LeL) is the Logistics arm of the Lazada Group and is structured around four operating Business Units
  • Express: own B2C last mile delivery capabilities from pick-up to sort to delivery
  • Transport: Management of our ecosystem of partners (3PLs) along all the transportation components
  • Fulfilment: Operation of a network of warehouses that can fill retail orders on our own behalf, as well as providing fulfilment services to merchants and international brands
  • Crossborder: Build-up & management of international logistics network giving seamlessly access to ASEAN

company.name: PT Setia Anugrah Medika
company.description:
We, PT. Setia Anugrah Medika, a health care company specialist in a Laboratory Diagnostics Products from USA, Belgium, Canada, China, Germany, Italy, Japan and India.
PT Setia Anugrah Medika was established in 2002 as medical diagnostic products distributor with central office in Jakarta and branch office in Medan, Bandung, Semarang, Surabaya. Our company distributes products from all around the world, such as Belgium, Canada, China, German, India, Italy, Japan, and the United States.
Our company is managed by professionals, supported by marketing and technical support team experienced in the field of Laboratory Diagnostics
With “GIVING THE BEST QUALITY PRODUCTS, PRICE, AND SERVICE TO CUSTOMERS” as our mission, we commit to put customers satisfaction as priority with the best after sales service from instrument training to servicing. We always improve to have long lasting relationships as a form of the company's efforts to become a professional business partner for customers and principals
PT Setia Anugrah Medika as ‘The Source of Diagnostic Products” has a wide range of diagnostic products. Some of diagnostic products that we distribute are microbiology, heart disease marker analyzer, chemical reagents and analyzer, ELISA, ESR analyzer, hematology analyzer, haemostatic and coagulation analyzer, neonatal screening test, laboratory accessories, rapid test, women health product, etc.

title: Warehouse Coordinator
description:

company.name: PT Multidaya Teknologi Nusantara
company.description:
What We Are
We are the internet of things (IoT) startup for fish/shrimp farming, purely local, based on Bandung, full of action, all passion, no drama, no bullshit 
What We Do
We build a smart feeding solution that can automatically feed the fish, sense the fish’s appetite, and connected to the internet 
Why We Do It
We want to solve the biggest problem from one of the most crucial and fastest-growing industry in the world: aquaculture. We strive to help hundreds of millions of farmers globally by delivering this breakthrough, especially for people at the bottom of the pyramid. eFishery is trying to disrupt aquaculture industry and tackles global challenge in food security, creating real impacts for our mankind.

company.name: PT Laksana Kurnia Mandiri Sejati
company.description:
PT Laksana Kurnia Mandiri Sejati, established in 1997 with the current total capacity of 37,000 spindles, produces up to 16 tons of yarn per day. The mill has two locations in Tegal and Bandung. Tegal plant began its first production in 1998. Bandung plant was acquired from PT Vonnex Indonesia in 2006.Both mills are equipped with wide range of Japanese machinery of Modified Cotton Spinning 51 mm from Ohara-Hergeth Blowing Machines to Murata MachConers, and Murata TFO machines.
The mill specializes in Acrylic yarn and supplies to our customers in more than 25 countries, including: Japan, South Korea, Philippines, England, USA, Mexico, and still rapidly expanding its market. The mill main production items are the following:
> Acrylic Non-bulky 100% yarn
> Acrylic Blend (with Polyester, Rayon, and Wool) yarn
> Acrylic High-bulky yarn
> Rayon 100% yarn
> Rayon Polyester yarn
> Rayon Dope Dyed Black
Supplyable in singles and doubles on cones or hank. Yarns are produced with high quality fiber from Mitsubishi Rayon Co. Ltd, Japan Exlan Co. Ltd, Saehan Industries Inc., PT Indorama Synthetics Tbk, PT South Pacific Viscose

Job description:
  • Experienced in handling of analytical instruments like; HPLC, GC, Spectrophotometer, IR, UV, AAS and analytical equipment’s.
  • Hand on experience to analyses the API and Finished product, essentially for sterile SVP/non sterile product.
  • Good documentation skill to make reports after analysis.
  • Knowledge about GLP and time management to complete task on time.

company.name: PT Sanbe Farma
company.description:
PT Sanbe Farma adalah perusahaan farmasi yang berkantor pusat di Bandung, saat ini Kami sedang membutuhkan karyawan baru yang professional, cekatan dan bertanggung jawab untuk dapat bergabung bersama kami
Sanbe Farma was founded in 1975. As of now after more than three decades since inception, we are the largest pharmaceutical manufacturers in Indonesia and according the recent IMS Report, we rank highest among all the Pharmaceutical Manufacturers in Indonesia including Multinational Companies. Out of top 10 products ethically prescribed, 4 products are from Sanbe. Our market coverage in Indonesia includes more than 37,000 Doctors served by 1,000 Medical Representatives, through our associate’s net-work of 1,100 Sales persons, 35 depots, 60 sub-depots and our corporate work force consisting 8,000 personnel. Our eight manufacturing facilities in Indonesia are cGMP approved plants as per the International Standards. Our sterile preparations unit (LVPs & SVPs) is the first in South East Asia with State-of-the-Art manufacturing equipment and technology from US and Europe and PIC(S) & TGA, Australia compliant.
Our international operations in 20 countries are set to make substantial contribution to the global healthcare. Our international operations cover not only export of our formulations to various developing and under developed countries, but also seek partnerships and alliances from and to developed and regulated markets such as North America and Europe with an aim to put Sanbe Farma on the global map to supply Generic and specialty formulations not only for Indonesia but also to the rest of the world. We are also looking for new acquisitions in potential markets to make our products globally available at affordable prices.
Our propinquity to invest in profitable and strategic ventures would encourage potential and strategic companies to partner with us for mutual benefit not only for generic formulations but also for New Drug Delivery Systems (NDDs), New Chemical Entities (NCEs) and Biosimilar products.
We are committed to strive for continued achievement to provide quality products for quality health through our sincere endeavor to become global generic pharmaceutical manufacturer from Indonesia in the days to come.

company.name: FKS Group
company.description:
FKS Group is a South-East Asian holding company focused on food, energy and property.
Its companies combine a strong commitment to logistics and infrastructure with deep domestic and international understanding to realize the potential of businesses and people across the region.
The Group’s commitment is strengthened by more than 40 years of experience and expertise that extends globally to sourcing, manufacturing, refining, logistics, shipping, financing, risk management as well as trading logistics, shipping, financing, risk management as well as trading.
Rapidly growing, FKS Group is focusing on import, trading, process and distribution of physical grain commodities such as food and feed in Indonesia. As the number one importer and distributor of soybean and soybean meal in Indonesia, the Group handles huge supply chain volume in both food and feed sectors.
FKS Group strives to exceed stakeholders’ expectation and investment by ensuring a continued growth of the Group and developing employee’s competencies. The Group’s significant interests in sugar refineries, energy and property developments are managed by the subsidiaries.
For more information please visit www.fksgroup.com

RGF is stands for RECRUIT GLOBAL  FAMILY, a global brand of Japan’s largest recruiting and information service company, Recruit Holdings co., Ltd.
We created this brand of our commitment to take on a new challenge to leverage on Recruit Group’s more over 50 years of industry experience and business network in Japan, to provide new opportunities to our clients across the region.
RGF HR AGENT takes charge of RGF’s business entity in general recruitment services. We provide total human resource services to clients at every stage of staff placement, such as evaluation, remuneration, and staff training. title: Claim Inspector
qualification: SMA, SMU/SMK/STM, Sertifikat Professional, D3 (Diploma), D4 (Diploma)
description:
Claim Inspector. Indonesia
We are looking for Claim Inspector. As a part of OLX Group, we are a team of 9,000 ambitious, curious people building marketplace platforms that make it super easy for anyone to buy and sell almost anything, boosting local economies.
What you will be doing:
  • Verify and validate objectively every claim submitted by Partners
  • Assist warehouse technically about car maintenance & problem-solving.
  • Support Dealer Advisor Technically to Explain & negotiate with Dealers
  • Re-Inspect the Cars that want to send for Home Delivery report all potential claims to Claim Manager.
Who we’re looking for
  • Has experience as Service Advisor minimum 3 years
  • Has completed training level Senior Technician / Level 2 from ATPM
  • Someone with passion for details and ability to ‘dig in’
What can you expect from us and what do we offer?
  • Dynamic, and smart colleagues who love to work with great people like you and achieve success together.
  • Exposure to global opportunities; collaboration with a global team and/or global training.
  • Competitive compensation and benefits.
  • Opportunity to make a difference and to help improve people’s lives by bringing them together for win-win exchanges.
  • Ability to make a major contribution as we reinvent the OLX brand and strive to create Indonesia’s most beloved consumer technology brand.
What you need to know about us:
  • OLX is the world’s leading classifieds platform in high-growth markets. It’s available in more than 35 countries and in over 50 languages. The platform makes it so easy to connect people to buy, sell or exchange used goods and services.
  • OLX is part of the OLX Group, a global product and tech company with 17 brands, +40 countries, +5000 people and one mindset.
  • Our mission is to make it super easy for people to buy and sell almost anything, boosting local economies.
  • We are proud to be different, and we work differently too. We combine the spirit and agility of a start-up with the maturity that comes from being part of a 100 year-old company.
  • We are curious, ambitious and allergic to corporate interference. We improvise, experiment and push each other further, embracing uncertainty and driving change.
If you are as excited as us about this position and our company, we hope you join us! If you’d like to learn more about the OLX Group take a look at the other parts of our website. And remember, we are an equal opportunities employer.

At present, OLX Autos is in 7 major cities: Jabodetabek, Bandung, Semarang, Yogyakarta, Surabaya, Bali and Medan, with 100 inspection centers and a network of more than 2,000 partners.

PT Transpacific Finance was established in 1994 with the first name as PT Transpacific Mutual Finance Corporation. After changing the company names for several times, the company changed its name into PT Transpacific Finance in 2006 which has been approved by the Ministry of Finance through the Letter of Decision KEP-032/KM.5/2006.
PT Transpacific Finance is an Independent Finance Company which its primary activity is to provide financial solutions to the customers in the form of leasing financing, factoring financing, and consumer financing for new and used vehicle ownership.
With the support of the new management and a reliable resource, PT Transpacific Finance is always committed to provide financial solutions according to the customer needs by providing a quick process, flexible and professional services.
It is proven from the awards received by the company from Infobank Multifinance Awards for 2013, 2014, and 2017 successively. In addition, an award from Indonesian Financial Services Association (IFSA) as the Best Finance Company 2013 for Total Assets Under Rp 500 Billion Category.
Currently, PT Transpacific Finance focuses in developing business in Jabotabek and Bandung through the office outlets located in Jakarta, Tangerang, Depok, and Bandung. The management is committed to provide the best financial solutions for the customers, but keep prioritizing the principles of prudence and compliance with the regulations. PT Transpacific Finance has been registered and supervised by the Financial Services Authority (OJK).

PT. Multi Wahana Kencana (Mr Kitchen) is one of Indonesia’s leading provider of equipment and supplies to the foodservice & hospitality industry (HOREKA) since 2006.
 
We serve nationwide Indonesia with offices in Bandung, Jakarta, and Bali.

We work closely with our customers, which include national restaurant chains, independent restaurant operators, healthcare facilities, entertainment venues, and many other segments, to provide the products and services that will help them operate more efficiently and realize better bottom line results.

title: Chemical Lab Team Lead
description:
About the role
The Chemical Lab Team Lead is responsible to manage the overall operation of Physical & Chemical Lab for the testing of Finished Goods and Raw/Pack Material sample that comply with Good Laboratory Practices. Ultimate objective is ensure the accuracy of the testing results by doing QC plan for the lab to support the credibility of Quality Assurance Department in the factory. He / She should be actively involve on continuous improvement by doing the evaluation & interpretation of the trend results, Finished Good & Process Control sampling review, New Methods validation, Laboratory Safety practices and investigation on any physical & chemical problem. He / She will do the coordination of all lab equipment or instrument calibration within factory.
Key responsibilities include
  • Supervise the lab team member to do analysis and activity refer to Good Laboratory Practice (GLP), Good Manufacturing Practice (GMP), ISO 14000, ISO 22000, and make sure to make accurate data analysis. Including equipment maintenance/calibration.
  • Monitoring analysis all testing result and prepare the weekly and monthly report. Make corrective action and coordination with Production supervisor and Engineering supervisor to solve any micro problem. Make sure the corrective action are implemented.
  • Make sure Chemical Lab consumables (tools/glassware and materials) available. Stock take monthly. Coordination with Purchasing supervisor to purchase new equipment or materials.
  • Involve in release FG decision.
  • Internal calibration for lab equipment/instrument.
  • Compile Monthly Quality Report (incl FTQ report and FG damage)
  • Responsible for BC Ring Test & Proficiency Test. Make a schedule, preparation, organize, and compile a result. 
  • Supporting of GMP and GLP audit as auditor and implement
  • Support quality culture program, BC Excellence as team member/ agent.
About you
  • Education: Min Bachelor Degree on Chemistry or Food Technology
  • Experience (type): 2 years experiences in related field
Knowledge or specific business understanding:
  • Understand GMP, safety, food safety and quality standards and procedures, GLP
  • Understanding basic microbiology
  • Excellent laboratory knowledge
  • Leadership and team working experience required
  • Familiar with SAP & Ms. Office
  • Good English

company.name: PT Papandayan Cocoa Industries
company.description: Barry Callebaut is the world’s leading supplier of high-quality cocoa and chocolate products. Our broad range of products and services span all aspects from cocoa sourcing to fine chocolate products, which are loved by people of all ages worldwide. We are passionate about our business and work hard every day to ensure that there is enough chocolate in the world. Nothing is more important to our success than the combined expertise of our 8,500 Barry Callebaut employees around the world. Our international focus in the fascinating world of cocoa-growing and chocolate are the colorful backdrop for our many functions across a wide range of disciplines. In addition to sharing a passion for chocolate, Barry Callebaut employees live our other corporate values every day - customer focus, entrepreneurship, integrity and team spirit. We are committed to making sure that they have the right skills, know-how and deep understanding of our customers and their needs. Engaging and developing our employees is the key to our success. Because our business focus is so broad, the scope of career opportunities within Barry Callebaut can cover many functional areas.

company.name: PT Mata Pelangi Chemindo
company.description:
The history of Matapel Chemicals started in the year 1982 where the founders attained the pigment preparation manufacturing plant and the entire operation at Mandom. It was on 18th May 1985 that the founders organized and incorporated PT. Mata Pelangi Chemindo which started as pigment manufacturer.
In order to expand the business, Matapel Chemicals opened the trading division under the name of PT. Mata Pelangi Tradindo in the year 2000.
Currently Matapel Chemicals become one of the leading chemical companies in Indonesia which excels in manufacturing pigments and silicone emulsions. As the trading company, Matapel Chemicals excels in coating industries, fiberglass industries and silicone products for many industries especially textile industries. Besides those industries, Matapel Chemical also involved in other industries such as plastic, rubber, food, agriculture, etc. Matapel Chemicals market area consists of domestics and export. With 3 branches in Indonesia, Matapel Chemicals able to supply to all Indonesia area.
Matapel Chemicals success are driven by our people and their commitments to get best results by operating with full understanding and responsibility. Matapel Chemicals focus on innovation to serve our customers with better technology, diversity to ease and comfort our customers due to our broad range of products, versatility to make products that can be used in broad range of industries.

company.name: PT PANCA TERANG ABADI
company.description:
Artha Industrial Hill is an industrial estate developed by Artha Graha Group in West Karawang, West Java, with a total area of 390 ha. Artha Industrial Hill provides the international standard industrial estate with a green environment that supports small to large industries.

Artha Industrial Hill is also strategically located at West Karawang, with convenient highway access from Soekarno-Hatta International Airport, Tanjung Priok Sea Port, and access to and from other cities, such as Bandung and Cirebon. Furthermore, many world-known automotive manufactures, such as Honda, Toyota, Daihatsu, and Suzuki, are located nearby the area. Therefore, it is suitable for, but not limited to, automotive industries.

Artha Industrial Hill can be accessed from Jakarta-Cikampek Highway, exit at West Karawang 2, KM 46, and through to Trans Heksa Karawang Road. This is the main road that connects several other industrial estates and was built by a consortium of these industrial estates.

company.name: Parastar Distrindo
company.description:
Established in 1994, the group is one of the largest importer and distributor for mobile phones in Indonesia. The group, through their flagship company, Parastar Echorindo, is one of three authorized major distributor for Nokia in Indonesia with distribution area of Greater Jakarta and Kalimantan, holding 35% of national market share of Nokia products.
Overall, the Group has an integrated business model which includes sub-distributorship, retail and logistics of mobile phones.
As a group company, Parastar growing to be the one of the leading telecommunication group company which significantly contributed for Indonesian Telecommunication Industry.
Parastar Echorindo is a telecommunication importer company in Indonesia with four main distributors : Parastar Distrindo, Parastar Sukses Jaya, Sentra Makmur Sakti, and Sentra Sukses Solusindo.
Parastar keep expanding ranging from telecommunication business concept importers, distributors, through own retails chain known as “Sentra Ponsel”. By carrying the motto “Always Original”, Sentra Ponsel has become a pioneer for the choice and confidence of customers.
With supported by professional logistic and integrated system, Parastar provide professional business concept to be the most valuable corporate in providing sustainable prosperity to the stakeholder through excellence and integrated business units.

About the role
  • The Head of Finance, Indonesia, will oversee all finance activities for Barry Callebaut’s (“BC”) cocoa and chocolate entities within Indonesia; 2 legal entities in Bandung, 1 in Gresik and potential future growth in Java to follow. The role will lead teams (~ 10 people) covering (1) accounting and tax compliance, (2) treasury activities, (3) factory/supply chain and commercial finance business partnering.
  • The role will be primarily responsible for BC Indonesia’s adherence to accounting principles, practices, and procedures in compliance with all international and local regulations and company policies. He/she will also collaborate with the Accounting COE to define fit-for-purpose control frameworks and ensure implementation and full compliance of control policies in Indonesia. Ultimately, this will help drive BC’s strong growth mandate in Indonesia.
Key responsibilities include
  • Supervising the adherence to accounting principles, practices, and procedures to ensure accurate and timely financial statements in compliance with all international and local regulations and company policies.
  • Working with the Accounting COE to define fit-for-purpose control frameworks and ensure implementation and full compliance of control policies across Indonesia.
  • Coordinates activities to monitor compliance and effectiveness of financial controls. Assess the potential impact of segregation of duties conflicts; identify and implement remediation and/or compensating controls.
  • Collaborate with Corporate Tax, Treasury, and Risk departments with dealing with tax-related issues and meeting reporting requirements in compliance with the latest international accounting standards.
  • Managing relationships with external parties in Indonesia, such as customs, auditors, tax authorities, etc.
  • Facilitate effective credit controlling with the main objective to manage both customer risk profiles and working capital KPIs. 
  • Overseeing Finance Business Partnering activities and collaborating with local Management Teams: shape and define the strategy for Indonesia with a focus on margin drivers, sourcing decisions, customer/product mix, and cost leadership.
  • Evaluating investment proposals from the local commercial and factory teams.
  • Overseeing the creation of budget/forecast with key stakeholders and analysis of actual results vs budget/forecast.
  • Lead optimization projects on an ad-hoc basis, with priorities to be defined by the Regional Finance Business Partner Cocoa/Chocolate.
About you
  • Proven work experience (at least 5 years) as a Head of Finance, Director of Finance, or a similar role and at least 12 years of finance experience in total. Experience in a blue-chip manufacturing multinational environment will be an advantage.
  • Strong accounting knowledge in IFRS reporting and local statutory reporting.
  • Strong leadership ability in managing cross-functional teams across all sites in Indonesia.
  • Strong communication skills, both written and verbal, in English and Bahasa.
  • Change management experience to embed finance best practices within the organization.
  • Functional knowledge of SAP.
  • Accounting Degree with Chartered Accountant qualifications an advantage
  • Willingness to travel (25%), domestic and regional travel in APAC.
  • Experience in cocoa and/or chocolate industries preferred.

company.name: PT Papandayan Cocoa Industries
company.description: Barry Callebaut is the world’s leading supplier of high-quality cocoa and chocolate products. Our broad range of products and services span all aspects from cocoa sourcing to fine chocolate products, which are loved by people of all ages worldwide. We are passionate about our business and work hard every day to ensure that there is enough chocolate in the world. Nothing is more important to our success than the combined expertise of our 8,500 Barry Callebaut employees around the world. Our international focus in the fascinating world of cocoa-growing and chocolate are the colorful backdrop for our many functions across a wide range of disciplines. In addition to sharing a passion for chocolate, Barry Callebaut employees live our other corporate values every day - customer focus, entrepreneurship, integrity and team spirit. We are committed to making sure that they have the right skills, know-how and deep understanding of our customers and their needs. Engaging and developing our employees is the key to our success. Because our business focus is so broad, the scope of career opportunities within Barry Callebaut can cover many functional areas.

PENGUMUMAN :
  • PT Wicaksana Overseas International, Tbk. tidak pernah memungut biaya apapun dalam proses rekrutmen.
  • PT Wicaksana Overseas International, Tbk. tidak pernah bekerja sama dengan travel agent / biro perjalanan tertentu dalam proses rekrutmen.

  • Jika membutuhkan klarifikasi lebih lanjut dapat langsung menghubungi PT Wicaksana Overseas International, Tbk.
About PT. Wicaksana Overseas International, Tbk.
Wicaksana was established in 1973, distributing fast moving consumer goods such as instant noodles, snacks, beverages, personal care and also pharmaceutical products. As the underlying goal of any business is to drive growth, DKSH’s acquisition of the majority of PT Wicaksana’s shares in 2017 has provided the basis for the expansion of Wicaksana’s market position. Leveraging DKSH’s long-standing experience, PT Wicaksana successfully increased its distribution centers and channels as well as its marketing and sales capabilities. After being part of DKSH for two years, Wicaksana is delighted to introduce its new logo in line with DKSH’s look and feel, referencing the Fantree plant.
With a strategy for growth and in-depth knowledge gathered in specialized Business Units, Wicaksana and DKSH focus on consistently delivering results. Two years after the acquisition, Wicaksana has been growing rapidly ever since. Wicaksana operates across Indonesia’s major cities and has more than 1,000 employees. The acquisition has helped build trust and has secured big partnerships with both multinational and local companies. The client portfolio includes names, such as Mars, Unilever Asia or Coca Cola Distribution Indonesia and the STT company, but also Tokopedia, as a local giant in the e-commerce sector.
To distribute all its clients’ products, Wicaksana operates across all major cities in Indonesia. Wicaksana recorded net sales of IDR 1,85 Trillion in 2019.

company.description:
Quadra is a brand owned by Lyman Group. Quality and reliability is our business. A reliable, expert and high-technological partner for top-level architecture and interior design projects worldwide.
Quadra specializes in providing extra large slabs for your luxurious and sophisticated high end design and building projects. As a sintered slab, quadra embodies the form of an ultra fine man made stone, brought to perfection by employing the exact same method of pressure and heat in the same way Mother Nature does only faster. This ‘sinterization’ process fuses the stone particles together to the point where they become one unified material. The creation of combining the highest inspiration for design. Europian quality raw materials, rigorous process in every step, the latest and improved Italian technological machinery and meticulous quality control ensures that the final products achieve the highest level of quality.

company.name: PT Finansia Multi Finance (Kredit Plus)
company.description:
PT Finansia Multi Finance (“FMF” or “the Company”) was founded in 1994. FMF received its multifinance licence in 1994 and is fully licenced to conduct a full range of multifinance activities including consumer finance, leasing, factoring and credit cards.
Today, FMF and its kreditplus brand are established as leading players within the multifinance sector with a focus on the used motorcycle financing, used car financing and white goods financing segments. As at 30 June 2014, FMF finances 772,234 customers through a proprietary distribution network of 313 branches / POS outlets and supported by a workforce of 13,682 employees.
On its establishment, FMF adopted a dual focus on both the retail and commercial segment largely in response to the opportunities available in the market. Following the Asian Financial Crisis (“AFC”), FMF, like many other financial institutions in Indonesia, adjusted its strategic business model and risk management framework to reflect lessons learnt over the period.
Over its 20 years of operation, FMF has weathered the course of a number of credit cycles and financial crises through a willingness and flexibility to adapt its business model and practices in response to shifting regulatory and operating environments. This adaptability has provided FMF with valuable operating experience within a number of different business segments and product groups across both the retail and commercial markets.

company.name: PT Shukaku Indonesia
company.description:
PT Shukaku Indonesia adalah perusahaan yang bergerak di peralatan listrik dari Indonesia yang berkembang secara signifikan dalam waktu yang relatif singkat.
 
Kami mengawali langkah besar kami dengan menyuplai alat kelistrikan, terutama lampu, ke pasar dalam negeri. Kami adalah pioneer produk asli Indonesia di industri lampu dan alat kelistrikan. Kini, dalam hitungan satu dekade lebih, kami telah menjadi pemain penting pada skala nasional dan telah mampu merambah pangsa pasar yang luas di seluruh Indonesia.
Di bawah bendera PT Globalindo Jaya Semesta, Shukaku kemudian mendirikan pabrik di wilayah Cileungsi, Jawa Barat. Berdirinya pabrik Shukaku di Cileungsi menjadi tonggak penting dalam kejayaan Shukaku yang terus berkibar. Shukaku semakin mengukuhkan jejaknya sebagai produk asli Indonesia yang membuktikan prestasi penjualan tersendiri di dalam negeri. Shukaku berhasil mengukir sebuah prestasi yang gemilang untuk produk Indonesia yang terhitung muda.
 
Sebagai produsen lampu dan alat kelistrikan yang menjunjung tinggi kualitas, kami dikenal sebagai merek premium dengan harga terjangkau. Produk kami memiliki kualitas berstandar internasional dan telah menerapkan sistem produksi yang sesuai dengan ISO 2001:9008. Produk-produk  hemat energi kami juga telah mengantongi Sertifikat SNI dan CE yang membuatnya mampu bersaing tidak hanya dalam skala nasional, tapi juga internasional.

title: ENVIRONMENT ENGINEERING

company.name: PT Daya Pratama Lestari
company.description:
PT. Daya Pratama Lestari is an integrated textile company that produces high-quality specialty dyeing fabrics. Established on May 15, 2000 id les Mr. Herawan Koswara as one of the fast growing textile companies in Indonesia, we use the latest technologies and implement high standards of quality.
Keeping up with the current developments of modern technologies (machineries and other equipments) enables us to produce high quality products at the best prices within the turn-time required by our customers.

title: Plant Manager (Textile Plant, Bandung Selatan, Contract)
qualification: Sertifikat Professional, D3 (Diploma), D4 (Diploma), Sarjana (S1), Diploma Pascasarjana, Gelar Professional, Magister (S2)
description:
Our client is a family-owned textile (polyester) business, started operating since 1980. Its primary plant is based in Dayeuhkolot, Bandung with other plant being constructed in Sragen, Jawa Tengah. Currently, they are looking for a plant general manager with qualifications:
  • Experienced as a plant manager in a multinational company (or similar role) for around 5 years;
  • Familiar with textile or chemical manufacturing process, especially printing, dyeing, and weaving;
  • Certified Six Sigma Black Belt;
  • Experienced in continuous improvement methodology;
  • Able to communicate well with every level of production process; and
  • Able to join immediately (maximum of 1-month notice)
Main responsibilities, but not limited to:
  • Planning, organizing, directing, and running optimum day-to-day operations.
  • Increasing production, assets capacity and flexibility while minimizing unnecessary costs and improving current quality standards.
  • Implement strategies in alignment with strategic initiatives and provide a clear sense of direction and focus.
  • Develop systems and processes that track and optimize productivity and standards, metrics and performance targets to ensure effective return on assets.
  • Works closely with the owner and responsible in supervising production, maintenance, and PPIC departments.

company.name: PT JAC Indonesia
company.description: JAC Recruitment Indonesia is an international recruitment consultancy,started in UK as a part of TAZAKI GROUP. JAC Recruitment operates in 10 countries with 25 offices in London, Singapore, Japan, Malaysia, Indonesia, Thailand, China, Korea, Hong Kong, Vietnam and India. JAC Recruitment Indonesia started in 2002 in Jakarta, and then expand offices in Cikarang and Surabaya. With more than 100 consultants, we are committed for our clients and candidates satisfaction by connecting the right positions to the right people.

company.name: PT Senotexindo Jayalestari
company.description:
Founded in 1995,we're currently a well established Dyeing Finishing and Sewing Thread Company based in Rancaekek,Kabupaten Bandung,West Java.
We accept commision dyeing for variety range of fabrics such as Cotton Combed,Rayon Spandex,ITY,Polyester Spandex . For yarn product we accept Polyester,Cotton,TC,TR,Acrylic. We also produce Spun Polyester Sewing Thread,Embroidery Thread,and many other types of yarn.
Currently we operate with around 300 employee.  Our customers spread around Java,Sumatera,and Bali.
Our vision is to be the leading manufacturer in terms of quality and service in our field of industry.

title: Network Engineer
qualification: SMA, SMU/SMK/STM, Sertifikat Professional, D3 (Diploma), D4 (Diploma), Sarjana (S1)

company.name: PT. HARIFF DAYA TUNGGAL ENGINEERING
company.description:
PT. HARIFF Daya Tunggal Engineering a national privately owned company especially dealing with engineering service, system design, manufacturing and turnkey project of telecommunication, computer, and control system.Beginning in 1982, Hariff proceed his activity in HF, VHF, and UHF Communication Project. Since then, the company has extended its capability by utilizing Computer and Control Technologies in accomplishment of the project. Each of Hariff Engineer is recognized specialist in one or more areas of Telecommunication, Computer and Control.

The experience of the engineers in several national projects such as satellite and terrestrial radio communication for Telecommunication operator, Defense Ministry, and Oil Industry, etc. Enable the firm to undertake complex project involving many facets of Telecommunication Computer and Control. Our service covers design, supply, installation, and maintenance of telecommunication, Computer, Control products or systems.

title: Account Associate Business Partner (Cimahi)
description:
Tentang majoo
majoo aplikasi wirausaha lengkap untuk kelola bisnis jadi maju. Satu aplikasi untuk segala solusi yang bisa digunakan untuk semua jenis usaha mulai dari pengelolaan penjualan, pelanggan, pembayaran, inventori, keuangan, karyawan, sampai dengan pembiayaan usaha.
Deskripsi pekerjaan Account Executive Business Partner
  • Melakukan pekerjaan sesuai dengan standar operasional prosedur perusahaan
  • Mengumpulkan daftar merchant potensial
  • Meningkatkan penjualan secara efektif dengan melakukan kegiatan direct selling dan meeting dengan customer
  • Melakukan follow up dengan customer baru untuk mendapatkan penjualan dan repeat order
  • Melakukan demonstrasi produk berdasarkan kebutuhan merchant, termasuk mengedukasi merchant tentang majoo, bagaimana menggunakan aplikasi majoo, dan instalasi produk ke customer
  • Bertanggung jawab untuk melakukan sales report kepada atasan dan berkoordinasi dengan divisi terkait
  • Berkoordinasi dengan tim terkait untuk memproses pembayaran
  • Penempatan Cimahi Jabar
Kualifikasi Minimum
  • Pendidikan minimal SMA atau sederajat
  • Memiliki pengalaman kerja di bidang sales minimal 1 tahun
  • Usia maksimal 35 tahun
  • Memiliki kendaraan pribadi dan SIM-C (minimal)
  • Aktif dalam komunitas atau organisasi akan menjadi nilai tambah
  • Komunikatif, bisa bekerjasama dalam tim, dan menyukai bekerja di lapangan
  • Mempunyai smartphone android dan aktif dalam bersosial media

company.name: PT. Majoo Teknologi Indonesia
company.description:
Di majoo kami membantu bisnis ritel tumbuh dan berkembang, dengan menyediakan aplikasi pengelolaan penjualan dan keuangan dengan fungsi paling lengkap dan mudah untuk semua jenis usaha dengan hanya menggunakan tablet yang sudah dimiliki.
Kami ingin membuat bisnis menjadi mudah: Investasi semakin rendah biaya, peningkatan pelayanan, pemantauan penjualan dan karyawan dapat dilakukan secara online. Pada akhirnya bisnis yang berkembang akan menciptakan lapangan pekerjaan dan peningkatan ekonomi secara luas. Bersama-sama, majoo ingin menjadi bagian tumbuhnya wirausaha sukses dan majunya ekonomi digital Indonesia.
Majoo lebih dari aplikasi kasir biasa, fitur lengkap bisa lakuin banyak hal, bikin usaha kamu jauh berkembang. #langkahmajoo
